GK16andhvc1u:6: --- śrīmadācāryābhinavaguptakṛtaṃ locanam śrībhāratyai namaḥ apūrvaṃ yadvastu prathayati vinā kāraṇakalāṃ- jagadbhāvaprakhyaṃ nijarasabharātsārayati ca /
GK16andhvc1u:7: kramātprakhyopākhyāprasarasubhagaṃ bhāsayati ta- tsarasvatyāstattvaṃ kavisahṛdayākhyaṃ vijayate //
GK16andhvc1u:8: śrīsahṛdayatilakarāmaśārakakṛtabālapriy.ā śrīgurave namaḥ śrīgurūnpūrṇavedeśaṃ saṅgameśañca mādhavam /
GK16andhvc1u:20_0: bālapriyā nā-tattatkāryaṃ prati prasiddhaṃ yadyadupādānādikāraṇantasya kalā leśaḥ
GK16andhvc1u:21_0: kiñca yad grāvaprakhyaṃupāṣāṇatulyaṃ nisargato nīrasaṃ jagatusarvaṃ vastu nijaḥ svīyaḥ
GK16andhvc1u:21_1: kāvyāsambandhī yo rasaḥ śṛṅgarādiḥ tasya bharādatiśayāt sārayati sāraṃ karoti vibhāvāditvayojanena
GK16andhvc1u:26: upākhyā vacanaṃ prathamaṃ prakhyā paścādupākhyeti tayoryaḥ kramātprasaraḥ tena subhagaṃ hṛdyaṃ sad,
GK16andhvc1u:27: bhāsayati nisargeṇāramaṇīyamapi sarvaṃ vastu rasavyañjakatvasampadanena rasaṇīyaṃ satprakāśayatītyarthaḥ,

GK16andhvc1u:30: atrādyena vākyenāpūrvavastuno nirmāṇandvitīyena pūrvaṃ sato vastunassarasatvakaraṇaṃ tṛtīyena dvayorapi hṛdyatayā prakāśanañjoktamityapa vyācikṣate,
GK16andhvc1u:36: atha vā kavisahṛdayayorākhyā abhīkṣṇyena khyānaṃ sphuraṇaṃ yasya tat kāvyātmakamityarthaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:41: enena tannamaskāro granthakarturgamyate; atha ca sarasvatyāstattvaṃ dhvanikāvyam,
GK16andhvc1u:42: vijayate; apūrvamityādyarthaḥ pūrvavadbodhya iti pratipādyārtho 'pyāsūtrita iti dik /
GK16andhvc1u:43: athauddhatyaṃ paraharannātmano vyākhyānanaipuṇī darśayan kīrttya nuvṛttaye nāmanirdeśaṅkurvaṃśca pratijānīte-bhaṭṭetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:44: bhaṭṭendurājasyautannāmakasya guroḥ caraṇābjayoḥupajhatulyayoḥ pādayoḥ tatsannidhāviti yāvad yo 'dhivāsastena caraṇābjaśuśrūṣayeti yāvad;
GK16andhvc1u:46: atha ca śrotṛjanahṛdayapriyāṇi śrutāni śāstrāṇi yasya saḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:47: yathā padmena surabhīkaraṇe vastuno hṛdyatvaṃ tathetyupamātra dhvanyate,
GK16andhvc1u:51: apiśabdaḥ svalpābhidhānena saha sphuṭīkaraṇasyāpātato virodhaṃ dyotayati,
GK16andhvc1u:53: lojyate dṛśyate 'neneti locanaṃ svasya locanaṃmanaḥ tasya nitarāṃ yojanayā manaḥpraṇidhānenetyarthaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:55: yadvā svasya locanaṃ jñānaṃ tasya niyojanayā vyākhyānarūpānuraṇanadvārā samarpaṇena sphuṭayāmi prakāśayāmi,
GK16andhvc1u:60: namaskāraḥ tasya sampattiḥuprakarṣaḥ tayā caritaḥulabdhaḥ arthaḥuvighnanivṛttyādirūpasākṣātprayojanaṃ yasya saḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:64: vyākhyātṝṇāṃ vyākhyānaṃ śrotṝṇāṃ śravaṇañcabhīṣṭaṃ divyāñajanākhyā ṭippanī śrīśrīgaurakṛṣṇaḥ śaraṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:67_2: locanākhye vyākhyāne viṣamasthalāni mukhyatvena viśadayitukāmasya divyāñjananāmikeyaṃ ṭippanī;
GK16andhvc1u:69_4: pūrṇaitatsūtrānuvṛttita ṛtpadānuvṛttyaiva nirvāhe prakṛtasūtre punā ṛdgrahaṇamānaṅvidhyu
GK16andhvc1u:78: nityodyoginaśca bhagavato 'sammohādyavasāyayogitvenotsāhapratītervīraraso bālapriyā vaṇañcābhīṣṭaṃ phalaṃ tasya sampattaye niṣpattaye,
GK16andhvc1u:79: tadubhayasampattau tadubhayahetukagranthapratiṣcaṭārūpaṃ phalaṃ granthakārasya ca siddhyatīti bhāvaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:84: yadvā samucitāyā āśiṣaḥ prakaṭanaṃugranthato nibandhanaṃ taddvāreṇa,
GK16andhvc1u:86: vṛttikāra ityanena svecchetyādikaṃ na kārikārūpasūtrādyapadyamiti darśitam,
GK16andhvc1u:96: uktarūpamityarthaḥ, atha dhvaniṃ kāvyātmānaṃ ṭippanī vṛttikāra iti /
GK16andhvc1u:98: ata eva viśiṣṭasyevāripsitatvena mūle maṅgalākaroṇe 'pi nācāravirodhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:99: ke cittu mūle 'pi “kāvyasyātme' tiprathamakārikāyāmādyapadasya kāvyetyasyānyaparatve 'pi parārthopanītodakumbhadarśanavat śravaṇamātreṇāpi;
GK16andhvc1u:101: śabdamūrttidharasyaite viṣṇoraṃśā mahātmana“-- ityādipramāṇato bhagavatsphorakatvena vastunirddeśarūpamaṅgalaṃ jātamevetyāpi vadanti,
GK16andhvc1u:105: nakhānāṃ praharaṇatvena graharaṇena ca rakṣaṇe kartavye nakhānāmavyatiriktatvena karaṇatvātsātiśayaśaktitā kartṛtvena sūcitā,
GK16andhvc1u:111_0: bālapriyā pratipādayiṣyatā granthakṛtā kṛtasyāsya prathamapadyasya kāvyarūpatvādasminnapi
GK16andhvc1u:111_1: dhvaniryojanīya iti manvāno rasādibhedena trividheṣu dhvaniṣu pradhānabhūtaṃ rasadhvanimādau
GK16andhvc1u:113: na vācyārthamātramanenocyate kintu raso dhvanyate cetyarthaḥ, nityodyogina iti /
GK16andhvc1u:115_1: yo 'dhyavasāyaḥ etadevaṃ kartuṃ śakyamiti vastutattvaniścayaḥ tadyogitveneti utsāhahetukathanam,
GK16andhvc1u:118: svecchākesariṇo madhuripoḥ prasannārticchida iti padairhiraṇyakaśipuprabhṛtinivarhaṇādiviṣayakotsāhasya vyañjanayā sahṛdayānāṃ pratīterityarthaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:123: nanu nakhānāṃ praharaṇatve 'pi kathaṃ trāṇakriyāṃ prati karaṇatvamityatastatsambhāvanāndarśayati-praharaṇeneti /
GK16andhvc1u:124: praharaṇaṃ hi svasyānyasya vā rakṣāṃ kartumupādīyata iti bhāvaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:134: vibhāvādīnāṃ mitho nāntarīyakatvena “sadbhāvaśced vibhāvāderdvayorekasya vā bhaved /
GK16andhvc1u:141: ārteḥ punaśchedyatvaṃ nakhānparatyasambhāvanīyamapi tadīyānāṃ nakhānāṃsvecchānirmāṇaucityātsambhāvyata eveti bhāvaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:142_0: atha vā trijagatkaṇṭako hiraṇyakaśipurviśvasyotkleśakara iti sa eva vastutaḥ prapannānāṃ
GK16andhvc1u:143: kiṃ ca te nakhāḥ svacchena svacchatāguṇena nairmalyena;
GK16andhvc1u:144: svacchamṛdugrabhṛtayo bālapriyā śaktiḥusāmarthyaṃ yeṣāṃ teṣāṃ bhāvastattā,
GK16andhvc1u:149: tattaddurjanebhyo jagato yastrāsaḥ tadapasāraṇe ya udyamaḥ sa ityarthaḥ, ukta iti /
GK16andhvc1u:151: imamarthaṃ manasikṛtya pūrvaṃ nityodyogina ityuktamiti bodhyam,
GK16andhvc1u:153: ādyamicchāpadena dvitīyaṃ svapadena ca gamyamiti bodhyam,
GK16andhvc1u:156: ucitetīcchāviśeṣaṇaṃ vā tasmin yadaucityāmarthāt svasya tasmāddhetorityarthaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:158: siṃharūpasya nararahapamiśratvaṃ prasiddamato noktam, ye cchindantīti /
GK16andhvc1u:164: svecchayā bhagavata icchayā yannirmāṇaṃunakhānāṃnarmāṇaṃ tena hetunā;
GK16andhvc1u:169: asmin pakṣe ātiṃśabda ātiṅkāraṇaṃlakṣayati tasyāvyabhiṭacāreṇa nikhilārtikāritvañca dhvanatīti bodhyam, vināśayadbhiriti /
GK16andhvc1u:171: tathāvidhasya hiraṇyakaśipoḥ hananamārterevocchedanaṃ na tu kasya citprāṇina iti bhagavadbuddhiriti bhāvaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:174: ārtimeva chinatti na tu kañjitprāṇinamityarthapratītyeti bhāvaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:175: atra prapannetyādiviśeṣaṇaṃ trāṇāśīravādahetugarbhasvacchetyādipraśaṃsāparaṃpraśasyamānā hi devatā praseduṣī prepsitaṃ prayacchati,
GK16andhvc1u:186: naraharinakhānāṃ tacca lokottareṇa rūpema pratipāditam kiṃ ca tadīyāṃ svacchatāṃ kuṭilimānaṃ cāvalokya bālacandraḥ svātmani khedamanubhavati;
GK16andhvc1u:190: adya bālapriyā vakrahṛdyarūpākṛtyāyāsitatvasya bālacandra eva sambhavāttadarthasāmarthyamūlenetyarthaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:193: āyāsita ityasāya khedita ityartho lakṣaṇayā; tatphalamāhāyāsanenetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:194: tatsannidhau nakhasannidhau, vicchāyatveti niśśobhatvetyarthaḥ, dhvanyata iti /
GK16andhvc1u:199: tadhā ca vidāraṇādinā'yākasakāribhyo lokikanakhebhyo naraharinakānāṃ vāyatireko vyajyata iti bhāvaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:200: prapannārticchida iti viśeṣaṇasahakāreṇa vyātirekāntarasyālaṅkārāntarasya ca dhvanindarśayati kitrcetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:201: tadīyāṃunakhasambandhinīm, kuṭilimānamityatra tadīyamiti vipariṇāmena sambandhaḥ, svātmanīti /
GK16andhvc1u:204: itiśabdasyānubhavatītyanena vyatirekālaṅkāra ityanena ca sambandho vodhyaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:209: ātmano hi santāpasyaiva cchedane kuśalatvaṃ na sarvāsāmārtīnāmiti bhāvaḥ, bālendubahumāneneti /
GK16andhvc1u:210: ete nakhāḥ na kintu bālendava iti bahumatyetyarthaḥ, āyāsamita /
GK16andhvc1u:213: utprekṣāpahnutidhvaniriti utparekṣārthāpahnutirutprekṣāpahnutiḥ tasyāḥ dhvaniḥ pahnutyutprekṣayoraṅgāṅgitayā sthitatvāttatsaṅkaradhvaniriti yāvat,
GK16andhvc1u:215_1: śaktiḥ padaparivṛttisahatvarūpasāmarthyaṃ mūlaṃ prayojakaṃ yasya tāddaśena svataḥsambhavinā vyañjanāvyāpāreṇa /
GK16andhvc1u:220: locanam punarevaṃvidhā nakhā daśa bālacandrākārāḥsantāpārticchedakuśalāśceti tāneva loko bālendubahumānena paśyati,
GK16andhvc1u:223: bālapriyā bālenduraviratamāyāsamanubhavatīvetyutprekṣāyāṃ hi pūrvoktaṃ tāneva lokobālenduṃ bahumānena paśyati na tu māmityākalanaṃ nimittaṃ tatra ca spaṣṭāpahnutiḥ;
GK16andhvc1u:224: na nakhā ete kintu bālendava iti lokasya pratīteḥ;
GK16andhvc1u:227: atra vīrarasadhvaniraṅgī; utsāhasya prādhānyena pratīyamānatvāditi dhyeyam,
GK16andhvc1u:229_1: vāsyamidaṃ na bhāvaparaṃ bhaktasya bhedena bhajanīyadevatāviṣayakaratervyaṅgyāyāḥ khalubhāvatvam,
GK16andhvc1u:236: na ca nairapekṣye saṃsṛṣṭeḥ prasaṅga iti saṅkyam?
GK16andhvc1u:240: yadyapi sarvameva vastu tathāpīha rasālaṅkārabhinnaṃ vastupadena vivakṣitam,
GK16andhvc1u:245: kāvyasyātmā dhvanir iti budhair yaḥ samāmnāta-pūrvas tasyābhāvaṃ jagadur apare bhāktam āhus tam anye /
GK16andhvc1u:246: kecid vācām sthitam aviṣaye tattvam ūcus tadīyaṃ tena brūmaḥ sahṛdaya-manaḥ-prītaye tat-svarūpam // DhvK_1.1 //
GK16andhvc1u:248: kāvyasyātmā dhvaniriti budhairyaḥ samāmnātapūrvastasyābhāvaṃ jagadurapare bhāktamāhustamanye /
GK16andhvc1u:249: ke cidvācāṃ sthitamaviṣaye tattvamūcustadīyaṃ tena brūmaḥ sahṛdayamanaḥprītaye tatsvarūpam // 1 //
GK16andhvc1u:250: locanam atha prādhānyenābhidheyasvarūpamabhidadhadapradhānatayā prayojanaprayojanaṃ tatsambaddhaṃ prayojanaṃ ca sāmarthyātprakaṭayannādivākyamāha-kāvyasyātmeti /
GK16andhvc1u:266: evañja tayorhetuhetumadbhāvena prayojanaprayojanarūpāyāḥ prīterabhidhānāttaddhetubhūtasya dhvanisvarūpajñānasya prakaṭanaṃ siddhyatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:267: nanu budhaśabdasya sāmānyato jñātṛvācitvāt vṛttau 'kāvyatattvavidbhiri'ti kuto vyākhyātamityatastadavatārayati-kāvyeti /
GK16andhvc1u:277: asya ca sahṛdayamanaḥprītistaditi bhavati tadabhidhānasya tāddaśaprītistathā prayojanam /
GK16andhvc1u:278: prayojanaprayojanatāvacchedakakukṣau manaḥpadopādānaṃ ca bharatadarśanādhvanīnānāṃ prakriyāṃśe bhūmnā vyākaramadarśanānusāritvasphoraṇāya,
GK16andhvc1u:279: idamīye hi darśane sukhādiviśeṣaguṇānāṃ manoniṣṭatvamevābhimataṃ nātmaniṣṭatvam /
GK16andhvc1u:284: paramparayā yaḥ samāmnātapūrvaḥ samyak āsamantād mnātaḥ prakaṭitaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:285: tasya sahṛdayajanamanaḥprakāśamānasyāpyabhāvamanye locanam ātmaśabdasya tattvaśabdenārthaṃ vivṛṇvānaḥ sāratvamaparaśābdavailakṣamyakāritvaṃ ca darśayati /
GK16andhvc1u:289: vastutastu na tatsaṃjñāmātreṇoktam, api tvastyeva dhvaniśabdavācyaṃ pratyuta samastasārabhūtam /
GK16andhvc1u:298: tena cābādhitasvarūpatvarūpātmasāmyena dhvanirūpārtho lakṣyata iti jñāpanāya tattvaśabdena tadarthaviviraṇaṃ,
GK16andhvc1u:305: tatsaṃjñāprakāreṇa saṃjñino bhānañjākṣepādinā bhavati yathā jātisaktipakṣe vyakterbhānam /
GK16andhvc1u:306: yadvā dhvanipadasya lakṣaṇayā dhvanisaṃjñita ityartha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:317: nanvevaṃ dhvaniśabdasya dhvanisaṃjñita ityarthakathane sati tasya 'sahṛdayamanaḥprakāśamānasyāpī'ti samanantaragranthavirodhaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:329: locanam evaṃ tu yuktataram--itiśabdo bhinnakramo vākyārthaparāmarśakaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:331: śabdapadārthakatve hi dhvanisaṃjñito 'rtha iti kā saṅgatiḥ?
GK16andhvc1u:332: evaṃ hi dhvaniśabdaḥ kāvyasyātmetyuktaṃ bhaved, gavityayamāheti yathā /
GK16andhvc1u:334: pratyuta satyeva dharmiṇi dharmamātrakṛtā vipratipattirityalamaprastutena bhūyasā sahṛdayajanodvejanena /
GK16andhvc1u:335: budhasyaikasya prāmādikamapi tathābhidānaṃ syāt, na tu bhūyasāṃ tadyuktam /
GK16andhvc1u:338: avicchinnena pravāheṇa tairetaduktaṃ vināpi viśiṣṭapustakeṣu viniveśanādityabhiprāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:339: na ca budhā bhūyāṃso 'nādaraṇāyaṃ bālapriyā yādidaṃ saṃjñāprakāreṇa dhvanilakṣaṇaṃ vastu kāvyātmatvenābhihitaṃ tadaśraddhopahanyamānamānasajanabuddhyanurodhenaiva /
GK16andhvc1u:340: dhvanyamānatvaviśiṣṭārthasya sahṛdayapratītisiddhatayā tadbuddhyanurodhena ca samanantaragrantha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:341: yadvā nanvevaṃ dhvanipadasya dhvanisaṃjñita ityarthakatve kathamabhāvādivādipratyutthānam,
GK16andhvc1u:342: teṣāṃ dhvanyamānatva eva vivādena dvanisaṃjñāyāṃ vivādābhāvādityata āha-vastutastvityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:348: evaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ yocajanaṃ vyākyānaṃ veti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:370: yathā śabdādau satyeva dharmiṇi nityatvānityatvādidharmakṛtā vipratipattiḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:371: prakṛte ca dhvanisaṃjñite dharmiṇi guṇālaṅkārāntarbhūtatvabhāktatvādidharmakṛtā vipratipattirit bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:383: viśiṣṭapustakeṣu viniveśanaṃ lekhanena sthāpanaṃ, tasmādvināpyuktamiti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:392: ataḥ kiṃ kurmaḥ, apāraṃ maurkhyamabhāvavādināmiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:393: na cāsmābhirabhāvavādināṃ vikalpāḥ śrutāḥ, kuṃ tu sambhāvya dūṣayiṣyante, ataḥ parokṣatvam /
GK16andhvc1u:394: na ca bhaviṣyadvastu dūṣayituṃ yuktam, anutpannatvādeva /
GK16andhvc1u:395: tadapi buddhyāropitaṃ dūṣyata iti cet; buddhyāropitatvādeva bhaviṣyattvahāniḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:411: jagaduriti liṭaḥ prayogasyopapattiṃ vṛttau vyācakṣīrannityādestadvivaraṇarūpatvādikañca darśayitumāha-na cetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:412: asmābhiḥ dhvanivādibhiḥ, viruddhāḥ kalpā vikalpā vikalpitārthāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:413: yadi na śrutāḥ kathantarhi dūṣayiṣyanta ityata āha-sambhāvyeti /
GK16andhvc1u:430: evaṃ liṭaḥ prayogaṃ prasādhyācakṣīrannityādiliṅprayogān prakṛtasaṅgatān darśayati-tahyākhyānāyaiveti /
GK16andhvc1u:432: na tu svatantratayetyevakārārthaḥ. vyākhyānāyetyasya sambhāvyetyanena sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:433: nanvacakṣīrannityādibhireva jagadurityasya vāyakhyāne sambhavati kiṃ madhye tadabhāvavādināñjāmī ityādigranthenetyaśāṅkāvāraṇāyāvatārayati-sambhāvanāpīti /
GK16andhvc1u:442: na ca sambhavasyāpi sambhāvanā, api tu vartamānataiva sphuṭeti vartamānenaiva nirdeśaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:443: nanu cāsambhavadvastumūlayā sambhāvanayā yatsambhāvitaṃ taddūṣayitumaśakyamityāśaṅkyāha--vikalpā iti /
GK16andhvc1u:444: na tu vastu sambhavati tāddak yata iyaṃ sambhāvanā, api tu vikalpā eva /
GK16andhvc1u:446: ata eva 'ācakṣīran' ityādayo 'tra sambhāvanāviṣayā liṅprayogā atītaparamārthe paryavasyanti /
GK16andhvc1u:454: nanu sambhavantītyasya sthāne sambhāvyanta ityucyatāṃ tadāpratijñā cādau kṛtā syādityatrāha-sambhāvyanta itīti /
GK16andhvc1u:457: nanu sambhāvanāmūlabhūtassambhavo 'pi kiṃ sambhāvanīyaḥ? netyāha-na ceti /
GK16andhvc1u:462: vikalpā ityuktyā kathaṃ parihāra ityatastatprakāraṃ vyācaṣṭe-na tvityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:468: pramāṇayuktyābhāsābhyāmadhiṣṭānabhūte kāvyātmani dhvanisvarūpe viruddhatayā kalpyanta iti vikalpāḥ pakṣāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:474: yata iṃme pakṣā bhrāntikalpitāḥ, tata evetyārthaḥ. atīteti /
GK16andhvc1u:477: paryavasyantīti mūle jagaduriti liṭyoga iva vṛttāvācakṣīrannityādisambhāvanārthakaliṅprayogo 'pi kriyāyāḥ sambhāvanārūpabuddhyāropitatvanimittkabhūtatve paryavasyatīrtthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:492: kiṃ vṛttaṃ yadi pūrvavanna bhavanasya sambhāvanetyayamevārtha ityalamaprakṛtena bahunā /
GK16andhvc1u:493: tatra samayāpekṣamena śabdo 'rthapratipādaka iti kṛtvā vācyavyātiriktaṃ nāsti vyaṅgyam,
GK16andhvc1u:495: tadanākṣiptamapi vā na vaktuṃ śakyaṃ kumārīṣviva bhartṛsukamatadvitsu iti traya evaite pradhānavipratipattiprakārāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:496: tatrābāvavikalpasya trayaḥ prakārāḥ-śabdarthaguṇālaṅkārāṇāmeva śabdorthaśobhākāritvāllokaśāstrātiriktasundaraśabdārthamayasya bālapriyā kāyasya śarīrasya /
GK16andhvc1u:504: yadi nāmetyādipadyasya śeṣabhūtamidamekapādātmakaṃ vākyam-yadi na syāditi /
GK16andhvc1u:506: kintu yathāyathameva vyāvasthitāntarbahirbhāga evāyaṃ kāyassyāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:508: tadāpi kiṃ phalaṃ syādityarthaḥ. tadāpyatijugupsito 'yaṃ koyo niṣphala eva phalgutaraviṣayopabhogamātropayogitvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:511: yadi na bhavanasya sambhāvanā kiṃ vṛttamiti yojanā /
GK16andhvc1u:512: tataḥ kiṃ syādi tyāsya vivaraṇaṃ-kiṃ vṛttamiti /
GK16andhvc1u:513: tadāpi kiṃ phalaṃ jātaṃ na kiñcidityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:514: yadi na syādityasya vivaraṇaṃ yadi na bhavanasya sambhāvaneti /
GK16andhvc1u:515: pūrvavaditi vaidharmyeṇa dṛṣṭāntakathanaṃ, yadi nāmetyādau yathā bhavanasya sambhāvaneti /
GK16andhvc1u:516: ayamevārtha iti niṣedhasthale 'pi liṅassambhāvanaivārtha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:520: iti kṛtvā ityato hetoḥ, śabdasya saṅketitārthabodhakatvāditi yāvat /
GK16andhvc1u:528: abhidāvṛttyā abhidhāpucchabhūtayā vṛttyā lakṣaṇayā, ākṣiptaṃ bodhitam /
GK16andhvc1u:546_0: heturayaṃ vakṣyamāṇe sarvatra bodhyaḥ--yatra yatra kāvyaśobhākāritvaṃ tatra kāvyaśobhākāritvaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:546_1: tatra tatraśabdārthaguṇādyanyatamatvamiti locanam kāvyasya na śobhāhetuḥ kaścidanyo
GK16andhvc1u:547: yo vā na gaṇitaḥ sa śobhāhetuḥ kaścidanyo 'sti yo 'smābhirna gaṇita ityekaḥ prakāraḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:548: yo vā na gaṇitaḥ sa śobhākāryeva na bhavatīti dvitīyaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:549: atha śobhākārī bhavati tarhyasmadukta eva guṇe vālaṅkāre vāntarbhavati,
GK16andhvc1u:554: tāvanmātreṇa ca kiṃ kṛtam? anyasyāpi vaicitryasya śakyotprekṣatvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:557: tadyayā-'karmaṇyaṇ' ityatra kumbhakārādyudāharamaṃ śrutvā svayaṃ nagarakārādiśabdā utparekṣyante,
GK16andhvc1u:563: guṇādyatiriktaḥ kāvyaśobhāhetuḥ kaścinnāstīti pratijñā, pramāṇābhāvāditi heturatra bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:566: bhavatāmabhimata iti cārthātsiddhyati, tathā ca paramate pratiyogiprasiddhyā tanniṣedha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:571: nanu vyaṅgyasya śobhākāritvaṃ svasaṃvedasākṣikaṃ kathamapahnūyata ityataḥ prakārāntaramāha- athetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:583: asmaduktānāṃ gumādīnāṃ kāvyajīvitatvādiviśeṣamāśritya dhvanyādināmāntaraṃ bhavadbhiḥ kriyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:600: tatra ca śabdagatāścārutvahetavo 'nuprāsādayaḥ locanam tṛtīyaḥ prakāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:601: evamekastridhā vikalpaḥ, anyau ca dvauviti pañca vikalpā iti tātparyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:604: tatra śabdārthau na tāvaddhvaniḥ, yataḥ saṃjñāmātreṇa hi ko guṇaḥ?
GK16andhvc1u:607: tatra śabdānāṃ svarūpamātrakṛtaṃ cārutvaṃ śabdālaṅkārebhyaḥ, saṃghaṭanāśritaṃ tu śabdaguṇebhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:609: saṃghaṭanāparyavasitaṃ tvarthaguṇebhya iti na guṇālaṅkāravyatirikto dhvaniḥ kaścit /
GK16andhvc1u:612: yadguṇālaṅkāravyatiriktaṃ taccārutvakāri na bhavati, nityānityādoṣā asādhuduḥśravādaya iva /
GK16andhvc1u:613: cārutvahetuśca dhvaniḥ, tanna tadvyatiriktaiti vyatirekī hetuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:614: nanu vṛttayorītayaśca yathā guṇālaṅkāravyatiriktāścārutvahetavaśca, prasiddhā eva /
GK16andhvc1u:617: tadanatiriktavṛttayo vṛttayo 'pi locanam tathā dhvanirapi tadvyatiriktaśca cārutvahetuśca bhaviṣyatītyasiddho vyatireka ityanenābhiprāyeṇāha--tadanatiriktavṛttaya iti /
GK16andhvc1u:619: tathā hyanuprāsānāmeva dīptamasṛṇamadhyamavarṇanīyopayogitayā paruṣatvalalitatvamadhyamatvasvarūpavivecanāya vargatrrayasampādanārthaṃ tistro 'nuprāsajātayo vṛttaya ityuktāḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:623: 'śabdārthaśarīram' ityādeḥ 'pratīyanta' ityantasya vṛttigranthasya sārārthaṃ vyākhyāyottaragranthaṃ prakṛtopayogaṃ darsayannavatārayati-nanvityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:626: taccārutvakāri neti vyatirekavyāpterguṇālaṅkāravyatiriktāsu cārutvahetutyā sampratipannāsu vṛttirītiṣu vyabhicārādasiddhirityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:643: vivariṣyate cedamupari. vṛttaya ityuktāḥ vṛttaya iti vyavahṛtāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:660: tatra tṛtīyaḥ komalānuprāsa iti vṛttayo 'nuprāsajātaya eva /
GK16andhvc1u:661: na ceha vaiśoṣikavadvṛttirvivakṣitā, yena bālapriyā tisṛṣu vṛttiṣu paruṣādiṣu /
GK16andhvc1u:662: pṛthakpṛthak sarūpāṇāṃ sajātīyānāṃ vyañjanānāṃ nyāsaḥ upanibandhaḥ tam /
GK16andhvc1u:672: paruṣānuprāsaḥ masṛṇānuprāsa iti pāṭhastu anuprāsavṛtyoraikyābhiprāyeṇa yojyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:684: anena grāmyāyā vṛtteḥ rūḍhā komalasaṃjñā ca bhaṭṭodbhaṭoktā darśitā /
GK16andhvc1u:686: yāḥ kaiścidupanāgarikādyāḥ prakāśitāḥ, tā api gatāḥ śravaṇagocaram /
GK16andhvc1u:687: locanam jātau jātimato vartamānatvaṃ na syāt, tadanugraha eva hi tatra vartamānatvam /
GK16andhvc1u:688: yathāha kaścit-- lokottare hi gāmbhīrye vartante pṛthivībhujaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:691: ata eva vyāpārabhedābhāvānna pṛthaganumeyasvarūpā apīti vṛttiśabdasya vyāpāravācino 'bhiprāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:693: udbhaṭādibhiḥ prayukte 'pi tasminnārthaḥ kaścodadhiko hṛdayapathamavatīrṇa ityabhiprāyeṇāha--gatāḥ avaṇagocaramiti /
GK16andhvc1u:694: bālapriyā śaṣāditattadvarṇaracanārūpāḥ paruṣādyā vṛttayo vastuto 'nuprāseṣu vartante /
GK16andhvc1u:696: yathā--gotvādijātayā gavādibiḥ. ataśca svāśrayābhivyaṅgyatvasāmyādvṛttīnāṃ jātitvopacāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:703: tarhi tatra vartanaṃ kinnāmetyata āha--tadanugraha eveti /
GK16andhvc1u:704: vṛttirūpajātikartṛkānugraha evetyartha. sa ca tatkartṛkaṃ bhedakadharmasamarpaṇaṃ rasābhivyañjanasāmarthyādhānaṃ vā /
GK16andhvc1u:710: nāstyatiriktā vṛttirvyāpāro yāsāṃ tā ityārthakatayā vyācaṣṭe-nābhyadhiketi /
GK16andhvc1u:712: sa eva vṛttīnāmapīti bhāvaḥ. tadanatiriktā ityanuktvā evamukteḥ phalandaśayati-ata evetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:718: anuprāsābhyadhikavyāpārasattve tu vṛttīnāṃ svarūpaṃ pṛthagabhidheyaṃ syāditi tadbhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:731_0: teṣāṃ ca samucitavṛttyarpaṇe yadanyonyamelanakṣamatvena pānaka iva guḍamaricādirasānāṃ
GK16andhvc1u:743: samucitā tattadrasavyañjanocitā yā vṛttiḥ vyāpāraḥ, tadarpaṇe nimitte iti kecit /
GK16andhvc1u:751: tathā ca mādhuryādiguṇānāṃ pratyekaṃ prātisvalikarūpeṇa rītiśabdavācyatvaṃ nāsti,
GK16andhvc1u:754: gauḍavidarbhapāñcālasambāndhano gauḍīyādayo ye desāsteṣāṃ tatratyākavīnāmiti yāvat /
GK16andhvc1u:755: viśiṣṭavarṇanaviṣaye yohevākaḥ svabhāvaḥ svācchandyaṃ vā, taṃ prācuryeṇa paśyatīti tena /
GK16andhvc1u:759: trividhamityanena rītigatamapi gauḍīyā vaidarbhī pāñjālīti trevidhyaṃ sūcitam /
GK16andhvc1u:771: prasiddhaprasthānavyatirekiṇaḥ kāvyaprakārasya kāvyatvahāneḥ locanam samudāyino nānya iti vṛttirītayo na gumālaṅkāravyatiriktā iti sthita evāsau vyatirekī hetuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:776: tathāpyatra dhvaniśabdavācyo na kaścidatirikto 'rtho labhyata iti nāmaśabdenāha /
GK16andhvc1u:789: 'ko 'yami' tyatra kiśabdaḥ kimeṣa cārutvasthānamuta cārutvaheturiti vikalpaniṣedhaparaścetyāśayena vivṛṇoti-naiṣa ityādinā /
GK16andhvc1u:794: kiṃśabde naivoktārthe labdhe ki nāmaśabdenetyata āha--tenetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:799: etāvatā śabdārthatadgumālaṅkāravyatiriktasya kāvyaśobhāhetutvaviśiṣṭasya dhvanerabhāva eva siddhaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:800: na tu svarūpeṇa dhvanerabhāva iti tatsiddhye pakṣāntaropakṣepa ityāśayenāvatārayati-nanvityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:817: na ca tatsamayāntaḥpātinaḥ locanam cāsau nṛttagītavādyādisthānīyaḥ kāvyasya kaścit /
GK16andhvc1u:822: pratiṣṭante paramparayā vyavaharanti yena mārgeṇa tatprasthānam /
GK16andhvc1u:830: nanu ye tāddaśamapūrvaṃ kāvayarūpatayā jānanti, ta eva sahṛdayāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:831: bālapriyā kāvyasya samudāyitayā sambandhitvena hyasau vaktavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:832: na ca guṇādibhyo vyatireke sati kāvyasambandhitvamasya śacakyopapādaṃ, nṛttgītādivat /
GK16andhvc1u:864: jānantītyanena 'tatsamayāntaḥ pātinaḥ sahṛdayān kāṃścidi'ti sahṛdayān kāṃścitparikalpya tatprasidyā dhvanau kāvyavyapadeśaḥ pravartito 'pi sakalavidvanmanogrāhitāmavalambate /
GK16andhvc1u:865: locanam tadabhimatatvaṃ ca nāma kāvyalakṣaṇamuktaprasthānātirekiṇa eva bhaviṣyatītyāśaṅkyāha--na ceti /
GK16andhvc1u:866_0: yathā hi khaṅgalakṣaṇaṃ karomītyukatvā ātānavitānātmā prāvriyamāṇaḥ sakaladehācchādakaḥ
GK16andhvc1u:867: paraiḥ paṭaḥ khalvevaṃvidho bhavati na khaṅga ityayuktatāya paryanuyujyamāna evaṃ brūyārt--iddaśā eva khaṅkāṃ sakalaśabdena nirākaroti /
GK16andhvc1u:877: ata eva iti bruvāṇa iti vakṣyate /
GK16andhvc1u:892: iddaśaḥ padārtha eva mama khaṅgatvenābhipreta ityartaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:895: nanvamuyā sopahāsoktyā kiṃ jātam? na naḥ kiñcicchinnamityata āha--prasiddhamiti /
GK16andhvc1u:900: vidvanmanasāmucita viṣaya eva pravṛttisambhavādvidvatpadena uktābiprāyassūcita iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:904: pūnarapare tasyābhāvamanyathā kathayeyuḥ--na sambhavatyeva dhvanirnāmāpūrvaḥ kaścit /
GK16andhvc1u:906: locanam evaṃ hi kṛte 'pi na kiñcitkṛtaṃ syādunmattatā paraṃ prakaṭiteti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:908: jīvitaṃ ca nāma prasiddhaprasthānātiriktamalaṅkārakārairanuktatvāttacca na kāvyamiti loke prasiddhamita /
GK16andhvc1u:910: yadi hi tatkāvyasyanuprāṇakaṃ tenāṅgīkṛtaṃ pūrvapakṣavādinā taccirantanairanuktamiti pratyuta lakṣaṇārhameva bhavati /
GK16andhvc1u:913: tathāpi dhvanirityamuyā bhāṣayā jīvitamityasau na kenacidukta ityabhiprāyamāśaṅkya tṛtīyamabhāvavādamupanyasyati punarapara iti /
GK16andhvc1u:916: bālapriyā ko doṣa ityata āha--evaṃ hītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:919: parantu unmattataiva prakāśitā syānna tu vidvattetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:940: evamapyasau dhvanirityamuyā bhāṣayā jīvitamiti na kenaciduktaḥ dhvaniḥ kāvyātmeti kenāpi lakṣaṇakāreṇa noktamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:944: vuño bhāvarthatve cārutvahetvantarbhāvoktiranupapannā syādato vyacaṣṭe-kamanīyasya karmeti /
GK16andhvc1u:949: teṣāmanyatamasyaiva vā apūrvasamākhyāmātrakaraṇe yatkiñcana kathanaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvc1u:962: yadāhuḥ--'kāvyasobhāyāḥ kartāro dharmā guṇāḥ, tadatiśayahetavastvalaṅkārāḥ' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:964: dhvanirdhvanirit vīpsayā sambhramaṃ sūcayannādaraṃ darśayati--nṛtyata iti /
GK16andhvc1u:965: tallakṣaṇakṛdbhistadyuktakāvyavidhāyibhistacchravaṇodbhūtacamatkāraiśca bālapriyā 'kiñca vāgvikalpānām' ityādigranthaṃ vyākhyāsyamānaṃ manasikṛtyāvatārayati locanenanviti /
GK16andhvc1u:967: vividhaṃ chidyanta iti vicchittayaḥ vaicitryāṇi, tāsām /
GK16andhvc1u:973: 'vāgvikalpānām' ityatra vākpadaṃ nānārthakaṃ vikalpapadaṃ vecitryārthakamiti vyācaṣṭe-vaktītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:997: sahastraśo hi mahātmabhiranyairalaṅkāraprakārāḥ prakāśitāḥ prakāśyante ca /
GK16andhvc1u:1000: na tvasya kṣodakṣamaṃ tattvaṃ kiñcidapi prakāśayituṃ śakyam /
GK16andhvc1u:1001: tathā cānyena kṛta evātra ślokaḥ--- yasminnasti na vastu kiñcina manaḥprahlādi sālaṅkṛti locanam pratipattṛbhiriti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1004: svayaṃ darpaḥ paraiśca stūyamānatetyarthaḥ. vāgvikalpāḥ vākpravṛttihetupratibhāvyāpāraprakārā iti vā /
GK16andhvc1u:1009: yataśca śobāhetutve 'pi nādarāspadaṃ tasmādityarthaḥ. na ceyamabhāvasambhāvanā nirmūlaiva dūṣitetyāha--tathā cānyeneti /
GK16andhvc1u:1024: nirmūlaiva satī na dūpitā, kintu samūlaiveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1028_1: samarthanāya 'na cāsmābhirabhāvavādināṃ vikalpāḥ śrutāḥ' iti prāguktaṃ kathaṃ saṅgacchata iti vācyam /
GK16andhvc1u:1029: yathāśrutārthakasyāsya ślokasya śrutatve 'pi pūrvopadarśitānāṃ bahūnāmabhāvavādaprakārāṇāṃ viśiṣyāśrutatvena tadvacanasya tatparatvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:1030: granthakṛdityādinā matsaraṃ tadukterhetutvena vyutpannai racitaṃ ca naiva vacanairvakroktiśūnyaṃ ca yat /
GK16andhvc1u:1031: kāvyaṃ taddhvaninā samanvitamiti prītyā praśaṃsañjaḍo no vidmo 'bhidadhāti kiṃ sumatinā pṛṣṭaḥ svarūpaṃ dhvaneḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:1033: yato na sālaṅkṛti, ato na manaḥprahlādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1035: vyutpannai racitaṃ ca naiva vacanairiti śabdālaṅkārāṇām /
GK16andhvc1u:1042: jaḍena pṛṣṭo bhrūbhaṅgakaṭākṣādibhirevottaraṃ dadattatsvarūpaṃ kāmamācakṣīteti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1058: tat tathāvidhamarthālaṅkārādiśūnyaṃ 'kāvyaṃ dhvaninā samanvitamiti prītyā praśaṃsan jaḍaḥ dhvalanessvarūpaṃ sumatinā pṛṣṭassan kimabhidadhāti /
GK16andhvc1u:1065: abhāva ukta ityasya śabdālaṅkārāṇāṃ śabdārthaguṇānāmityanayorapi sambandho bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1076: yadvā-gate anyagamane gatamanugamanaṃ gatānugataṃ tadeṣāmastīti gatānukatikāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1080: kimityete vikalpāḥ prarasparasambaddhā vyākhyātā iti śaṅkāyāṃ vṛttigranthānuguṇyādityāha--evamityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1087: bhajyate sevyate tadārthena prasiddhatayotprekṣyata iti bhaktirdharmo 'bhidheyena sāmīpyādiḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:1109: gaṅgādipadalakṣyatīrādyarthenetyarthaḥ. nanvatra padārthakartṛkaṃ sevanannāma kimityata āha-utprekṣyata iti /
GK16andhvc1u:1115: tena ca vaktuḥ pratipatturvā tīrādergaṅgadipadena pratipādane sāmīpyādernimittatvena paryālocanarūpaṃ yadutprekṣaṇantadatra vivakṣitamityāha-prasiddhatayotprekṣyata iti /
GK16andhvc1u:1123: locanam guṇasamudāyavṛtteḥ śabdasyārthabhāgastaikṣṇyādirbhaktiḥ, tata āgato gauṇo 'rtho bhāktaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1125: tāṃ prayojanatvenoddiśya tata bālapriyā gauṇārthasyāpyuktarītyaiva lābhe 'pi tallābhaḥ prakārāntareṇāpi vaktavya ityāśayenāhaguṇeti /
GK16andhvc1u:1126: guṇasamudāye vṛttiryasya, tasya guṇasamudāyaṃ pratipādayata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1129: siṃhādiśabdā hi siṃhatvādijātiṃ tadviśiṣṭavyakti vā abhidadhānā api svārthāvinābhūtān śauryādiguṇānapyākṣepātpratipādayantīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1133: kecittu-guṇasamudāyavṛtterityāsya guṇādvārā samudāye guṇini māmavakādau vṛttiryasya tasyetyarthamāhuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1140: nanu gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityādistale lakṣyatīrādau gaṅgāgatapāvanatvādikameva pratipādyaṃ, na tu sāmīpyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1141: evaṃ siṃho māṇavaka ityādau māṇavakādau siṃhāditādrūpyaṃ parākramātiśayādikaṃ vā /
GK16andhvc1u:1144: tathā ca sāmīpyataikṣaṇyādāvityuktiḥ kathaṃ saṅgacchata iti cet;
GK16andhvc1u:1146: pare tu-sāmīpyādeḥ paramparayā prayojanasādhanatvatsāmīpyapadena pāvanatvādikaṃ taikṣṇyapadena siṃhatādrūpyādikañca lakṣaṇayāvivakṣitamato nāsaṅgatirityāhuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1148: śraddhā vakturmanasā bhajanamanusandhānātmakaṃ, tasyā atiśaya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1163: locanam āgato bhākta iti gauṇo lākṣaṇikaśca /
GK16andhvc1u:1188: nanu dhvanirnāma guṇavṛttivyātirekī nāstīti vaktavye sāmānādhikaraṇyena nirdeśasya ko 'bhiprāya ityata āha-sāmānādhikaraṇyasyeti /
GK16andhvc1u:1189: 'taṃ bhāktam' iti mūle 'dhvanisaṃjñitam' ityādinā vṛttau ca sāmānādhikaraṇyena nirdeśasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1194: na tu dhvanerasarvathopacārasparśitvamapītyamumarthandyotayituṃ siddhāntaviruddhatādātmyapakṣopakṣepārtho 'yaṃ sāmānādikaraṇyena nirdeśa iti bhāva ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1207: mūlakāra iti śeṣaḥ. vṛttau 'gumavṛttiri'ti bhāktaśabdasya vyākhyānaṃ tatpadena prakṛte vivakṣitānarthānvivṛṇoti--guṇā ityādinā /
GK16andhvc1u:1209: yadyapi ca dhvaniśabdasaṃkīrtanena kāvyalakṣaṇavidhāyibhirguṇavṛttiranyo vā na kaścitprakāraḥ prakāśitaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:1210: tathāpi amukhyavṛttyā kāvyeṣu vyāvahāraṃ locanam guṇāḥ sāmīpyādayo dharmāstaikṣṇyādayaśca /
GK16andhvc1u:1211: tairupāyairvṛttirarthontare yasya, tairupāyervṛttirvā śabdasya yatra sa guṇavṛtti- śabdo 'rtho vā /
GK16andhvc1u:1217: mukhyārthe hyabhidhaiveti pāriśeṣyādamukhya eva dhvanaḥ, tṛtīyarāśyabhāvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:1237: śiṣyamāṇe saṃpratyayaḥ pariśeṣaḥ, sa eva pāriśeṣyam, tasmādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1244: tathā ca dhvanirnāma guṇavṛttireva, amukhyatvāditi phalitam /
GK16andhvc1u:1249: vṛttau 'anyo ve'tyātra guṇavṛtternyo mukhya ityarthabhramaḥ syādato vyācaṣṭa-guṇoti /
GK16andhvc1u:1253: darśayatā dhvanimārgau manākspṛṣṭo 'pi na lakṣita iti pariklpyaivamuktam-'bhāktamāhustamanye' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:1257: bhāmahenoktaṃ--'śabdāśchandobhidānārthāḥ' iti abhidhānasya śabdādbhedaṃ vyākhyātuṃ bhaṭṭodbhaṭo babhāṣe--'śabdānābhidhānamabhidhāvyāpāro mukhyo guṇavṛtiśca' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:1260: taistāvaddhvanidigunmīlitā, yathāliśitapāṭhakaistu bālapriyā darśayate'ti manāk sparśe hetuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1262: anena kāvyalakṣaṇavidhāyina eva vivakṣitā ityāśayena pūrayati-bhaṭṭetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1264: lokoyuktiḥ kalāśceti mantavyāḥ kāvyahetavaḥ” iti śiṣṭaṃ pādatrayam /
GK16andhvc1u:1271: tathā cā'bhidhānam' iti vacanena bhāmaho 'guṇavṛtti'riti vacanena bhaṭṭoṭbhaṭo 'lakṣaṇe'ti vacanena vāmanaśca kāvyeṣu guṇavṛtyā vyavahāraṃ darśitavanta iti phalitārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1272: 'dhvanimārgo manāk spṛṣṭo 'pi na lakṣitaḥ 'ityamuṃ bhāgaṃ pūrvaṃpakṣopakṣepānuguṇyena vyācaṣṭe-taistāvadityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1275_1: guṇavṛtyā vyacavahāraṃ darśayadbhireva bhāmahabhaṭṭodbhaṭādibhiḥ dhvanergamakaṃ pradarśitamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1276: tairdhvanimārgasya sparśe 'pi lakṣaṇakaraṇena pṛthak tatsvarūpasyānirūpaṇādguṇavṛttireva dhvaniḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:1277: na tadatirikta iti taduktimarthasiddhāmupajīvyedaṃ bhāktavādaprasthānaṃ pravṛttamityāha- yathālikhitetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1278: tu śabdaḥ parantvityarthe . na lakṣita ityāsya vyākhyānam--tatsvarūpaviveko na kṛta iti /
GK16andhvc1u:1280: tenevaṃvidhāsu vimatiṣu sthitāsu sahṛdayamanaḥprītaye locanam svarūpavivekaṃ kartumaśaknuvadbhistatsvarūpaviveko na kṛtaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:1284: yadyevaṃ na yojyate tadā dhvanimārgaḥ spṛṣṭa iti pūrvapakṣābhidhānaṃ virudhyate /
GK16andhvc1u:1303: yathāśrutaṃ vicāraṃ vinā yattadgranthānāṃ lakṣyabhūtānāṃ dhniyuktakāvyagranthānāmudgrahaṇaṃ dhāraṇaṃ tanmātreṇetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1311: tato hetorbhaktireva dhvanirna tadatirikta iti tadabhiprāyamuktiparyantaṃ kalpayitvā 'bhāktamāhustamanye' ityuktamiti /
GK16andhvc1u:1313: dhvanermārgaḥ-mṛgyate 'nviṣyate vicāryate iti mārgaḥ avivakṣitavācyalakṣaṇo bhedaḥ spṛṣṭaḥ jñāta iti kuto na vyākhyāta ityata āha--yadyevamityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1315: dhvanyavāntarabhedasya jñāne sati guṇavṛttireva dhvanirna tadatirikta iti vacanamasaṅgataṃ bhavedityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1316: yadvā-nanu 'na lakṣita' iti grantho na dṛṣṭa iti yathāśrutārthaparatayā kuto na vyākhyāta ityata āha--yadyevamityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1319: dhvaneḥ spṛṣṭatvasyāddaṣṭatvasya ca vacanaṃ viruddhaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1327: locanam prācyā hi viparyastā eva sarvathā /
GK16andhvc1u:1329: antyāstvanapahnuvānā api lakṣayituṃ na jānata iti krameṇa viṣaryāsasandehājñānāprādhānyameteṣām /
GK16andhvc1u:1331: ekaiko 'pyayaṃ vipratipattirūpo vākyārtho nirūpaṇe hetutvaṃ pratipadyata ityekavacanam /
GK16andhvc1u:1333: āsu madhye eko 'pi yo vimatiprakārastenaiva hetunātatsvarūpaṃbrūma iti,
GK16andhvc1u:1335: abhidānābhidheyalakṣaṇo bālapriyā viparyastāḥ dehātmavādicārvākā iva viparyayajñānayuktāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1337: tuśabdaḥ pūrvebhyo viśeṣaṃ dyotayati, tamāha--tadrūpaṃ jānānā apīti /
GK16andhvc1u:1356: ekavacanena tu teṣāṃ pratyekaṃ hetutvamastīti bodhyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1363_0: 'tasyābhāvaṃ jagaduḥ' 'tena tatsvarūpaṃ brūmaḥ 'bhāktamāhuḥ' tasyahi dhvaneḥ svarūpaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:1367: atha śrotṛgataprayojanaprayojanapratipādakaṃ 'sahṛdayamanaḥprītaye' iti bhāgaṃ vyākhyātumāha-tasya hīti /
GK16andhvc1u:1369: dhvaneḥ svarūpaṃ lakṣayatāṃ sambandhini bālapriyā 'tena brūmaḥ' 'kecidūcuḥ' tena brūmaḥ' iti pṛthak pṛtak yojanā labhyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1370: avatārikoktarītyā 'tena tatsvarūpaṃ brūma' ityanena pradarśitamabhidheyādikaṃ śrotṛpravṛttyaṅgaṃ prasaṅgāddarśayati-dhvanisvarūpamityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1381: vipratipattyupanyāsapūrvakaṃ 'tena brūma' ityuktyā vimatinivṛtteḥ prayojanatvaṃ labhyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1390: śrotṛgataṃ prayojanaṃ pūrvektaṃ vimatinivṛttyā saha dhvanisvarūpajñānaṃ. tasya yatprayojanaṃ prītirūpaṃ tatpratipādakamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1398: labhatāmiti prayojanaṃ sampādayituṃ tatsvarūpaṃ prakāśyata iti bālapriyā tenātra vivakṣitamāha--nirvṛttyātmeti /
GK16andhvc1u:1399: nanu hetvantaraprāpitāpratiṣṭatva eva 'pratiṣṭāṃ labhatām' ityukteḥ prasaktirityata āha-parairityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1407: kārikāyāṃ 'prītaye' ityatraprītiṃ sampādayitumityarthe 'kriyārthe' tyādisūtreṇa caturthīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1412: atra 'tena tattvarūpaṃ brūma' ityuktyā vimitinivṛttestatsvarūpavacanaprayojanatvaṃ yadyapi labhyate,
GK16andhvc1u:1413: tathāpi tasyāḥ na mukhyaprayojanatvam, kintu prītereva /
GK16andhvc1u:1415: prayojanaṃ ca nāma tatsampādakavastuprayoktṛtāpārāṇatayaiva tathā bhavatītyāśayena 'prītaye tatsvarūpaṃ brūma' ityekavākyatayā vyākhyeyam /
GK16andhvc1u:1417: sakalaśabdena satkaviśabdena ca prakāralese kasmiṃściditi nirākaroti /
GK16andhvc1u:1419: na hi 'siṃho baṭuḥ' 'gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ' ityatra ramyatā kācit /
GK16andhvc1u:1422: atha cetyādinā 'tatsamayāntaḥpātina' bālapriyā ityamumartha prayojanapadārthanirvacanapūrvakaṃ pradarśayati-prayojanañcetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1424: tasya prayojanasya sampādakaṃ yadvastu tasya, tatpratīti yāvat /
GK16andhvc1u:1425: yā prayoktṛtā prayojakatā, sā prāṇo yasya tadbhāvenaiva tatprerakatvasvabhāvaśālitayaiveti yāvat /
GK16andhvc1u:1432: atra vimatinivṛtteḥ na dhvanisvarūpavacanaprayojakatā, tajjñānavattasyāḥ svayamapuruṣārthatvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:1433: kintu prītereveti saiva tasya mukhyaṃ prayojanam /
GK16andhvc1u:1439_0: atastathā tanmūlaṃ vṛttikṛtā vyākhyātamiti vimatinivṛtterapi mukhyaprayojanatvasambhave
GK16andhvc1u:1439_1: 'tena tatsvarūpaṃ brūmaḥ' 'sahṛdayamanaḥprītaye tatatsvarūpaṃ mūḥ' iti ca vyākhyeyatayā
GK16andhvc1u:1448: yataḥ sakalaśabdena nikhilaviṣayavyāptatvaṃ satkaviśabdena pramāṇasiddhatvātprādhānyaṃ coktaṃ,
GK16andhvc1u:1460: atha ca rāmāyaṇamahābhārataprabhṛtini lakṣye sarvatra prasiddhavyavahāraṃ lakṣayatāṃ sahṛdayānāmānando manasi labhatāṃ pratiṣṭhāmiti prakāśyate // DhvA_1.1 //
GK16andhvc1u:1462: rāmāyaṇamahābhārataśabdenādikaveḥ prabhṛti sarvaireva sūribhirasyādaraḥ kṛta iti darśayati /
GK16andhvc1u:1465: lakṣema virūpayanti lakṣayanti, teṣāṃ lakṣaṇadvāreṇa nirūpayatāmitayarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1467: yeṣāṃ kāvyānuśīlanābhyāsavaśādviśadībhūte manomukure varṇanīyatanmayībhavanayogyatā te svahṛdayasaṃvādabhājaḥ bālapriyā anenādyābhāvavādo nirākṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1469: 'tatsvarūpaṃ brūma' ityasya lakṣaṇapradarśanena dhvanisvarūpaṃ prakāśayāma iti svalvarthaḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:1482: manasau mukurarūpaṇena svato vaiśadye 'pi saṃskāravaśādatirekaḥ prakāśyate /
GK16andhvc1u:1493: asman pakṣe samānaṃ hṛdayaṃ yeṣāmiti bahuvrīhiriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1495: yathoktam-- yo 'rtho hṛdayasaṃvādī tasya bhāvo rasodbhavaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1499: rasacarvaṇātmanaḥ prādhānyaṃ darsayan rasadhvanereva sarvatra mukhyabhūtamātmatvamiti darśayati /
GK16andhvc1u:1500: tena yaduktam--- dhanirnāmāparo yo 'pi vyāpāro vyañjanātmakaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1501: tasya siddhe 'pi bhede syātkarvye 'śatevaṃ na rūpatā //
GK16andhvc1u:1503: tathā hyabhidhābhāvanārasacarvaṇātmake 'pi tryaṃśe kāvye rasacarvaṇā tāvajjīvitabhūteti bhavato 'pyavivādo 'sti /
GK16andhvc1u:1504: yathoktaṃ tvayaiva-- kāvye rasayitā sarvo na boddhā na niyogabhākt /
GK16andhvc1u:1520: rasacarvaṇaivātmā svarūpaṃ yasya sa ānandaḥ tasya /
GK16andhvc1u:1523: vastvalaṅkāraraseṣu rasadhvanereva prādhānyamitarayostu tatparyavasāyitayā gaiṃṇamiti darśayitumetaduktamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1536: vastuto nirūpyamāṇe bhedo na sidhyatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1538: tasya kāvye aṃśatvaṃ syāt rūpatā ātmatvarūpamaṃśitvam /
GK16andhvc1u:1551: na boddhā itihāsādāviva boddhā sarvo na,
GK16andhvc1u:1552: tathā na niyogabhāk vedādāviva niyojyaḥ locanam tadvastvalaṅkāradhvanyabhiprāyeṇāṃśamātratvamiti siddhasādhanam /
GK16andhvc1u:1556: śrotṝṇāṃ ca vyutpattiprītī yadyapi staḥ,yathoktam-- dharmārthakāmamokṣeṣu vaicakṣaṇyaṃ kalāsu ca /
GK16andhvc1u:1560_1: ko 'sya kāvyarūpasya vyutpattihetorjāyāsaṃmititvalakṣaṇo bālapriyā sarvaḥ na adhikārīti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1562: anena rasacarvaṇāyā adhikārasampādakatvavacanena tasyāḥ prādhānyema jīvitatvamuktameveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1566: na niyogabhāk prabhuriva na niyogakartetyartha iti vyācakṣate /
GK16andhvc1u:1576: nanu kīrtyādiphalāntarāṇāmapi sattvāt 'sahṛdayamanaḥprītaye' ityasyopalakṣaṇatvamabhyupetya tānyapi kuto noktānītyatrāha--tetretyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:1577: tatra iti prādhānyenānanda evokta iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1589: asya kāvyarūpasya vedādibhyaḥ itihāsādibhyaśca ko viśeṣaḥ?
GK16andhvc1u:1593: caturvargavyutpatterapi cānanda eva pāryantikaṃ mukhyaṃ phalam /
GK16andhvc1u:1595: tena sa ānandavardhanācārya etacchāstradvārema sahṛdayahṛdayeṣu pratiṣṭāṃ devatāyatanādivadanaśvarīṃ sthitiṃ gacchatviti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1597: āsta eva nirātaṅkaṃ kāntaṃ kāvyamayaṃ vapuḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:1599: yathā manasi pratiṣṭā evaṃvidhamasya manaḥ, sahṛdayacakravartī khatvayaṃ granthakṛditi yāvat /
GK16andhvc1u:1601: svanāmaprakajīkaraṇaṃ śrotṝṇāṃ pravṛttyaṅgameva bālapriyā vadādiprabhṛtīnāṃ prabhvadisammitatvaṃ kāvyapradīpādau vivṛtam /
GK16andhvc1u:1606: caturvargavyutpatterapi ca pāryantikaṃ phalamānanda eveti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1617: pratiṣṭāśabdo hi devatānāṃ tatsamucitāyatane sthitau prasiddha ityato devatetyādiddaṣṭāntakathanam /
GK16andhvc1u:1621: śāstradvāreṇa vartanaṃ nāma śāstrasyaiva vartanamityabhiprāyeṇa bhāmahavacanaṃ saṃvādayati-yathoktamiti /
GK16andhvc1u:1623: yathā manasi sahṛdayamanasi pratiṣṭā bhavati, evaṃvidhaṃ tathāvidham /
GK16andhvc1u:1629: anena granthakṛto 'pi kīrtidvārā prītirūpaṃ phalaṃ bhavatīti darśatam /
GK16andhvc1u:1639: evaṃ granthakṛtaḥ kaveḥ śrotuśca mukhyaṃ prayojanamuktam // 1 //
GK16andhvc1u:1640: nanu 'dhvanisvarūpaṃ brūma' iti pratijñāya vācyapratīyamānākhyau dvau bhedāvarthasyeti vācyābhidhāne kā saṅgatiḥ kārakāyā ityāśaṅkya saṅgatiṃ kartumavataraṇikāṃ karoti--tatreti /
GK16andhvc1u:1644: tathā dhvanisvarūpe pratīyamānākhye nirūpayitavye nirvivādasiddhavācyābhidhānaṃ bhūmiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1646: vācyena bālapriyā kimarthamevaṃ svanāmaprakaṭīkaraṇatvena vyākhyānamityata āha--sveti /
GK16andhvc1u:1652: granthānte vakṣyāmaḥ “ānandavardhana iti prathitābhidhāna” ityasya vyākhyāvasare prakāśayiṣyāmaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:1671: apūrvaṃ yannirmīyata iti apūrvanirmāṇaṃ prāsādādi tasmin /
GK16andhvc1u:1683: vācya-pratīyamānākhyau tasya bhedāv ubhau smṛtau // DhvK_1.2 //
GK16andhvc1u:1696: tatpṛṣṭe pakṣabhūte tasminnutthitatayā vyatiriktatayā pratīyamānāṃśasya ulliṅganādanumānāditi kecit /
GK16andhvc1u:1719: tat kāvyamanuprāṇayati jīvayati sahṛdayāhlādakaṃ karotīti tadanuprāṇavaṃ, tena /
GK16andhvc1u:1724: yadvā-śabdārthayormadhye śarīrabhāga evetyevakāreṇa ātmakojiniveśe yogyatā nirasyate /
GK16andhvc1u:1726: sarvajanasaṃvedyā dharmāḥ tīvratvamandatvādayo madhuratvaparuṣatvādayo vā yasya tattvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:1727: ddaṣṭānte tu sthūlatvādayo dharmāḥ tīvratvamandatvādayo madhuratvaparuṣatvādayo vā yasya tattvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:1738: sa eka evārtho dviśākhatayā vivekibhirvibhāgabuddhyā vibhajyate /

GK16andhvc1u:2460: śabdasya na tāvanna vyāpāra ityuktaṃ draḍhayati--tathāṃ hītyādinā /
GK16andhvc1u:2485: sāmānyamukhavyāptyadhīnānamitisthale prakṛtasādhyahetvoḥ tatsajātīyayorvā pratyakṣādinā vyāptigrahaṇaṃ vācyam /
GK16andhvc1u:2488: iyaṃ pāvanatvādiprayojanajñānaṃ locanam niyamāpratipattervakturetadvivakṣitamityadhyavasāyābhāvaprasaṅgāccatyasti tāvadatra śabdasyaiva vyāpāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2492: tatrāpi hi skhaladgatitve punarmukyārthabādā nimittaṃ prayojanamityanavasthā syāt /
GK16andhvc1u:2493: ata eva yatkenacillakṣitalakṣaṇeti nāma kṛtaṃ tahyasanamātram /
GK16andhvc1u:2502: yata evaṃ nānyagamyaṃ prayojanaṃ tata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2512: tasmādyat skhaladgatitvaṃ skalantī pratihanyamānā gatiravabodhanavyāpāro yasya śabdasya tasya bhāvastattvam /
GK16andhvc1u:2523: prayojanaṃ nimittīkṛtyāpi lakṣyārthāt skhaladgatitve 'ṅgīkriyamāṇe punaḥ punarapi lakṣaṇāmūlaparikalpanayālakṣaṇānavasthā syādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2526: gaṅgādiśabdena tīrādau lakṣite punaḥ pāvanatvādiprayojanamapi lakṣyeta /
GK16andhvc1u:2527: ata eva tallakṣaṇāyāḥ lakṣitalakṣaṇeti nāmeti kecit /
GK16andhvc1u:2533: vakṣyate ca “tenāyaṃ lakṣatalakṣaṇāyā na viṣayaḥ” iti /
GK16andhvc1u:2538: yaduddisya phalaṃ tatra śabdo naiva skhaladgatiḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:2544: bālapriyā sodarāḥ paryāyāśca ye vyapadeśāḥ śabdāḥ taiḥ nirūpito niścita ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2546: vyapadeśaśca vyapadeśyaṃ vinā na tiṣṭatīti tacchravaṇānyathānupapattinirūpaṇīyo 'yamiti yāvat /
GK16andhvc1u:2549: evaṃ prayojanaviṣayakaṃ dhvananavyāpāraṃ prasādhya tamevetaravyāpāratrayādbhedena spaṣṭayituṃ vyāpārāṇāṃ svarūpaṃ darśayati--tenetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2554: tasyā abhidhāyāḥ, anyathā ātmānaṃ vinā anupapattirasambhavaḥ prayojanābhāvādinā sahāyo yasyāḥ sā /
GK16andhvc1u:2555: kecittu tasya viśeṣarūpasyānvitārthasya anyathā tātparyābhāve yā anupapattiḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:2565_1: locanam sa ca prāgvṛttaṃ vyāpāratrayaṃ nyakkurvanpradhānabhūtaḥ kāvyātmetyāśayena
GK16andhvc1u:2566: abhyupagamamātreṇa caitaduktam; na tvatra lakṣaṇā, atyantatiraskārānyasaṃkramaṇayorabhāvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:2583: tathāca kathaṃ vṛttikṛtā 'pratiṣedharūpa' iti vadatā vyañjanāvyāpārasya niṣedhaviṣayakatvamuktamityata āha-ityāśayenetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2584: ityāśayena uktabhiprāyeṇa 'prayojanaviṣayo 'pi saḥ niṣedhapramukhatayā niṣedhaviṣaya ityuktam' iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2592: vastuto 'tra lakṣaṇā na pravartata iti vṛttigranthānuguṇyenāha--abhyupagametyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2597: yatra vācyasyātyantatiraskāro 'nyasaṅkramaṇaṃ vā tatra hi lakṣaṇā /
GK16andhvc1u:2599: nanvatrārthaśaktimūlo dhvanirevāstu; tatrāpi kiṃ na lakṣaṇetyata āha--na hīti /
GK16andhvc1u:2611: ayaṃ vaktā edvibakṣuḥ etacchabdaprayogāt ityādiḥ prayogo 'tra bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2616: yopyanvitābhidhānavādī 'yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārthaḥ' iti hṛdaye grahūtvā śaravadabhidhāvyāpārameva dīrghadīrghamicchati,
GK16andhvc1u:2617: tasya yadi dīrgho vyāpārastadeko 'sāviti kutaḥ? bhinnaviṣayatvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:2619: sajātīye ca kārye viramyavyāpāraḥ śabdakarmabuddhyādīnāṃ padārthavidbhirniṣiddhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2623: atha ca jñāyamānaḥ saṃjñāśabdaḥ saṃjñini cakṣussannikarṣādikāle svaviśeṣaṇakaṃ saṃjñipratyakṣaṃ janayati iti mataviśeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2633: yo 'rthaḥ paraḥ pradhānapratipādyaḥ tātparyaviṣayo yasya saḥ śabdārthaḥ śabdābhidheyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2637: yathā dhanurdhareṇa preritaśśaro vegākhyenaikeneva vyāpārema parasya varmacchedanagātrabhedanādikā anekakriyāḥ karoti,
GK16andhvc1u:2638: tathā sukavinā prayuktaḥ śabdo 'bhidhākhyenaikenaiva vyāpāreṇa padārthavākyārthayolaṅkṣyatvena vyaṅgyatvenābhimatayośca pratītīrjanayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2639: itthaṃ tanmatamupanyasya tenāpi dhvananamaṅgīkārayituṃ sa dīrgho 'bhidhāvyāpāraḥ kimekaḥ prativiṣayamaneko veti vikalpyādyaṃ pratyācaṣṭe-tasyetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2643: asau eka iti kutaḥ? eko bhavituṃ nārhatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2653: sa eva jhaṭiti vākyenābhidhīyata ityevaṃvidhaṃ dīrghadīrghatvaṃ vivakṣitam,
GK16andhvc1u:2655: nimitteṣu saṅketaḥ, naimittikastvasāvarthassaṃketānapekṣa eveti cet-paśyata śrotriyasyoktikauśalam /
GK16andhvc1u:2657: tasya paścāttanāḥ padārthāvagamāḥ bālapriyā sahakāriṇaḥ samayamukyārthabādhādivaktṛvaiśiṣṭyādayaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2671: yadvāsajātīya ityāderayamarthaḥ--kiñca vyāpārasya yatkāryamanekārthajñānaṃ tatatatsajātīyamanyadveti vikalpaṃ manasi nidhāyāha--sajātīya ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2680: atha vyāpārasya dīrghatvaṃ nāma naikatvamekajātīyatvaṃ vā;
GK16andhvc1u:2702: locanam nimittabhāvaṃ gacchantīti nūnaṃ mīmāṃsakasya prapautraṃ prati naimittikatvamabhimatam /
GK16andhvc1u:2703: athocyate--pūrvaṃ tatra saṅketagrahaṇasaṃskṛtasya tathā pratipattirbhavatītyamuyā vastusthitayā nimittatvaṃ padārtānām,
GK16andhvc1u:2705: na cāpi prakpadārtheṣu saṅketagrahaṇaṃ vṛttam, anvitānāmeva sarvadā prayogāt /
GK16andhvc1u:2706: āvāpodvāpābhyaṃ tathābhāva iti cet-saṅketaḥ padārthamātra evetyabhyupagame pāscātyaiva viśeṣapratītiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2707: athocyate--ddaṣṭeva jhaṭiti tātparyapratipattiḥ kimatra kurma iti /
GK16andhvc1u:2712: kiṃ tu sātisayānuśīlanābhyāsāttatra sambhāvyamānī'pi kramaḥ sajātīyatadvikalpaparamparānudayādabhyastaviṣayavyāptisamayasmṛtikramavanna saṃvedyata iti /
GK16andhvc1u:2716: atha padārtapratīteḥ paścāttanatve 'pi tadviṣayakasaṅketagrahaṇasya pūrvaṃ jātatvāttaddvārakaḥ padārthānāṃ nimittatvavyapadeso na virudhyate /
GK16andhvc1u:2717_0: upalabhyate hi gṛhūtasaṅketasya pratipattur'gaṅgāyāṃ dhoṣa' ityādiyākyaścavaṇānantarameva
GK16andhvc1u:2719: tasyāḥ pāryantikārthapratīteḥ anusaraṇe svamatena nirvahaṇe yadupayogi /
GK16andhvc1u:2720: yadvā-tadanusaraṇe padārtānāṃ pāryantikārthasyāsaṅketitasya kathamavagamo bhavediti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2721: kiñca pūrvaṃ padārtheṣu saṅketagrahamapi na ghaṭata ityāha--na cāpīti /
GK16andhvc1u:2726: tathābhāvaḥ pṛthak pṛthak padārtheṣu saṅketagrahaṇasya bhavanam /
GK16andhvc1u:2734: padārtheṣu saṅketagrahaṇasya nimittatā bhavatu mā veti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2743: sajātīyāḥ vākyārthapratītyaṅgatvena sajātīyāḥ ye tadvikalpāḥ padārthaviṣayakapratyayāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2750: taduttīrṇatve tu sarvaṃ parameśvarādvayaṃ brahyotyasmacchāstrakāreṇa na na viditaṃ tatvālokagranthaṃ viracayatetyāstām /
GK16andhvc1u:2752: kramo hi hetuhetumadbhāvenāvasthitayordharmaḥ, tasya jñāne tayorjñānamapekṣitamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2756: abhyastaḥ bhūyo bhūyaḥ paryālocito viṣayo yayoste /
GK16andhvc1u:2757: yadvā-abhyaste viṣaye dhūmādihetau gavādyarthe ca yo vyāptisamayayoḥ vahnyādisādhyavyāptigavādipadasaṅketayoḥ smṛtī,
GK16andhvc1u:2770: śrutyādipadārthāstadudāharaṇāni cāpodevīyādau kāvyapradīpādau ca grante prapañcitāni /
GK16andhvc1u:2775: etannimittatāvaicitryañca abhidhāyā dīrghadīrghatvāṅgīkāre nopapadya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2786_0: locanam yattu bhaṭṭanāyakenoktam--iha dṛptasiṃhādipadaprayoge ca dhārmikapadaprayoge
GK16andhvc1u:2791: rasaśca vyaṅgya eva, tasya ca śabdavācyatvaṃ tenāpi nopagatamiti bālapriyā yatvityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2797: śvamāraṇanimittabhramaṇavidhisiddhaṃ dhārmikabhīrutvaṃ vinā niṣedhārtho na sidhyatīti dhārmiketyādyuktam /
GK16andhvc1u:2798: tāvanmātreṇāpi gṛhabhramaṇavidhirevānugṛhīto bhavati, na prakṛtaniṣedha ityato dṛptasiṃhādītica /
GK16andhvc1u:2815: etasya vākyasya sambandhinau etau vā yau vaktṛpratipattṛviśeṣau saṅketasthānaparirakṣaṇotsukakāminībhīrudhārmikau,
GK16andhvc1u:2821: tasyāstitvamātraṃ na niṣedhāvagatiṃ prati hetutvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2822: kathaṃ boddhavye dhārmike bhayānakarasāveśa ityata āha--tasyetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2835: pratipatturapi rasāveśo na niyataḥ, na hyasau niyamena bhīrudhārmisabrahmacārī sahṛdayaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2837: tarhi vaktṛpratipattṛpratibhāprāṇito dhvananavyāpāraḥ kiṃ na sahyate /
GK16andhvc1u:2838: kiṃ ca vastudhvaniṃ dūṣayatā rasadhvanistadanugrāhakaḥ samarthyata iti suṣṭhutarāṃ dhvanidhvaṃso 'yam /
GK16andhvc1u:2840: atha rasasyaiveyatā prādhānyamuktam; tatko na sahate /
GK16andhvc1u:2841: atha vastumātradhvaneretadudāharaṇaṃ na yuktamityucyate tathāpi kāvyodāharaṇatvāddvāvapyatra dhvanī staḥ, ko doṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2842: yadi tu rasānuvedhena vinā na tuṣyati,
GK16andhvc1u:2859: uktanayenāpasiddhāntāpātādapi rasāveśakṛtā niṣedhāvagatiriti vaktuṃ na śakyamityupahāsamukhenāha--kiñcetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2861: bhayānakavibhāvādīnabhidadhatyā tadrasāveśaśaktisahakāriṇyā abhidhayā arthādabhihita evāyaṃ niṣedha ityabhiprāyeṇa dūṣayatetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2867: rasasya prādhānyameva darśitaṃ na tu vastudhvanerdūṣaṇamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2877: nanu kāmacārabhyanujñānaṃ na yuktaṃ, rasasyaiva sahṛdayāhlādakāritvādityata āha--yadi tvityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:2886: tathā tasyaivābhilāṣasya ucitāḥ sambhogānuguṇyādviśiṣṭāśca ye kākvādayaḥ anubhāvāḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:2889: tasyānuvedha locanam rasasyālaukikatvāttāvanmātrādeva cānavagamātprathamaṃ nirvivādasiddhaviviktavidhiniṣedhapradarśanābhiprāyeṇa caitadvastudhvanerudāharaṇaṃ dattam /
GK16andhvc1u:2901: yaḥ pūrvaṃ karṇopakarṇikayā tvayāpyākarṇito godāvarīkacchagahane prativasatīti /
GK16andhvc1u:2902: pūrvameva hi tadrakṣāyai tattayopaśrāvito 'sau; sa cādhunā tu bālapriyā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2904: vivecanadaśāyāmatra bhayānakavibhāvādayo na pratīyante, api tu śṛṅgarasambandhina eveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2905: nanu yadi śṛṅgāradhvaniratrāṅgī, tarhi kutastadudāharaṇatveneyaṃ gāthā noktā?
GK16andhvc1u:2914: sa ca pramāṇena kenāpi na siddho loke, nādyāpi kāvyavyāpāraviṣayatayā ca /
GK16andhvc1u:2915: atastatpratipādanārthamārabhamāṇena tadupoddhātatayā prathamaṃ vastudhvanyādikamanyadeva vācyādbhinnatvena pradarśanīyaṃ,
GK16andhvc1u:2925: 'adye'ti padaṃ pūrvaṃ bidhiḥ pratikūlo 'bhūdidānīṃ tu bhavadbhāgyamahimnānukūlo jāta ityarthaṃ dyotayatītyaha--diṣṭyati /
GK16andhvc1u:2935: saṅketasthānarakṣaṇārtamanyāpadeśena vavacidvācye pratiṣedharūpe vidhirūpo yathā-- attā ettha ṇimajjai etya ahaṃ diasaaṃ paloehi /
GK16andhvc1u:2936: mā pahia rattiandhaa sejjāe maha ṇimajjahisi //
GK16andhvc1u:2937: locana.m dṛptatvāttato gahanānnissaratīti prasiddhagodāvarītīraparisarānusaraṇamapi tāvatkathāśeṣībhūtaṃ kā kathā tallatāgahanapraveśaśaṅkayeti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2939: śvaśrūratra śete athavā nimajjati atrāhaṃ divasakaṃ pralokaya /
GK16andhvc1u:2941: maha iti nipāto 'nekārtavṛttiratrāvayorityarthe na tu mameti /
GK16andhvc1u:2942: evaṃ hi viśeṣavacanameva śaṅkākāri bhavediti pracchannābhyupagamo na syāt /
GK16andhvc1u:2943_1: niṣedhadvāreṇa tayābhyupagata iti niṣedhābhāvo 'tra bālapriyā pūrvaṃ svairiṇyai vṛttānto
GK16andhvc1u:2944: nanvevaṃ kimiti svayamuktamityata āha--sa cādhunā tviti /
GK16andhvc1u:2948: dharmikasya śaṅgā mā bhūditi 'gaude'tyādyanuvādapūrvakaṃsiṃhasya dṛptatvādiviśeṣo bodhyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2957: evaṃ hi pracchannābhyupagamo na syāditi sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:2977: kākvādisahāyasya ca tāvati dhvananameva vyāpāra iti dhvanerbhūṣaṇametat /
GK16andhvc1u:2979: atha yadyapi bhavānmadanaśarāsāradīryamāṇahṛdaya upekṣituṃ na yuktaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:2993: samucite sambhogayogye samaye rātrau bhaviṣyatītyātmanā sambhāvyamāno yo 'rthaḥ tannimittakā ye vikarāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3013: anurāgātirekeṇa sambhāvito ya āvayoranibhṛtaḥ sambhogaḥ tasya parihāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3015: upekṣituṃ na yukta ityanena svasyābhilāṣo 'pi pradarśitaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3018: 'diasaam' ityasya kathaṃ prathamāntatayā vyākhyānamityata āha---prakṛta iti /
GK16andhvc1u:3019: na copekṣe kvacidvācye vidhirūpe 'nubhayarūpo yathā--- vacca maha vvia ekkei hontu ṇīsāsaroiavvāiṃ /
GK16andhvc1u:3020: mā tujja vi tīa viṇā dakkhiṇṇahaassa jāantu //
GK16andhvc1u:3022: pratipannamātrāyāṃ ca rātrāvandhībhūto madīyāyāṃ śayyāyāṃ māṃ śliṣaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:3025: mā tavāpi tayā vinā dākṣiṇyahatasya janiṣata //
GK16andhvc1u:3030: kevalaṃ pūrvakṛtānupālanātmanā dākṣiṇyenaikarūpatvābhimānenaiva bālapriyā iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3034: andhībhūtatvena śleṣaṇaṃ niṣidhyate, na tu śleṣaṇamātram /
GK16andhvc1u:3049: 'sthita iti yat tat kevalaṃ dākṣiṇyenaive'ti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3052: pūrvakṛtena pūrvakarmaṇā addaṣṭena hetunā yadanupālanaṃ matpālanam /
GK16andhvc1u:3053: yadvā-pūrvakṛtaṃ yaddākṣiṇyaṃ tasyānupālanamavicchedena pālanaṃ tadātmanā dākṣiṇyena /
GK16andhvc1u:3057: ahisāriāṇaṃ vigdhaṃ karosi aṇaṇāṇaṃ vi haāse //
GK16andhvc1u:3060: na cāsau vrajyābhāvarūpo niṣedhaḥ, nāpi vidhyantaramevānyaniṣedhābhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3076: nivartasvetyanena māgama ityarthasyoktatayā gamananiṣedho vācya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3079: locanam nāyake sata tataḥ pratigantuṃ pravṛttā, nāyakena cāṭūpakramapūrvakaṃ nivartyate /
GK16andhvc1u:3080: na kevalaṃ svātmano mama ca nirvṛtividhnaṃ karoṣi,
GK16andhvc1u:3082: tatastava na kadācana sukhalavalābho 'pi bhaviṣyatītyata eva hatāśāsīti vallabhābhiprāyarupaścāṭuviśeṣo vyaṅgyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3083: yadi vā sakhyopadiśyamānāpi tadavadhīraṇayā gacchantī sakhyocyate-na kevalamātmano vidhnaṃ karoṣi,
GK16andhvc1u:3087_1: punarapi vācya eva viśrānterguṇībhūtavyaṅgyabhedasya preyorasavadalaṅkārasyodāharaṇamidaṃ syāt, na dhvaneḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3100: tvatsaddaśī nānya kācidityevaṃrūpo yo vallabhābhiprāyaḥ, tadrūpa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3125: kassa vaṇa hoi roso daṭṭhūṇa piāeṃ savvaṇaṃ aharam /
GK16andhvc1u:3127: anyāsāñca vidhnaṃ karoṣi tava cepsitalābho bhaviṣyatīti kā pratyāśā /
GK16andhvc1u:3129: tvadīyaṃ vā gacchāvetyubhayatrāpi tātparyādanubhayarūpo vallabhābipārāyascāṭvātmā vyaṅgya ityateyeva vyavatiṣṭate /
GK16andhvc1u:3131: tatra hatāśe ityāmantraṇādi yuktamayuktaṃ veti sahṛdayā eva pramāṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:3133: adhunā tu viṣayabhedādapi vyaṅgyasya vācyādbheda ityāha--kvacidvācyāditi /
GK16andhvc1u:3135: viṣayabhedo 'pi vicitrarūpo vyavatiṣṭamānaḥ sahṛdayairvyavasthāpayituṃ śakyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3136: kasya vā na bhavati roṣo dṛṣṭvā priyāyāḥ savraṇamadharam /
GK16andhvc1u:3148: anyāsāṃ ca tvadgṛhagamanotsukasya mama ceti cakārārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3150: ata eva yata evaṃrūpo vācyārthaḥ, tata eva /
GK16andhvc1u:3151: 'madīyaṃ gṛhamāgaccha tvadīyaṃ vā gṛhaṅgacchāveti cāṭavātmā vallabhābhiprāyo vyaṅgya' iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3153: uktarūpavyaṅgyaḥ vyavatiṣṭata eva, na tu paścādvācyopaskārāya dhāvatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3154: atra pakṣe 'nivartasve' tyasya tavādhvavasāyānnivartasveti vācyārthe bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3156: pakṣe 'smin taṭasthānāṃ nāyikāpremābāvātteṣāṃ vacanaṃ na pravartakaṃ ,
GK16andhvc1u:3157: na vā nivartakamataḥ pūrvoktavyaṅgyasya vācyāṅgatvaṃ neti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc1u:3159: nanu vṛttau 'vyavasthāpita' ityuktiḥ kathaṃ saṅgacchate vyavasthāpanasyāniṣpannatvādityato vyācaṣṭe--viṣayabhedo 'pītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3162: 'kasya ve'ti vākāro 'vadhāraṇārthaṅko dṛṣṭvetyuttaraṃ thojya ityāśayena vyācaṣṭe---dṛṣṭvaivetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3165: anye caivaṃprakārā vācyādvibhedinaḥ pratīyamānabhedāḥ pratīyamānabhedāḥ sambhavanti /
GK16andhvc1u:3169: sabhramarapajhāghrāmaśīle śīlaṃ hi kathañcidapi vārayituṃ na śakyam /
GK16andhvc1u:3172: atrāyaṃ bhāvaḥ---kācidavinītā kutaścitkhaṇḍitādharā niścitatatsavidhasaṃnidhāne tadbhartari tamanavalokamānayeva kayācidvidagdhasakhyā tadvācyatāparihārāyaivamucyate /
GK16andhvc1u:3176: tasyāṃ ca priyatamena gāḍhamupārabyamānāyāṃ tahyalīkaśaṅkitaprātiveśakalokaviṣayaṃ saubhāgyātiśayakhyāpanaṃ priyāyā iti śabdabalāditi sapatnīviṣayaṃ vyaṅgyam /
GK16andhvc1u:3179: kenāpi kāraṇena pragaddaṣṭaviśeṣavattayā pramukhataḥ savraṇatayā vilokyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3180: kṛtvāpīti pāṭhe kṛtaścillākṣārasādinā kenacideva kṛtvāpi svayaṃ kṛtvāpītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3181: kṛtvāpīti pāṭhe kutaścillākṣārasādinā kenacideva kṛtvāpi svayaṃ kṛtvāpītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3184: ukte vācyārthe sthite vakṣyamāṇo vyaṅgyārtha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3203: tasya bharturvyalīkamapriyamanayā kṛtamiti śaṅkito yaḥ prātiveśikalokastadviṣayamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3222: tṛtīyastu rasādilakṣaṇaḥ prabhedo vācyasāmarthyākṣiptaḥ locanam lāghavamātmani grahītuṃ na yuktaṃ;
GK16andhvc1u:3226: punaḥ prakaṭaradanadaṃśanavidhirna vidheya iti taccauryakāmukaviṣayasambodhanaṃ vyaṅgyam /
GK16andhvc1u:3230: dvitīyoddyote 'asaṃlakṣyakramavyaṅgyaḥ krameṇoddyotitaḥ paraḥ' iti vivakṣitānyaparavācyasya dvitīyaprabhedavarṇanāvasare /
GK16andhvc1u:3231: yathā hi vidhiniṣedhatadanubhayātmanā rūpeṇa saṃkalayya vastudhvaniḥ saṃkṣepeṇa suvacaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:3238: rasabhāvatadābhāsatatpraśamāḥ punarna kadācidabhidhiyante, atha cāsvādyamānatāprāṇatayā bhānti /
GK16andhvc1u:3245: yadyapi tatra hāsyarasarūpataiva, 'śṛṅgārāddhi bhaveddhāsyaḥ' iti vacanāt /
GK16andhvc1u:3250: na hyetatsarvaṃ svotprekṣāmātreṇoktamapi tu vidhidhamavasthāpito 'vyavasthāpita' iti vṛttigranthānurodhenetyāha---tadetadityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3251: nanu vastudhvanivadalaṅkāradhvanerapyatraiva pradarśanīyatve kimityagre darśayiṣyata ityuktamityatastātparyamāha-yathā hītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3264: sthāthinyāścittavṛtterāsvādyatve rasaḥ, vyabhicāriṇyāścittavṛtterāsvadyatve bhāva iti yojanā /
GK16andhvc1u:3275: tanmayībhavanadaśāyāṃ tu raterevāsvādyateti śṛṅgārataiva bhāti paurvāparyavivekāvadhāraṇena 'dūrākarṣaṇamohamantra iva me tannāmni yāte śutim' ityādau /
GK16andhvc1u:3277: tadaṅgaṃ bhāvābhāsaścittavṛtteḥ praśama eva prakāntayā hṛdayamāhlādayati yato viśeṣeṇa,
GK16andhvc1u:3279: yathā-- ekasmin śayane parāṅmukhatayā vītottaraṃ tāmyato- ranyonyasya hṛdi sthite 'pyanunaye saṃrakṣatorgauravam /
GK16andhvc1u:3282: na cāyaṃ rasādirarthaḥ 'putraste jātaḥ' ityato yathā harṣo jāyate tathā /
GK16andhvc1u:3284: api tu sahṛdayasya hṛdayasaṃvādabalādvibhāvānubhāvapratītau bālapriyā vibhāvābhāsajñānadvārā sthāyyābhāsaniścayenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3295: bhāvaśabdenaiva bhāvapraśamasyāpi grahaṇasambhavāt kimiti pṛthak tadgrahaṇamityata āha-cittavṛtterityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3310: hāsena rabhasena vegena, yadvyāvṛttaṃ vyāvartanaṃ tena ca sahitaḥ kaṇṭhagraho yatra, tattathā /
GK16andhvc1u:3316: 'vācyasāmarthyakṣiptaḥ prakāśata' ityanena darśitaṃ vibhāvādivyaṅgyatvaṃ rasādeḥ sādhayiṣyan ādau tasya tātparyaśaktigamyatvaṃ niṣedhati---na cetyādi tathetyantena /
GK16andhvc1u:3320: na tu sākṣācchabdavyāpāraviṣaya iti vācyādvibhinna eva /
GK16andhvc1u:3321: tathā hi vācyatvaṃ tasya svaśabdaniveditatvena vā syāt vibhāvādipratipādanamukhena vā /
GK16andhvc1u:3323: locanam tanmayībhāvenāsvādyamāna eva rasyamānataikaprāṇaḥ siddhasvabhāvasukhādivilakṣaṇaḥ parisphurati /
GK16andhvc1u:3326: vibhāvādyarthe 'pi na putrajanmaharṣanyāyena tāṃ cittavṛttiṃ janayatīti jananātirikto 'rthasyāpi vyāpāro dhvananamevocyate /
GK16andhvc1u:3331_0: tatra svaśabdasyānvayavyatirekau rasyamānatāsāraṃ rasaṃ prati nirākurvandhvananasyaiva
GK16andhvc1u:3331_1: tāviti bālapriyā tathā kāvyaṃ vibhāvādyarthapratipādanadvārā tātparyaśaktyā rasacarvaṇāṃ
GK16andhvc1u:3336: hṛdayasya saṃvādaḥ sampratipattiḥ, sa eva balaṃ sahakāri tasmāt /
GK16andhvc1u:3344: siddhasvabhāvā ye sukhādayo bhāvāḥ sukhapadena ratirvivakṣitā /
GK16andhvc1u:3351: athārthasyāpi dhvananameva vyāpāra iti janakatvaniṣedhapūrvakaṃ darśayati-vibhāvādyartho 'pītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3356: yatra yatra rasādipratītiḥ, tatra tatra neti vyatirekaḥ, tāvityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3361: svaśabdena sā kevalamanūdyate, na tu tatkṛtā /
GK16andhvc1u:3363: na hi kevalaśṛṅgarādibdamātrabhāji locanam darśayati--na ca sarvatreti /
GK16andhvc1u:3364: yathā bhaṭṭendurājasya--- yadviśramya vilokiteṣu bahuśo niḥsthemanī locane yadgātrāṇi daridrati pratidinaṃ lūnābjinīnālavat /
GK16andhvc1u:3365: dūrvākāṇḍaviḍambakaśca nibiḍo yatpāṇḍimā gaṇḍayoḥ kṛṣṇe yūni sayauvanāsu vanitāsveṣaiva veṣasthitiḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:3372: tathā hiyāte dvāravatīṃ tadā madhuripau taddattajhampānatāṃ bālapriyā vyabhicāraviṣayamudāharati---yaditi /
GK16andhvc1u:3389: teṣāṃ rasādīnāṃ ta eva vā ye vibhāvānubhāvāḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:3390: teṣāmucitā yāścittavṛttayaḥ sthāyivyabhicārirūpāstāsāṃ vāsanābhiranurañjitāyā rūṣitāyāssvasaṃvido yā ānandamayī carvaṇā tasyāḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:3394: atrābhilāṣo mahāvākyena cintādayastvavānravākyena vyajyanta iti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc1u:3396: yadi lakṣye svaśabdena rasādipratītistarhyanvayaḥ syānna tu svaśabdenāto 'nvayābhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3408: utkamityanena tūktānubhāvānukarṣaṇaṃ katuṃ sotkaṇṭhāśabdaḥ prayukta ityanuvādo 'pi nānarthakaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:3409: punaranubhāvapratipādane hi punaruktiratanmayībhāvo vā na tu tatkṛtetyatra hetumāha---viṣāyāntara iti /
GK16andhvc1u:3410: 'yadviśramya' bālapriyā dattā yā jhampā vegenordhvādideśādāsphālanapūrvakapatanakriyā viharaṇakālabhavā tayā /
GK16andhvc1u:3413: 'sampannate'ti pāṭhe tena dattā sampāditā sampannatā puṣpapallavādisamṛddhiryasyāstāmityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3419: guruṇā prabhūtena bāṣpeṇa ruddhakaṇṭhatayā gadgadaṃ yathā tathā galan prasaran tāra uccaistaśca svaro yatra tattathā /
GK16andhvc1u:3434: carvaṇāyā gocaraṃ viṣayatvaṃ pratipadyata eva, nātra svaśabdāpekṣāmūlakassaṃśayaḥ kārya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3439: kevalaśabdanātra vibhāvānubhāvau prati sahakāritvamapi neti darśayati /
GK16andhvc1u:3441: ayamarthaḥ---jalacāriṇāṃ kūjite 'pi gurubāṣpetyādyuktānubhāvānāṃ saṃyojana eva tanmayībhavanayukatyā tadutkaṇṭhāyāścarvaṇāgocaratvaṃ bhavati /
GK16andhvc1u:3443: na ca kevalenotkaśabdena tatpratipādanaṃ bhavati, tasya tāvatyaparyāptatvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:3444: sati ca pūrvavākye sotkaṇṭhāśabde tatsaṃgṛhītānāmanubhāvānāṃ sotkaṇṭhāsamānārthakotkaśabdena pratipādanaṃ bhavatīti sotkaṇṭhāśabdassaprayojana ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3449: yataśca svābhidhānamantareṇa kevalebhyo 'pi vibhāvādibhyo viśiṣṭebhyo rasādīnāṃ pratītiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3453: na hi yadabhāve 'pi yadbhavati tatkṛtaṃ taditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3462: evaṃ svaśabdena saha rasādervyatirekānvayābhāvamupapatyā pradarśya tathaivopasaṃharati-yataścetyādinā kathañcidityantena /
GK16andhvc1u:3463: abhidheyameva sāmarthyaṃ sahakāriśaktirūpaṃ vibhāvādikaṃ rasadhvanane śabdasya kartavye,
GK16andhvc1u:3464_1: cānumānavyatirikte dhvanane kartavye sāmarthyaṃ śaktiḥ viśiṣṭasamucito vācakasākalyamiti
GK16andhvc1u:3468: yena siddhavannirdeśa ityāśaṅkāṃ pariharan parābhimatasyaiva kāvyarūpatvaprasañjanābhiprāyeyamuktirityāha---tava mata ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3469: svaśabdakṛtā rasādipratītiḥ na vibhāvādikṛtetyasmin mate kāvyatvenānabhimatamapi kāvyamāpadyetetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3478: karmadhārayāśrayaṇena śabde yojayitvā ṣaṣṭītatpuruṣāśrayeṇārthe yojayati---abhidheyasya yetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3482: na tathā vibhāvādyartho rasaṃ janayatīti tadvilakṣṇatvamarthagatadhvananasya /
GK16andhvc1u:3486: guṇālaṅkārādiviśiṣṭena samucitena rasānuguṇena ca vācakena iti tṛtīyo 'pi prabhedo vācyādbhinna eveti sthitam /
GK16andhvc1u:3489: kāvyasyātmā sa evārthas tathā cādikaveḥ purā /
GK16andhvc1u:3497: yastvatrāpi tātparyaśaktimeva dhvananaṃ manyate, sa na vastutattvavedī /
GK16andhvc1u:3498: vibhāvānubhāvapratipādake hi vākye tātparyaśaktirbhede saṃsarge vā paryavasyet;
GK16andhvc1u:3499: na tu rasyamānatāsāre rase ityalaṃ bahunā /
GK16andhvc1u:3503: ivaśabdena vidyamāno 'pi kramo na saṃlakṣyata iti taddarśayati--agra iti /
GK16andhvc1u:3507: sa eveti pratīyamānamātre 'pi prakrānte tṛtīya eva rasadhvaniriti mantavyaṃ,
GK16andhvc1u:3519: gāmānayetyādau karmāntarebhyaḥ kriyāntarebhyaśca bhedo vākyārthaḥ, saṃsargastvārtha iti kecit /
GK16andhvc1u:3523: lakṣaṇanuktvā tasyātmatvapratipādikāyāḥ kārikāyāḥ kā saṅgatirityato vṛttānuvādapurassaraṃ tāṃ darśayati--evamityādinā /
GK16andhvc1u:3527: vyājaśabdena dhvanerātmatvapratipādana eva tātparyaṃ, netihāsopakṣepa iti darśitam /
GK16andhvc1u:3534: locanam tena rasa eva vastuta ātmā,
GK16andhvc1u:3535: vastvalaṅkāradhvanī tu sarvathā rasaṃ pratiparyavasyete iti vācyādutkṛṣṭau tāvityabhiprāyeṇa 'dhvaniḥ kāvyasyātme'ti sāmānyenoktam /
GK16andhvc1u:3537: krauñcasya dvandvaviyogena sahacarīhananodbhūtena sāhacaryadhvaṃsanenotthito yaḥ śokaḥ sthāyibhāvo nirapekṣabhāvatvādvipralambhaśṛṅgārocitaratisthāyibhāvādanya eva,
GK16andhvc1u:3562: krauñcetyādikaṃ vyākhyāya śokasya ślokatāprāptiṃ vivṛṇoti---sa evetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3563: krauñce tātasya śokasya vāsanārūpeṇādikavau sthitasya śokasya cābhedabuddhikṛtamaikyaṃ vivakṣitvā sa evetyuktam /
GK16andhvc1u:3572_3: prāptaḥ-- mā niṣāda pratiṣṭāṃ tvaṃmagamaḥ śāśvatīḥ samāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3575: na tu muneḥ śoka iti mantavyam /
GK16andhvc1u:3576: evaṃ hi sati tadduḥkhena so 'pi duḥkhita iti kṛtvā rasasyātmateti niravakāśaṃ bhavet /
GK16andhvc1u:3582: svasya carvayituścittasya yā dgutistanmayībhāvajanitā pulakādibhirlakṣyamāṇā tayā samāsvādyo manasānubhāvyaḥ sāraḥ prāṇo yasyāstām /
GK16andhvc1u:3583: kathamātmabhūtasya rasasya bahiḥślokatayā pariṇāma iti śaṅkāyāṃ dṛṣṭāntenottaramāha---rasetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3584: yathā jalaparipūrṇamaulisthakumbhoccalane tadgatajalaṃ bahiḥ prasravati, tathetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3590: na ca samayasavyapekṣapravṛttikasya śabdasya tadviṣayatvaṃ sambhavatītyāśaṅkāmanuvadan vyaṅgyatvena tadviṣayatvaṃ darśayati--samayānapekṣatve 'pītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3592: loke hi vilāpapraśaṃsādayo vacanaprakārāḥ śokabahumānarūpāṃ cittavṛttiṃ vyañjayantītyuktarītyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3598: samucitā eva śabdādayo rasādīn vyañjayantīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3599: ādikaveḥ ślokatvamāgata ityevaṃ vyākhyāyādikaveḥ śoka ityanvayabhramaṃ nirasyati---na tvityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3611: evamuktaprakāreṇa carvaṇocitaḥ śokasthāyibhāva evātmā yasya tathā bhūto yaḥ karuṇarasastasya vividhavācyavācakaracanāprapañjacāruṇaḥ kāvyasya sa evārthaḥ sārabhūtaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3612: locanam eva kāvyasyātmā sārabhūtasvabhāvo 'paraśāvdavailakṣaṇyakārakaḥ etadevoktaṃ hṛdayadarpaṇe--'yāvatpūrṇo na caitena tāvannaiva vamatyamum' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:3615: tena yadāha bhaṭṭanāyakaḥ-- śabdaprādhānyamāśritya tatra śāstraṃ pṛthagviduḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3622: vividhaṃ tattadabhivyañjanīyarasānuguṇyena vicitraṃ kṛtvā bālapriyā samuccalanaṃ bahiḥ prasaraṇaṃ svabhāvaḥ svarūpaṃ yasya 'mā niṣāde'tyādiślokasya tasya bhāvastatvaṃ tasmāt /
GK16andhvc1u:3625: yato 'mā niṣāde'tyādikāvyaṃ karuṇarasasamuccalanasvarūpamataḥ kāvyasya rasa evātmeti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3631: yāvanna pūrṇāḥ vibhāvāditanmayībhavanakrameṇa, tāvat amuṃ rasam /
GK16andhvc1u:3632: naiva vamati bahirbhāvamāpādya parāsvādanīyaṃ naiva karoti /
GK16andhvc1u:3634: kāvyarūpeṇa rasamudgiratīti rasavamanarūpasya kāvyasya rasarūpatvameveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3635: svena vilikhite 'mā niṣāde'tyādau 'agama' ityaḍāgamasya “namāṅyoga' iti niṣedhaśaṅkāyāmupapattimāha--agama ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3652: vividhaṃ vācyavācakaracanāsu prapañjena cāru iti vigrahamabhipretya vyācaṣṭe---tattadityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3655: tathā cādikarvarvālmīkeḥ nihatasahacarīvirahakātarakrauñcākrandajanitaḥ śoka eva ślokatayā pariṇataḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3656: locanam vācye vācake racanāyāṃ ca prapañcena yaccāru śabdārthālaṅkāraguṇayuktamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3657: tena sarvatrāpi dhvananasadbhāve 'pi na tathā vyavahāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3659: tenaitanniravakāśam; yaduktaṃ hṛdayadarpaṇe---'sarvatra tarhi kāvyavyavahāraḥ syāt' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:3663: kṛtvetyasya prapañcenetyanena, vācya ityāditrayasya cārvityanena ca sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3674: nanu nihatetyādiyathāśrutagranthena tadākrandajanito muneśśoka ityartha iva pagratīyate /
GK16andhvc1u:3678: nanu śokacarvaṇāto yadi śloka udbhūtastatpratīyamānaṃ vastu kāvyasyātmeti kuta ityāśaṅkyāha---śoko hīti /
GK16andhvc1u:3680: śoke hi sthāyibhāve ye vibhāvānubhāvāstatsamucitā cittavṛttiścarvyamāṇātmā rasa ityaucityātsthāyino rasatāpattirityucyate /
GK16andhvc1u:3681: prāksvasaṃviditaṃ paratrānumitaṃ ca cittavṛttijātaṃ bālapriyā pūrvaṃ tanniṣedha ityato vyācaṣṭe---carvaṇetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3683: śoka ityasya vāsanārūpeṇa sthito muneḥ śoka ityarthaśceti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3693: 'śokaḥ śloktvamāgataḥ' iti śokacarvaṇātaḥ ślokotpattivacanenaiva rasasyātmavaṃ prakāśitameva śokacarvaṇāgocarātmatvātkaruṇarasasyeti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3694: nanu kathamanyacarvaṇāyā anyo viṣayaḥ syādityata upapādayatiśoke hītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3699: śokādernimittabhūtā ye vibhāvāḥ kāryabhūtā ye anubhavāścetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3717: svānubhavasaṃskāraṃ svānumānasaṃskāraṃ cādhāya tābhyāṃ hṛdayasaṃvādamādadhānaṃ sadityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3720: locanam saṃskārakrameṇa hṛdayasaṃvādamāda dhānaṃ carvaṇāyāmupayujyate yataḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3721: nanu pratīyamānarūpamātmā tatra tribhedaṃ pratipāditaṃ na tu rasaikarūpam,
GK16andhvc1u:3724: bhāvagrahaṇena vyabhicāriṇo 'pi carvyamāṇasya tāvanmātrāviśrāntāvapi sthāyicarvaṇāparyavasānocitarasapratiṣṭāmanavāpyāpi prāṇatvaṃ bhavatītyuktam /
GK16andhvc1u:3725: yathā--- nakhaṃ nakhāgrema vighaṭṭayantī vivartayantī valayaṃ vilolam /
GK16andhvc1u:3728: rasabhāvaśabdena ca tadābhāsatatpraśamāvapi saṃgṛhītāveva; avāntaravaicitrye 'pi tadekarūpatvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:3747: stāyicarvaṇāyāṃ yatparyavasānaṃ tatpūrṇatākaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ tadeva ucitarasapratiṣṭā tāmaprāpyāpītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3753_1: cābhivyajyamānāyā lajjāyāḥ śṛṅgāraniṣṭāmanavāpya carvaṇāgocarībhavantyāḥ prāṇatvamityāha--atra lajjāyā iti /
GK16andhvc1u:3765: sarasvatī svādu tad-artha-vastu niḥṣyandamānā mahatāṃ kavīnām /
GK16andhvc1u:3768: sarasvatī svādu tadarthavastu niḥṣyandamānā mahatāṃ kavīnām /
GK16andhvc1u:3770_0: tat vastutattvaṃ niḥṣyandamānā mahatāṃ kavīnāṃ bhāratī alokasāmānyaṃ locanam evamitihāsamukhena
GK16andhvc1u:3774: yadāha bhaṭṭanāyakaḥ-- vāgdhenurdugdha etaṃ hi rasaṃ yadbālatṛṣṇāyā /
GK16andhvc1u:3775: bālapriyā athedamālocanīyaṃ sahṛdayaiḥ---śrīvālmīkinā “mā niṣāde“tyādiślokena ślokāntaraiśca sahacarasya puṃsa eva krauñcasya nihananaṃ nirdiṣṭam,
GK16andhvc1u:3777: sahacarīhananodbhūtene'ti 'nihatasahacarīti vibhāva ukta' iti ca vyākhyānena locanakṛtā,
GK16andhvc1u:3779: atra kecit--'nihate'tyādivṛttigranthasya 'nihataḥ sahacarīvirahakātaraḥ svata eva sahacarīvirahāsahiṣṇuśca yaḥ krauñca
GK16andhvc1u:3782: 'nihatasahacarīti vibhāva ukta' ityasya “nihatasahacarī“tyādigranthena vibhāvaḥ pradarśita ityarthaśceti na rāmāyaṇavacanavirodhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3807: bālatṛṣṇayā locanam tena nāsya ramaḥ sa syādduhyate yogibhirhi yaḥ // .//
GK16andhvc1u:3809: ata eva--- yaṃ sarvaśaulāḥ parikalpya vatsaṃ merau sthite dogdhari dohadakṣe /
GK16andhvc1u:3813: pratipattṝn prati sā pratibhā nānumīyamānā, api tu tadāveśena bhāsamānetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3819: tena tasmāddhetoḥ saḥ asya bālatṛṣṇayā prasnatasya rasasya,
GK16andhvc1u:3828: ata eva yato rasaparipūrṇāyāstadāveśaparavaśāyā dhenoḥ prasnavanaṃ prati svayaṃ kartṛtvaṃ, tata eva /
GK16andhvc1u:3829: hibhavataḥ vatsarūpasyeti yāvat. 'ata eva ityanena himavataḥ sārāgṣapātratvamuktam' iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3840_1: pratipattṝṇāṃ pratyakṣaviṣayaṃ karotīti kārikārtha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3848: yenāsminnativicitrakaviparamparāvāhini saṃsāre kālidāsaprabhṛtayo dvitrāḥ pañcaṣā vā mahākavaya iti gaṇyante /
GK16andhvc1u:3852: vedyate sa tu kāvyārtha-tattvajñair eva kevalam // DhvK_1.7 //
GK16andhvc1u:3857: yadi ca vācyarūpa locanam yadāha muniḥ---'kaverantargataṃ bhāvaṃ' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:3859: abhivyaktena sphuratā pratibhāviśeṣeṇa nimittena mahākavitvagaṇaneti yāvat // .6 // // .//
GK16andhvc1u:3863_0: vedyata bālapriyā rasāveśasya kāraṇabhūtaṃ yadvaiśadyaṃ rasāveśānabhimukhatvarāhityaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:3867: abivyaktena ata eva sphuratā pratipattṝṇāṃ pratyakṣaviṣayeṇa /
GK16andhvc1u:3873: tathā ca kārikā evāsāvarthaḥ syāttadvācyavāṭacakarūpaparijñānādeva tatpratītiḥ syāt /
GK16andhvc1u:3874: atha ca vācyavācakalakṣaṇamātrakṛtaśramāṇāṃ kāvyatattvārthabhāvanāvimukhānāṃ svaraśrutyādilakṣaṇamivāpragītānāṃ gāndharvalakṣaṇavidāmagocara evāsāvarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3876: na tu na vedyate, yena na syādasāviti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3877: kāvyasya tattvabhūto yo 'rthastasya bhāvanā vācyātirekeṇānavaratacarvaṇā tatra vimukhānām /
GK16andhvc1u:3879: śrutirnāma śabdasya vailakṣaṇyamātrakāri yadrūpāntaraṃ tatparimāṇā svaratadantarālobhayabhedakalpitā dvāviśatividhā /
GK16andhvc1u:3883: nyaṅgyārthabodhe tu sahṛdayatvādirūpā ca sāmagrī pūrvottarārdhābhyāṃ darśitā ceti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3884: vedane siddhe tatsāmagrīcintāvakāśa ityāśyena punarapi vedyata ityuktam, tadvyācaṣṭe---na tvityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:3896: kārikāyāṃ 'sa hī'tyatra sa tviti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3903: gītādiśabdaśravaṇe sati tasya śabdasya yadrūpāntaraṃ lavādikālāṃśaṃ nimittīkṛtya jāyate tadityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3905: tat parimāmaṃ kālapramāṇaṃ yasyāḥ setyarthaḥ. tanmātrakāleti yāvat /
GK16andhvc1u:3907: svaraḥ tasya svarasyāntarālamubhayamarthātpārśvadvayaṃ ca teṣāṃ yo bhedastatkalpitetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3914: śravaṇārthasya dhātoḥ ktin pratyaye śrūyanta iti vyutpattyā śrūtiśabdo niṣpannaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3915: atra nādāparaparyāyaśrutivibhāgaviṣaye bahavaḥ prakārā varttante---kecana dvāviṃśatiṃ śrutīrmanyante,
GK16andhvc1u:3918: ata evoktaṃ kohalena--- dvāviṃśatiṃ kecidudāharanti śrutīḥ śrutijñānavicāradakṣāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3922_0: etāsāṃ śrutīnāṃ mitho bhedaḥ--viṇādaṇḍe pūrvottarabāvena dvāviṃśatiṃ tantrīḥ parikalpya
GK16andhvc1u:3924: svataḥ sahakārikāraṇanirapekṣaṃ rañjayati śrotṛcittamanuraktaṃ karotīti svaraḥ, iti tadvyutpattiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3925: saptānāmapyamīṣāṃ svarāṇāṃ vyastānāṃ satāṃ dṛṣṭāddaṣṭaphalaupayikatvaṃ na bhavatīti tatsiddhaye grāmasyāvaśyakatā jāyate /
GK16andhvc1u:3930: tatraikasman vīṇādaṇḍe dvāviṃśatiṃ tantrīḥ parikalpaya āditasturīyāyāṃ tantryāṃ ṣaṅjasvaraḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:3936: dvāviṃśyāṃ niṣādaśceti svareṣu vinyasteṣu ṣaṅjagrāmo bhavati /
GK16andhvc1u:3944: dvāviśyāṃ gāndhāraśceti vinyasteṣu svareṣu madhyamagrāmo bhavati /
GK16andhvc1u:3948: gāndhāraniṣādau dvābhyāmutpannau; madhyamagrāme ca madhyamadhaivataṣaṅjāḥ catasṛbhya utpannāḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:3950: niṣādagandhārau dvābhyāmutpannāvita dvaigrāmikyo dvāviṃśyaḥ śrutayaḥ svaratadantarālobhayabhedakalpitāḥ siddhāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3960: evaṃ vācyavyatirekiṇo vyaṅgyasya sadbhāvaṃ pratipādya prādhānyaṃ tasyaiveti darśayati--- locanam mārgā gṛhyante /
GK16andhvc1u:3961: prakṛṣṭaṃ gītaṃ gānaṃ yeṣāṃ te pragītāḥ, gātuṃ vā prārabdhā ityādikarmaṇiktaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3973: yatnataḥ pratyabhijñeyau tau śabdārthau mahākaveḥ // DhvK_1.8 //
GK16andhvc1u:3980: sarvo hi tathā yatate itīyatā prādhānye lokasiddhatvaṃ pramāṇamuktam /
GK16andhvc1u:3982: pratyabhijñeyaśabdenedamāha--- 'kāvyaṃ tu jātu jāyeta kasthacitpratibhāvataḥ' iti nayena yadyapi svayamasyaitatparisphurati,
GK16andhvc1u:3996: 'sahṛdayaiḥ so 'rthaḥ tathāvidhaḥ śabdasca mahākavestau śabdārtho yatnataḥ pratyabhijñeyāvi'ti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3998: etau mahākaveḥ tau tāddaśau śabdārthāvityākārakasahṛdayapratyabhijñānārhāvityartha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:3999: atha tau śabdārthau mahākaveḥ mahākavinā pratyabhijñeyāvityarthāntaraṃ ca grāhyamityāha---niyogetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4023: locanam yathoktamasmatparamagurubhiḥ śrīmadutpalapādaiḥ-- taistairapyupayācitairupanatastanvyāḥ sthito 'pyantike kānto lokasamāna evamaparijñāto na rantuṃ yathā /
GK16andhvc1u:4024: lokasyaiṣa tathānavekṣitaguṇaḥ svātmāpi viśveśvaro naivālaṃ nijavaibhavāya tadiyaṃ tatpratyabhijñoditā ḥ
GK16andhvc1u:4030: evaṃ vyaṅgyasyārthasya vyañjakasya śabdasya ca prādhānyaṃ vadatā vyaṅkyavyañjakabhāvasyāpi bālapriyā taistairiti /
GK16andhvc1u:4031: sāmānyato 'vagatasyāpīśvarasya viśeṣato 'vagamamantareṇa na phalaparyantībhāvalābha ityartapradarśanaparo 'yaṃ ślokaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4035: evamaparijñātaḥ yo mayā lokottarasaundaryādiguṇaviśiṣṭatvena śrutastata eva rāgātiśayena prarthitasca sa kānto 'yamiti viśeṣeṇājñātaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4045: tasmāt svataḥ sphuritayorapi śabdārthayoḥ mahākavinā yuktameva pratyabhijñānakaraṇamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4046: tarhi ko 'tra pratyabhijñāpadārtha ityata uktaphalatayā tatsvrūpamāha---tenetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4049: vṛttau 'mahākavestau śabdārthau sahṛdayaiḥ pratyabhijñeyāvi'viti 'tāveva śabdārthau mahākaveḥ pratyabhijñeyāvi'ti ca yojanā bodhyā /
GK16andhvc1u:4050: mahākavinā pratyabhijñeyāvi'viti 'tāveva śabdārthau mahākaveḥ pratyabhijñetyāvi'ti ca yojanā bodhyā /
GK16andhvc1u:4056: dhvaniriti idānīṃ vyaṅgyavyañjakayoḥ prādhānye 'pi yadvācyavācakāveva prathamamupādadate kavayastadapi yuktamevetyāha--
GK16andhvc1u:4059: tad-upāyatayā tadvad arthe vācye tad-ādṛtaḥ // DhvK_1.9 //
GK16andhvc1u:4063: yathā hyālokārthī sannapi dīpaśikhāyāṃ yatnavāñjano bhavati tadupāyatayā /
GK16andhvc1u:4065: tadvadyvaṅgyamarthaṃ pratyāddato jano vācye 'rthe yatnavān bhavati /
GK16andhvc1u:4066: locanam prādhānyamuktamiti dhvanati dhvanyate dhvananamiti tritayamapyupapannamityuktam // .8 // // .//
GK16andhvc1u:4067_1: prathamamupādānaṃ bhavatītyabhiprāyema viruddho 'yaṃ prādhānye sādhye heturiti darśayati--idānīmityādinā /
GK16andhvc1u:4075: prathamopādīyamānatvahetoḥ ko doṣa ityataḥ so 'pi darśita ityāha---upāyānāmevetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4084: anena pratipādakasya kavervyaṅgyamarthaṃ prati vyāpāro darśitaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4092: yathā hi padārthadvāreṇa vākyārthāvagamastathā vācyārthapratītipūrvikā vyaṅgyasyārthasya pratipattiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4095: anena ślokenātyantasahṛdayo yo na bhavati tasyaiṣa sphuṭasaṃvedya eva kramaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4096: yathātyantaśabdavṛttajño yo na bhavati tasya padārthavākyārthakramaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4097: kāṣṭāprāptasahṛdayabhāvasta tu vākyavṛttakuśalasyeva sannapi kramo 'bhyastānumānāvinābhāvasmṛtyādivadasaṃvedya iti darśitam // .10 // // .//
GK16andhvc1u:4124: abhyaste viṣaye anumānamanumitiḥ avinābhāvasmṛtiḥ vyāptismṛtiḥ tayoḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4127: idānīṃ vācyārthapratītipūrvakatve 'pi tatpratītervyaṅgyasyārthasya prādhānyaṃ yathā na vyālupyate tathā darśayati---
GK16andhvc1u:4130: yathā vyāpāra-niṣpattau padārtho na vibhāvyate // DhvK_1.11 //
GK16andhvc1u:4135: prādhānyādeva tatparyantānusaraṇaraṇaraṇakatvaritā madhye viśrānti na kurvata iti kramasya sāto 'pyalakṣaṇaṃ prādhānye hetuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4148: tatra raṇaraṇakena autsukyena tvaritāḥ santa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4152: tathā ca kā kathā kramaparyālocanāyāmiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4155: 'svasāmarthye'tyasya svasya padārthasya yat sāmarthyaṃ sahakārītyarthābhiprāyeṇa vivṛṇoti--ākāṅkṣetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4156: kārikāyāṃ 'vyāpāraniṣpattā'viti svavyāpārasya vākyārthapratipādanarūpasya niṣpattau satyāṃ vākyārthabuddhāvityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4160: vibhāvanamātraniṣedhena yathā svasāmarthyavaśenaiva vākyārthaṃ prakāśayannapi padārtho vyāpāraniṣpattau na bhāvyate vibhaktatayā /
GK16andhvc1u:4168: anena vidyamāna eva kramo na saṃvedyata ityuktam /
GK16andhvc1u:4169: tena yatsphoṭābhiprāyeṇāsanneva krama iti vyācakṣate tatpratyuta viruddhameva /
GK16andhvc1u:4170: vācye 'rthe vimukho viśrāntinibandhanaṃ paritoṣamalabhamāna ātmā hṛdayaṃ yeṣāmityanena sacetasāmityasyaivārtho 'bhivyaktaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4171: sahṛdayānāmeva tarhyayaṃ mahimāstu, na tu kāvyasyāsau kaścidatiśaya ityāśaṅkyāha-avabhāsata iti /
GK16andhvc1u:4172: tenātra vibhaktatayā na bhāsate, na tu vācyasya sarvathaivānavabhāsaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4173: ata eva tṛtīyoddyote ghaṭapradīpaddaṣṭāntabalādvyaṅgyapratītikāle 'pi vācyapratītirna vighaṭata iti yadvakṣyati tena sahāsya granthasya na virodhaḥ // 11//
GK16andhvc1u:4192: tarhyanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ tadbuddhereva taddhetutvātsahṛdayānāmeva lorottaraḥ kaścidatiśayo 'yaṃ na kāvyasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4205: na bhāsata iti vyaṅgyo 'rtha iti śeṣaḥ ; yena kramo lakṣyeta iti vyācakṣate /
GK16andhvc1u:4209: evaṃ vācyavyatirekiṇo vyaṅgyasyārthasya sadbhāvaṃ pratipādya prakṛta upayojayannāha---
GK16andhvc1u:4211: yatrārthaḥ śabdo vā tam artham upasarjanīkṛta-svārthau /
GK16andhvc1u:4212: vyaṅktaḥ kāvya-viśeṣaḥ sa dhvanir iti sūribhiḥ kathitaḥ // DhvK_1.13 //
GK16andhvc1u:4215: vyaṅktaḥ kāvyaviśeṣaḥ sa dhvaniriti sūribhiḥ kathitaḥ // 13 //
GK16andhvc1u:4223: svaścārthaśca tau svārthau; tau guṇīkṛttau yābhyām; yathāsaṃkhyena tenārtho guṇīkṛtātmā,
GK16andhvc1u:4226: 'sarasvatī svādu tadarthavastu' bālapriyā na virodha iti /
GK16andhvc1u:4237: vyaṅgyasya sadbhāve siddhavi siddha eva tamarithamiti tatpadena parāmarśo yujyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4242: yatrārtho vācyaviśeṣaḥ vācakaviśeṣaḥ śabdo vā tamarthaṃ vyaṅktaḥ, sa kāvyaviśeṣo dhvaniriti /
GK16andhvc1u:4243: anena vācyavācakacārutvahetubhya upamādibhyo 'nuprāsādibhyaśca locanam iti yaduktam /
GK16andhvc1u:4245: vyaṅkta iti dvivacanenadamāha--yadyapyavivakṣitavācye śabda eva vyañjakastathāpyarthasyāpi sahakāritā na truṭyati,
GK16andhvc1u:4248: viśiṣṭaśabdābhidheyatayā vinā tasyārthasyāvyañjakatvāditi sarvatra śabdārthayorubhayorapi dhvananaṃ vyāpāraḥ /
