GK16andhvc1u:4250: arthaḥ śabdo veti tu vikalpābhidhānaṃ prādhānyābhiprāyema /
GK16andhvc1u:4251: kāvyaṃ ca tadviśeṣaścāsau kāvyasya vā viśeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4253: bālapriyā nanvekaikatra śabdārthayorekaikasyaiva vyañjakatvāt vyaṅkta iti dvivacanamanupapannamityata āha--dvivacanenetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4260: yathā gajasyākṣinimīlanaṃ na buddhipūrvakamapi tu svabhāvata evetyavicāro gajanimīlikāśabdena lakṣyate /
GK16andhvc1u:4261: nanu yadi samuccayastarhi 'arthaśabdāvi'ti bhāvyamityata āha--artha ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4264: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ---vākāro 'tra śabdārthayoḥ vyañjanakriyākarttṛtve vikalpasya na bodhakaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:4265: yena “śiraśśvā kāko vā dgupadatanayo vā parimṛśe“dityādāvivaikavacanaṃ bhavet,
GK16andhvc1u:4266: āpi tu vyañjanakriyāyāṃ kartṛtvenānvitayoḥ śabdārthayoḥ vyañjanaprādhānye vikalpamavagamayati /
GK16andhvc1u:4267: tathā ca vikalpitavyañjanaprādhānyau śabdārthau vyaṅkta iti vākyārtha iti /
GK16andhvc1u:4271: 'yo dhvanilakṣaṇa ātmā sa tathāvidhaśabdārthapṛṣṭapātīti kāvyagrahaṇāduktam' iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4274: yaccoktam--'cārutvapratītistarhi kāvyasyātmā syāt' iti tadaṅgīkurma eva /
GK16andhvc1u:4276: yaccoktam---'cāruṇaḥ pratītiryadi kāvyātmā pratyakṣādipramāṇādapi sā bhavantī tathā syāt' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:4277: tatra śabdārthamayakāvyātmābhidhānaprastāve ka eṣa prasaṅga iti na kiñcidetat /
GK16andhvc1u:4279: artho vā śabdo vā, vyāpāro vā /
GK16andhvc1u:4281: vyaṅgyo vā dhvanyata iti vyāpāro vā bālapriyā teneti /
GK16andhvc1u:4284: 'pono devadatto divā na bhuṅkta' ityādau rātribhojanādergamyatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4286: yadi cārutvahetutayā prāsiddhebhyo guṇādibhyo 'nyaḥ kāvyātmā syāttarhi cārutvapratītireva tadātmāstu,
GK16andhvc1u:4287: tasyāḥ dṛṣṭatvenāddaṣṭavastvantarakalpane gauravāditi tadatirikto na dhvanirityākṣepaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4290: cārutvapratītirityasya cārutvapratīterviṣayo heturvā kaścidguṇādibhyo 'nya ityarthasya vaktavyatayā dhvanināmnyena vivāda ityartaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4297: prakaraṇānabhijño 'sau pūrvaṃpakṣī, ata upekṣya iti pariharati---tatretyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4310: yato lakṣaṇakṛtāmeva sa kevalaṃ na prasiddhaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:4311: lakṣye tu parīkṣyamāṇe sa eva sahṛdayahṛdayāhlādakāri kāvyatattvam /
GK16andhvc1u:4313: kārikayā tu prādhānyena samudāya eva kāvyarūpo mukhyatayā dhvaniriti pratipāditam /
GK16andhvc1u:4319: lakṣaṇakārāprasiddhatāviruddho hetuḥ; tata eva hi yatnena lakṣaṇīyatā /
GK16andhvc1u:4325: tathāca saḥ tathāvidhaḥ śabdavācyavyaṅgyavyañjanasamudāyātmakaḥ kāvyaviśeṣo dhvaniriti kathitaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4336: uktārthopapādanāya 'viśeṣeṇa sinoti badhnāti svasambandhinaṃ padārtham' iti vyutpattimabhipretya viṣayaśabdasyārthamāha--ananyatra bhāva iti /
GK16andhvc1u:4339: 'dhvanerviṣaya' ityasya yasamādanyatra dhvanivyavahārasya sadbhāvo nāsti, sa ityartha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4340: lakṣaṇapratipādanenaiva prathamābhāvavādimataṃ nirākṛtamityabhiprāyeṇa vṛttikṛto 'yadapyuktam' ityādinā dvitīyābhāvavādimatadūṣaṇābhidhānamiti pradarśayitumāha--evamityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4344_0: ghnanirnāma kāvyaprakāro na kāvyaśabdavācyaḥ prasiddhaprasthānātikrāmitvāditi paramatasya
GK16andhvc1u:4344_2: vā vivakṣitamiti vikalpamabhipretya yata ityādinā dūṣaṇamabhihitamiti vyācaṣṭe---lakṣaṇetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4351: vācyavācakamātrāśrayiṇi prasthāne vyaṅgyavyañjakasamāśrayema vyavasthitasya dhvaneḥ kathamantarbhāvaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:4356: locana.m yacca nuttagītādikalpaṃ, tatkāvyasya na kiñjit /
GK16andhvc1u:4365: bālapriyā guṇādivyatiriktasya tasya nṛttādiprāyatvameveti yaduktaṃ tadapi nirākaroti--yaccetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4372: gauṇo vā kāvyasya citrapadena vyavahāra ityāha--kāvyetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4375: viṣṇavādyanukāritvamālekhyamātratvaṃ kalārūpatvaṃ ca lokaprasiddhacitrāṇāmastīti tadyogātkāvye citraśabdapravṛttirityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4386: nanu yatra pratiyamānasyārthasya vaiśadyenāpratītiḥ sa nāma mā bhūddhvanerviṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4392: guṇīkṛtābhidheyaḥ śabdo vā yatrārthāntaramabhivyanakti sa dhvaniriti /
GK16andhvc1u:4397: abhihitamiti bhūtaprayoga ādau vyaṅkta ityasya vyākhyātatvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:4402: prādhānyaṃ ca yadyapi jñaptau na cakāsti;
GK16andhvc1u:4404: tathāpi vivecakairjīvitānveṣaṇe kriyamāṇe yadā vyaṅgyo 'rthaḥ punarapi vācyamevānuprāṇayannāste tadā tadupakaraṇatvādeva tasyālaṅkāratā /
GK16andhvc1u:4407: tathāpi madhyakakṣāniviṣṭo 'sau vyahgyo 'rtho bālapriyā kārikāyāmanuktasyādhikasyāpekṣitasyārthasyāvāpaḥ prakṣepaḥ taṃ kartumityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4417: tadrahito 'khaṇḍastāddaśasya vākyārthībhūtasya rasādivyaṅgyasya carvaṇāyāṃ viśrānteḥ sahṛdayamanasāṃ viśrānterityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4422: yaḥ pūrvaṃ vācyāduttīrmastadvyaṅgyatvātsakakṣyāntarahgato 'pi punaḥ pūrvabhāvirnī vācyakakṣyāṃ praviśya vācyamevānuprāṇayanyadā āste ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4435: yadā punarvyaṅgyo 'rtho vācyenopaskṛtaḥ kāvyamanuprāṇaṭayannāste tadā tasmāccamatkāralābha ityanenārthāt sidhyati /
GK16andhvc1u:4439: samāsoktau tāvat---- upoḍharāgema vilolatārakaṃ tathā gṛhītaṃ śaśinā niśāmukham /
GK16andhvc1u:4440: yathā samastaṃ timiśaṃśukaṃ tayā puro 'pi rāgādgalitaṃ na lakṣitam //
GK16andhvc1u:4441: ityāda.u vyaṅgyenānugataṃ vācyameva prādhānyena pratīyate locanam na rasonmukhībhavati;
GK16andhvc1u:4442: svātantryeṇāpi tu vācyamevārtha saṃskartuṃ dhāvatīti guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatokta /
GK16andhvc1u:4446: ityatra samāsokterlakṣaṇasvarūpaṃ hetirnāma tannirvacanamiti pādacatuṣṭayena kramāduktam /
GK16andhvc1u:4457: rāgādraktatvāt sandhyākṛtādanantaraṃ premarūpācca bālapriyā prathamāvācyasya dvitīyā vastuvyaṅgyasya tṛtīyā rasadhvaneśca kakṣeti sthitiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4463: atra niśāśaśivṛttāntaḥ prākāraṇikatvādvācyo nāyakavṛttāntastvaprākaraṇikatvādvyaṅgya ityabhipretya samānaviśeṣaṇatvaṃ vivṛṇoti--upoḍha ityādinā /
GK16andhvc1u:4486: rātryā karaṇabhūtayā samastaṃ miśritam; upalakṣaṇatvena vā /
GK16andhvc1u:4488: timirasaṃvalitāṃśudarśane hi rātrimukhamiti lokena lakṣyate na tu sphuṭa āloke /
GK16andhvc1u:4491: atra ca nāyakena paścādgatena cumbanopakrame puro nīlāṃśukasya galanaṃ patanam /
GK16andhvc1u:4492: yadi vā 'puro 'gre nāyakena tathā gṛhītaṃ mukham' iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4494: tathāhi nāyakavyavahāro niśāśaśināveva śṛṅgāravibhāvarūpau saṃskurvāṇo 'laṅkāratāṃ bhajate,
GK16andhvc1u:4497: na cācetanāyāḥ kartṛtvamupapannamiti śabdenaivātra nāyakavyavahāra unnīto 'bhidhadheya eva,
GK16andhvc1u:4498: na vyaṅgya ityata eva samāsoktiḥ' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:4503: bālapriyā timirasya sūkṣmāṃśūnāṃ ca sammiśraṇaṃ prati rātryāḥ karamatvasambhavāttayeti karaṇe tṛtīyetyāha---karaṇabhūtayeti /
GK16andhvc1u:4504: tanmiśraṇaṃ prati rātryāḥ jñāpakatvarūpopalakṣaṇatvasambhavāt tayetyupalakṣaṇe tṛtīyā vetyāha-upalakṣaṇatvena veti /
GK16andhvc1u:4512: ata eva na labhitamiti hetuhetumadbhāvaṃ bodhayitumāha---timiretyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4526: evaṃ vyaṅgyasya guṇībhūtatvaṃ pradarśya rasāpekṣyā dhvanitvamapyastīti darśayintumāha--tata ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4543: ākṣepe 'pi vyaṅgyaviseṣākṣepiṇo 'pi vācyasyaiva cārutvaṃ prādhānyena vākyārtha ākṣepoktisāmarthyādeva jñāyate /
GK16andhvc1u:4544: tathāhi-tatra śabdopārūḍho viśeṣābhidhānecchayā pratiṣeṣa locanam gamyata iti cānenābhidhāvyāpāranirāsādityalamavāntareṇa bahunā /
GK16andhvc1u:4545: nāyikāyā nāyake yo vyavahāraḥ sa niśāyāṃ samāropitaḥ;
GK16andhvc1u:4546: nāyikāyāṃ nāyakasya yo vyavahāraḥ sa śaśini samāropita iti vyākhyāne naikaśeṣaprasaṅgaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4550: tatrādya.u yathā--- ahaṃ tvāṃ yadi nekṣeya kṣaṇamapyutsukā tataḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4552: bālapriyā ityuktyanuguṇatayā rājahaṃsānāṃ cāmaratvaṃ śaradaścāmaragrāhiṇītvaṃ cārthāt sidhyati,
GK16andhvc1u:4553: tathā prakṛte timirāṃśukapadānuguṇatayā niśādernāyikātvādikamata ekadeśavivartirūpakaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4566: evaṃ samāsoktau vyaṅgyopaskṛtaṃ vācyameva pradhānamatastatra dhvanilakṣaṇasya nātivyāptiriti pradarśyākṣepe 'pi sa eva prakāra ityāha vṛtto-'ākṣepe 'pī' tyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:4567: ākṣepe 'pi 'vācyasyaiva cārutvaṃ, prādhānyena jñāyata' iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4569: vākyārthe viṣaye yā ākṣepoktiḥ, tasyāḥ sāmarthyādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4577: pratiṣedha iva locanam iti vakṣyamāṇamaraṇaviṣayo niṣedhātmākṣepaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4579: uktaviṣayastu yathā mamaiva--- bho bhoḥ kiṃ kimakāṇḍa eva patitastvaṃ pāntha kānyā gatiḥ tattāddaktṛṣitasya me khalamatiḥ so 'yaṃ jalaṃ gūhate /
GK16andhvc1u:4580: asthānopanatāmakālasulabhāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ prati krudhya bhoḥ trailokyaprathitaprabhāvamihimā mārgaḥ punarmāravaḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:4588: utsukāhaṃ tvāṃ kṣaṇamapi na tar ikṣeya yadi, tataḥ tarhi iyadetāvat yadiparyantaṃ vacanameva astu /
GK16andhvc1u:4605: bho bho iti vīpsayā bodhanīyaṃ pratyādarātiśayo dyotyate /
GK16andhvc1u:4608: kiṃ kiṃ patitaḥ atrāgamanena etatsevanena cābhimataṃ phalaṃ na sidhyatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4610: cirasevinā kenacidevamukte pānthaḥ kiñcit kupita āha---kānyetyādi khaletyantena /
GK16andhvc1u:4612: tattādṛgatiśayena tṛṣitasya tṛṣā jalapipāsā dhanalipsā ca /
GK16andhvc1u:4620: 'khalamatisso 'yam' iti pāṭhe tu so 'yamiti māravamārgaṃ prabhuṃ coddiśyoktiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4623: akālasulabhāṃ yadā viṣayasya sulabhatvaṃ tadā tṛṣṇā na bhavati,
GK16andhvc1u:4625: tṛṣṇāṃ prati tava tṛṣṇāyai krudhya na māṃ pratīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4628: māravaḥ marusambandhī mārgaḥ, atha ca duṣprabhuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4629: locanam atra kaścitsevakaḥ prāptaḥ prāptavyamasmātkimiti na labha iti pratyāśāviśasyamānahṛdayaḥ kenacidamunākṣepeṇa pratibodhyate /
GK16andhvc1u:4632: upamānasya candrāderākṣepaḥ; asminsati kiṃ tvayā kṛtyamiti /
GK16andhvc1u:4633: yathā--- tasyāstanmukhamasti saumyasubhagaṃ kiṃ pārvaṇenenḍhunā saundaryasya padaṃ dṛśau yadi ca taiḥ kiṃ nāma nīlotpalaiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4642: na labhe iti vitarkānantarajātayā pratyāśayā pratikṣaṇotpannayā āśayā viśasyamānaṃ hṛdayaṃ yasya sa iti pratibodhane hetuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4644: amunā ākṣepeṇa asatpuruṣasevātadvaiphalyādirūpavyaṅgyaviśeṣapratipipādayiṣayā kṛtena kiṃ kimakāṇḍa eva patita iti niṣedharūpeṇa /
GK16andhvc1u:4660: kiṃ kimakāṇḍa eva patita itīṣṭapatanaphalaniṣedharūpākṣepemākṣepyaṃ yadasatpuruṣasevāvaiphalyādi tenālaṅkṛtamākṣepakaṃ tadvācyameva pradhānamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4661: “prāṇā yena samarpitā” ityādivadatrāprastutapraśaṃsāpyastīti tatsaṅkīrṇo 'yamākṣepa ityapi bodhyam /
GK16andhvc1u:4678: rūpo ya ākṣepaḥ sa eva vyaṅgyaviśeṣamākṣipanmukhyaṃ kāvyaśarīram /
GK16andhvc1u:4681: locanam kiṃ vā komalakāntibhiḥ kisalayaiḥ satyeva tatrādhare hī dhātuḥ punaruktavasturacanārambheṣvapūrvā grahaḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:4683: kiṃ tena kṛtyamiti tvapahastanārūpa ākṣepo vācya eva camatkārakāraṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:4692: punaruktānāmanupādeyānāṃ niṣphalānāṃ vastūnāṃ pārvaṇacandrādīnāṃ racanāyāṃ sṛṣṭau viṣaye ye ārambhā vyāpārāḥ teṣu /
GK16andhvc1u:4699: 'iti vācya ākṣepa eva camatkārakāraṇam' iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4707: śaratkāle hi candrasya prasādātiśayo ravitāpādhikyaṃ ca /
GK16andhvc1u:4714: nāyikāpakṣe nakhakṣatasthatayā śrutamapyupamānatvamaindre dhanuṣiyojanīyamindracāpābhaṃ nakakṣataṃ dadhānetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4724: tatpurassaraḥ tasyāḥsa purassaraḥ pūrvakāle sammukhaṃ ca saranniti dvayorarthayoradhyavasāyenaikyaṃ bodhyamata evāho ityādeparupapattiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4727: ddaṣṭāntoktitayā aho daivagatiḥ kīddaktathāpi na samāgamaḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:4728: atra satyāmapi vyaṅgyapratītau vācyasyaiva cārutvamutkarṣavaditi tasyaiva prādhānyavivakṣā /
GK16andhvc1u:4729: yathā ca dīpakāpahnutyādau vyaṅgyatvenopamāyāḥ pratītāvapi prādhānyenāvivikṣitatvānna tayā vyapadeśastadvadatrāpi draṣṭavyam /
GK16andhvc1u:4736: bhāmahābhiprāyeṇa tu samāsoktirityamumāśayaṃ hṛdaye gṛhītvā samāsoktyakṣepayoḥ yuktyedamekamevodāharaṇaṃ vyataradgranthakṛt /
GK16andhvc1u:4738: sarvathālaṅkāreṣu vyaṅgyaṃ vācye guṇībhavatīti naḥ sādhyamityatrāśayo 'tra granthe 'smadgurubhirnirūpitaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4739: evaṃ prādhānyavivakṣāyāṃ dṛṣṭāntamuktvā vyapadeśo 'pi prādhānyakṛta eva bhavatītyatra dṛṣṭāntaṃ svaparaprasiddhamāha---yathā ceti /
GK16andhvc1u:4743: dīpake hi 'ādimadhyāntaviṣayaṃ tridhā dīpakamiṣyate' iti lakṣaṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:4744: maṇiḥ śāṇollīḍhaḥ samaravijayī hetidalitaḥ kalāśeṣaścandra suratamṛditā bālalanā /
GK16andhvc1u:4745: madakṣīṇo nāgaḥ śaradi saridāśyānapulinā tanimnā śobhante galitavibhavāścārthiṣu janāḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:4766: yathā--- neyaṃ virauti bhṛṅgālī madena mukharā muhuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4772: yathā--- sa ekastrīṇi jayati jaganti kusumāyudhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4773: haratāpi tanuṃ yasya śambhunā na hṛtaṃ balam //
GK16andhvc1u:4775: uktanimittāyāmapi vastusvabhāvamātratve paryavasānamiti tatrāpi na vyaṅgyasadbhāvaśaṅkā /
GK16andhvc1u:4776: yathā--- karpūra iva dagdho 'pi śaktimānyo jane jane /
GK16andhvc1u:4808: tatra ca yatkiñcinnimittaṃ bhavet, parantu tadacintyamityāha---iyañceti /
GK16andhvc1u:4814: yasmādukte prakāradvaye vyaṅyasadbhāvo anuktanimittāyāmapi viśeṣoktau---- āhūto 'pi sahāyaiḥ omityuktvā vimuktanidro 'pi /
GK16andhvc1u:4815: gantumanā api pathikaḥ saṅkocaṃ naiva śithilayati //
GK16andhvc1u:4817: na tu tatpratītinimittā locanam tena prakāradvayamavadhīrya tṛtīyaṃ prakāramāśaṅkate--anuktanimittāyāmapīti /
GK16andhvc1u:4821_0: yattu rasikairapi nimittaṃ kalpitam-'kāntāsamāgame gamanādapi laghutaramupāyaṃ svapnaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:4821_1: manyamāno nidrāgamabuddhyā saṅkocaṃ nātyajat' iti tadapi nimittaṃ cārutvahetutayā
GK16andhvc1u:4822: api tu viśeṣoktibhāga eva na śithilayatītyevambhūto 'bhivyajyamānanimittopaskṛtaścārutvahetuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4824: evamabhiprāyadvayamapi sādhāraṇoktyā granthakṛnnyarūpayanna tvaudbhaṭenaivābhiprāyeṇa grantho vyavasthita iti mantavyam /
GK16andhvc1u:4862: paryāyokte 'pi yadi prādhānyena vyaṅgyatvaṃ tadbhavatu nāma tasya dhvanāvantarbhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4865: locanam atra bhīṣmasya bhārgavaprabhāvabhibhāvī prabhāva iti yadyapi pratīyate,
GK16andhvc1u:4867: ata eva paryāyeṇa prakārāntareṇāvagamātmanā vyaṅgyenopalakṣitaṃ sadyadabhidhīyate tadabhidhīyamānamuktameva satparyāyoktamityabhidhīyata itilakṣaṇapadam,
GK16andhvc1u:4870: yadi tvabhidhīyata ityasya balādyvakhyānamabhidhīyate pratīyate pradānatayeti,
GK16andhvc1u:4886: 'ata eva iti sarvaṃ yujyata' iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4887: vyaṅgyasya prādhānye sarvametadanupapannaṃ bhavedato vācyasyaiva prādhānyamabhyupeyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4899: anena lakṣaṇavākyenaiva vyaṅgyānugatasya vācyasya prādhānyaṃ gamyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4915: prādhānavyaṅgyānāṃ na punaḥ paryāyokte bhāmahodāhṛtasaddaśe vyaṅgyasyaiva prādhānyam /
GK16andhvc1u:4917: apahnutidīpakayoḥ punarvācyasya locanam yāddaśo 'laṅkāratvena vivakṣitastāddaśe dhvanirnāntarbhavati,
GK16andhvc1u:4925: na ceyadapi prāktanairddaṣṭamapi tvasmābhirevonmīlitamiti darśayati-na punariti /
GK16andhvc1u:4926: bhāmahasya yāddaktadīyaṃ rūpabhimataṃ tāddagudāharaṇena darśatam. tatrāpi naiva vyaṅgyasya prādhānyaṃ cārutvāhetutvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:4927: tena tadanusāritayā tatsaddaśaṃ yadudāharaṇāntaramapi kalpyate tatra naiva vyaṅgyasya prādhānyamiti saṅgatiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4928: yadi tu taduktamudāharaṇamanāddataya 'bhama dhamm' ityādyudāhniyate, tadasmacchiṣyataiva /
GK16andhvc1u:4929: kevalaṃ tu nayamanavalambyāpaśravamenātmasaṃskāra ityanāryaceṣṭitam. yadāhuraitihā sikāḥ---'avajñayāpyavacchādya śṛṇvannarakamṛcchati' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:4930: bhāmahena hyudāhṛtam--- 'guheṣvadhvasu vā nānnaṃ bhuñjmahe yadadhītinaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4944: mātsaryagrahaṇātkevalaṃ paryāyoktavācā ayamasmannaya evāvalambyata iti yojanā /
GK16andhvc1u:4960: 'adhītinaḥ viprāḥ yadannaṃ na bhuñjate vayaṃ gṛheṣvadhvasu vā tadannaṃ na prādhānyaṃ vyaṅgyasya cānuyāyitvaṃ prasiddhameva /
GK16andhvc1u:4962: locanam etaddhi bhagavadvāsudevavacanaṃ paryāyema rasadānaṃ niṣedhati /
GK16andhvc1u:4964: na cāsya rasadānaniṣedhasya vyaṅgyasya kiñciccārutvamasti yena prādhānyaṃ śaṅgyeta /
GK16andhvc1u:4965: api tu tadyvaṅgyopodbalitaṃ viprabhojanena vinā yannabhojanaṃ tadevoktaprakāreṇa paryāyoktaṃ satprākaraṇikaṃ bhojanārthamalaṅkurute /
GK16andhvc1u:4966: na hyasya nirviṣaṃ bhojanaṃ bhavatviti vivakṣitamiti paryāyoktamalaṅkāra eveti cirantanānāmabhimata iti tātparyam /
GK16andhvc1u:4971_0: pūrvaṃ caitadupamādivyapadeśabhājanameva tadyathā na bhavatītyamuyā chāyayā dṛṣṭāntatayoktamapyuddeśakramapūraṇāya
GK16andhvc1u:4972: chāyāntarema vastu punarekamevopamāyā eva vyaṅgyatvena dhvanitvāśaṅkanāt /
GK16andhvc1u:4973: yattu vivaraṇakṛt---dīpakasya sarvatropamānvayo nāstīti bahunodāharaṇaprapañcenavicāritavāṃstadanupayogi nissāraṃ supratikṣepaṃ ca /
GK16andhvc1u:4983: bhojanaṃ nirviṣaṃ bhavatviti vā bhagavato 'bhiprāyassahṛdayānāṃ vyaṅgyo bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:4995: na vivakṣitaṃ caidyaṃ prata na bubodhayiṣitam /
GK16andhvc1u:4998: tīpakāpahnutyādāviti pūrvoktasyaivādyakathanena paunarukatyamityāśaṅkāyāṃ svarūpaikye 'pi prakārabhedānna paunaruktyamityāha---pūrvamityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5008: locanam sa priyāsaṅgamotkaṇṭhāṃ sāsahyāṃ manasaḥ śucam //
GK16andhvc1u:5012: tathā hi--- rāma iva daśaratho 'bhūddaśaratha iva radhurajo 'pi radhusaddaśaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5015: tasmātkramikatvaṃ samaṃ vā prākaraṇikatvamupamāṃ niruṃṇaddhīti ko 'yaṃ trāsa itlaṃ gardabhīdohānuvartanena /
GK16andhvc1u:5018: ekasya ca grahe nyāyadoṣābhāve ca saṅkaraḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:5023_0: atra śaśī vadanamasyāḥ tadvadvā vadanamasyā iti rūpakopamollekhādyugapaddvayāsambhavādekatarapakṣatyāgagrahaṇe
GK16andhvc1u:5024: yo 'pi dvitīyaḥ prakāraḥ---śabdārthālaṅkārāmāmekatrabhāva iti tatrāpi pratīyamānasya kā śaṅkā /
GK16andhvc1u:5025: yathā--smara smaramiva priyaṃ ramayase yamāliṅganāt iti /
GK16andhvc1u:5050: ko vyaṅgyaḥ ko vācya ityaniścayādvyaṅgyaprādānyakṛtadhvanitvasambhāvanāpi locanam atraiva yamakamupamā ca /
GK16andhvc1u:5051: tṛtīyaḥ prakāraḥ-- yatraikatra vākyāṃśe 'neko 'rthālaṅkārastatrāpi dvayoḥ sāmyātkasya vyaṅgyatā /
GK16andhvc1u:5063: tayā gṛhītaṃ nu mṛgāṅganābhyastato gahītaṃ nu mṛgāṅganābhiḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:5070: ekavākyavartanarūpaṃ saṅkaraṃ darśayitvā, ekavākyāṃśasamāveśarūpaṃ saṅkaraṃ darśayati--yatretyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5074: svāmino vipattau satyāṃ samucitaṃ yadvratagrahaṇa tatra hevākī udyuktaḥ yaḥ kulaputrakaḥ tadrūpaṇaṃ vāsaraviṣayakaṃ karma /
GK16andhvc1u:5076: bhāsvatassvāmitvamatastadgamanasya vipattitvaṃ guhānivāsasya vratagrahamatvaṃ tatpraveśasya tadarthavyāpāratvañca tamoguhāmiti śābdena rūpakeṇa gamyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5088: atha vācyopasarjanībhāvena vyaṅgyasya tatrāvasthānaṃ tadā locanam tadāha-yadālaṅkāra ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5091: ādye tu prakāre 'śaśivadane'tyādyudāhṛte kathañcidasti sambhāvanetyāśacaṅkya nirākaroti---alaṅkāradvayeti /
GK16andhvc1u:5094: nanu yatra vyaṅgyameva prādhānyena bhāti tatra kiṃ kartavyam /
GK16andhvc1u:5095: yathā--- hīi ṇa guṇāṇurāo khalāṇaṃ ṇavaraṃ pasiddhisaraṇāṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:5096: kira pahiṇusai sasimaṇaṃ cande piāmuhe diṭṭhe //
GK16andhvc1u:5100: saṅkarālaṅkāra bālapriyā asmiṃścaturthe bhede dhvanyabhāvaparatayā vṛttigranthamavatārayati---tadāheti /
GK16andhvc1u:5107: bhavati na guṇānurāgaḥ khalānāṃ kevalaṃ prasiddhiśaraṇānām /
GK16andhvc1u:5108: kila prasnaiti śaśimaṇiḥ candre na priyāmukhe dṛṣṭe //
GK16andhvc1u:5114: 'śaśimaṇiḥ candre dṛṣṭe prasnauti kila; priyāmukhe dṛṣṭe na prasnautī'tyānvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5115: yadi śasimaṇergumānurāgassyāttadā priyāmukhadarśane kathaṃ na niḥṣyandeteti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5117: candraḥ priyāmukhameva candra ityarthasya khyāpanādapahnutiśceti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5122: na tu sa eva dhvaniriti vaktuṃ śakyam /
GK16andhvc1u:5124: api ca saṅkarālaṅkāre 'pi ca kvacit saṅkaroktireva locanam evāyaṃ na bhavati,
GK16andhvc1u:5127: atha sarveṣu saṅkaraprabhedeṣu vyaṅgyasambhāvanānirāsaprakāraṃ sādhāraṇamāha---api ceti /
GK16andhvc1u:5129: saṅkīrmatā hi miśratvaṃ lolībhāvaḥ, tatra kathamekasya prādhānyaṃ kṣīrajalavat /
GK16andhvc1u:5134: tatra prathame prakāradvaye prastutāprastutayostulyameva prādhānyamiti pratijñāṃ karoti-aprastutetyādinā prādhānyamityantena /
GK16andhvc1u:5136: gamyate tu prākaraṇiko viśeṣaḥ sa ekaḥ prakāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5139: atra hi daivaprādhānyaṃ sarvatra sāmānyarūpamaprastutaṃ varṇitaṃ satprakṛte vastuni kvāpi vinaṣṭe viśeṣātmani paryavasyati /
GK16andhvc1u:5142: yadā tu viseṣo 'prākaramikaḥ prākaraṇikaṃ sāmānyamākṣipati tadā dvitīyaḥ bālapriyā tatkathamityatrāha--saṅkīrṇateti /
GK16andhvc1u:5166_1: sambandhastadā viśeṣapratītau satyāmapi prādhānyena tatsāmānyenāvinābhāvātsāmānyasyāpi prādhānyam /
GK16andhvc1u:5167: yadāpi viśeṣasya sāmānyaniṣṭhatvaṃ tadāpi sāmānyasya prādhānye sāmanye sarvaviśeṣāṇāmantarbhāvādviśeṣasyāpi prādhānyam /
GK16andhvc1u:5169: yathā--- etattasya mukhātkiyattakamalinīpattre kaṇaṃ pārthaso yanmuktāmaṇirityamaṃsta sa jaḍaḥ śṛṇvanyadasmādapi /
GK16andhvc1u:5170: aṅgulyagralaghukriyāpravilayinyādīyamāne śanai. statroṅḍīya gato hahetyanudinaṃ nidrāti nāntaḥ śucā //
GK16andhvc1u:5172: prastutaṃ tu jalabindau maṇitvasambhāvanaṃ viśeṣarūpaṃ vācyam /
GK16andhvc1u:5174: evamekaḥ prakāro dvibhedo 'pi vicāritaḥ, yadā tāvadityādinā viśeṣasyāpi prādhānyamityantena /
GK16andhvc1u:5175: etameva nyāyaṃ nimittanaimittikabhāve 'tidiśaṃstasyāpi dviprakāratāṃ bālapriyā viśeṣaprādhānyanāntarīyakatvaṃ sāmānyaprādhānyasyeti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5177: yathā 'raktaṃ paṭaṃ vaye'tyādau dvayostrayāṇaṃ vā vidhirit bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5183: muktāmaṇirityamasta yat etattasya jaḍasya kiyat vakṣyamāṇāpekṣayā atyalpamevetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5194: ādīyamāne aṅgulyagrasya laghukriyayā alpacācalanena pravlayini aṅguloveva lagra ityarthastathā sati /
GK16andhvc1u:5197: tasyādarśinānmamāyaṃ muktāmaṇiḥ khamutpatya gata iti matvā antaḥśucā na nidrātītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5201: yathā----- ye yāntyabhyudaye prītiṃ nojjhanti vyasaneṣu ca /
GK16andhvc1u:5203: atrāprastuta.ṃ suhṛdbāndhavarūpatvaṃ nimitt sajjanāsaktyā varṇayati naimittikīṃ śraddheyavacanatāṃ prastutāmātmano 'bhivyaṅktum;
GK16andhvc1u:5204: yatra naimittikapratītāvapi nimittapratītireva pradhānībhavatyanuprāṇākatveneti vyaṅgyavyañjakayoḥ prādhānyam /
GK16andhvc1u:5205: kadācittu nemititakamaprastutaṃ varṇyamānaṃ satprastutaṃ nimittaṃ vyanakti /
GK16andhvc1u:5213: yathāsmadupādhyāyabhaṭṭendurājasya---- prāṇā yena samarpitāstava balādyena tvamutthāpitaḥ skandhe yasya ciraṃ sthito 'si vidadhe yaste saparyāmapi /
GK16andhvc1u:5214: tasyāsya smitamātrakeṇa janayan prāṇāpahārakriyāṃ bhrātaḥ pratyupakāriṇāṃ dhuri paraṃ vetāla līlāyate //
GK16andhvc1u:5225: na hi vaktustathāvidhabāndhavatvādipratītiṃ vinā śraddheyavacanatvaṃ pratītipathamavatarediti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5236: locanam atra yadyapi sārūpyavaśena kṛtadhnaḥ kaścidanyaḥ prastuta ākṣipyate,
GK16andhvc1u:5238: na hyacetanopālambhavadasambhāvyamāno 'yamartho na ca na hṛdya iti vācyasyātra pradhānatā /
GK16andhvc1u:5239: yadi punaracetanādinātyantāsambhāvyamānatadarthaviśeṣaṇenāprastutena varṇitena prastutamākṣipyamāṇaṃ camatkārakāri tadā vastudhvanirasau /
GK16andhvc1u:5240: yathā mamaiva---- bhāvavrāta haṭhājjanasya hṛdayānyākramya yannartayan bhaṅgībhirvividhābhirātmahṛdayaṃ pracchādya saṃkrīḍase /
GK16andhvc1u:5241: sa tvāmāha jaḍaṃ tataḥ sahṛdayammanyatvaduḥśikṣito manye 'muṣya jaḍātmatā stutipadaṃ tvatsāmyasambhāvanāt //
GK16andhvc1u:5242_2: lokena mūrkho 'yamiti yadavajñāyate tadā tadīyaṃ lokottaraṃ caritaṃ prastutaṃ bālapriyā
GK16andhvc1u:5253: atyantamasambhāvyamānāni tadarthasya aprastutārthasya viśeṣaṇāni yatra tena /
GK16andhvc1u:5257: bhāvānāṃ candrodyānādipadārthanāṃ vrātaḥ sārthaḥ he bhāva vrāta /
GK16andhvc1u:5264: yā jaḍātmatā jaḍo 'sītyucyamānatā sā tvatsāmyasambhāvanāt tvatsāmyāpātāddhetoḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5270: gāḍho yo viveka evālokaḥ tena tiraskṛtaṃ timirapratānaṃ mohāndhakārasamūho yasya saḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5278: sa ca pratyuta kasyacidvirihiṇa autsukyacintādūyamānamānasatāmanyasya praharṣaparavaśatāṃ karotīti haṭhādeva lokaṃ yathecchaṃ vikārakāraṇābhirnartayati /
GK16andhvc1u:5279: na ca tasya hṛdayaṅkenāpi jñāyate kīdṛgayamiti,
GK16andhvc1u:5280: pratyuta mahāgambhīro 'tividagdhaḥ suṣṭugarvahīno 'tiśayena krīḍācaturaḥ sa yadi lokena jaḍa iti tata eva kāraṇātpratyuta vaidagdhyasambhāvananimittātsambhāvitaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:5281_0: ātmā ca yata eva kāraṇātpratyuta jāḍyena sambhāvyastata eva sahṛdayaḥ sambhāvitastadasya
GK16andhvc1u:5281_1: lokasya jaḍo 'sīti yadyucyate tadā jaḍyamevaṃvidhasya bhāvavrātasyāvidagdhasya prasiddhamiti
GK16andhvc1u:5285: itarathaiva punaralaṅkārāntaratvamalaṅkāraviśeṣatvaṃ na vyaṅgyasya kathañcidapi prādhānya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5286: uddeśe yadādigrahaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ samāsoktītyatra dvandve tena vyājastutiprabhṛtiralaṅkāravargo 'pi sambhāvyamānavyaṅgyānuveśaḥ sambhāvitaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5315: tathā sati tattulyayogakṣematayā janasyāpyajaḍatvasambhavājjanaṃ pratijaḍo 'sītyuktirvāstavī stutireva paryavasyediti /
GK16andhvc1u:5321: tadayamatra saṅkṣepaḥ---- locanam tatra sarvatra sādhāraṇamuttaraṃ dātumupakramate---tadayamatreti /
GK16andhvc1u:5323: tatra vyājastutiryathā--- kiṃ vṛttāntaiḥ paragṛhagataiḥ kintu nāhaṃ samartha- stūṇīṃ sthātuṃ prakṛtimukharo dākṣiṇātyasvabhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5324: gehe gehe vipaṇiṣu tathā catvare pānagoṣṭhyā- munmatteva bhramati bhavato vallabhā hanta kīrtiḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:5326: yattūdāhṛtaṃ kenacit---- āsīnnātha pitāmahī tava mahī jātā tato 'nantaraṃ mātā samprati sāmburāśiraśanā jāyā kulodbhūtaye /
GK16andhvc1u:5327: pūrṇe varṣaśate bhaviṣyati punaḥ saivānavadyā snuṣā yuktaṃ nāma samagranītividuṣāṃ kiṃ bhūpatīnāṃ kule //
GK16andhvc1u:5336: yasya cittavṛttiviśeṣasya sambandhī vāgvyāpārādirvikāro 'pratibandho niyataḥ bālapriyā punariti /
GK16andhvc1u:5339: aprastutavarṇanasthale yatra vācyasya aprastutārthasya camatkārakāritvaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ,
GK16andhvc1u:5341: yatra tu prastutasya vyaṅgyasya prādhānyaṃ tatra vastudhvanireva nālaṅkāra iti granthakārāśaya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5352: 'yasya vikārastu apratibandhaḥ prabhavan yena hetunā tamabhiprāyaṃ tatpratibandhaṃ ca gamayati asau bhāva ityanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5360: na dhvaniryatra vā tasya prādhānyaṃ na pratīyate //
GK16andhvc1u:5361: locanam prabhavaṃstaṃ cittavṛttiviśeṣarūpamabhiprāyaṃ yena hetunā gamayati sa heturyatheṣṭopabhogyatvādilakṣaṇo 'rtho bhāvālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5362: yathā--- ekākinī yadabalā taruṇī tathāhamasmingṛhe gṛhapatiśca gato videśam /
GK16andhvc1u:5363: kaṃ yācase tadiha vāsamiyaṃ varākī śvaśrūrmamāndhabadhirā nanu mūḍha pāntha //
GK16andhvc1u:5364: atra vyaṅgyamekaikatra padārthe upaskārakārīti vācyaṃ pradhānam /
GK16andhvc1u:5365: vyaṅgyaprādhānye tu na kācidalaṅkārateti nirūpitamityalaṃ bahunā /
GK16andhvc1u:5376: 'yena pratibaddhena' iti pāṭhe tu pratibaddhenetyasyokta evārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5378: kasyaciccittavṛttiviśeṣasya anubhāvo vyāpārādirvyaṅgyahetudvārā taccittavṛttiviśeṣasya gamakaḥ sa heturityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5380: ahaṃ tvayā yatheṣṭamupabhoktavyā na kiñcitpratibandhakamiti nāyikāmanogatādirarthaṃ ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5385: nanvasti khalu tava śvaśrūstāṃ yāca ityatrāha-iyamityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5400: 'na pratīyata' tatparāveva śabdārthau yatra vyaṅgyaṃ prīta sthitau /
GK16andhvc1u:5401: dhvaneḥ sa eva viṣayo mantavyaḥ saṅkarojjhitaḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:5403: itaśca nāntarbhāvaḥ; yataḥ kāvyaviśeṣo 'ṅgī dhvaniriti kathitaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5406: locanam prādhānyaṃ na cakāsti, api tu balātkalpyate, tathāpi hṛdaye nānupraviśati /
GK16andhvc1u:5408: tena caturṣu prakāreṣu na dhvanivyavahāraḥ sadbhāve 'pi vyaṅgyasya aprādhānye mliṣṭapratītau vācyena samaprādhānye 'sphuṭe prādhānye ca /
GK16andhvc1u:5411: saṅkārālaṅkāreṇeti tvasat, anyālaṅkāropalakṣaṇatve hi kliṣṭaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvc1u:5419: tadāpi na sa bālapriyā ityasya vyakhyānam--sphuṭatayā na cakāstīti /
GK16andhvc1u:5435: vṛttāvitaścetyatra itaḥ vakṣyamāṇaddhetorityarthaṃ manasikṛtya vyācaṣṭe---na kevalamityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5440: nanvavayavātiriktāvayavino 'nupalambhānna cāvayava evāvayavīti tanniṣedho 'nupapanna iti śaṅkāmavayava ityekavacanārthasya vivakṣitatvaṃ darśayan pariharati---ekaika iti /
GK16andhvc1u:5451: yatrāpi vā tattvaṃ tatrāpi dhvanermahāviṣayatvānna tanniṣṭhatvameva /
GK16andhvc1u:5452: 'sūribhiḥ kathita' iti vidvadupajñeyamuktiḥ, na tu yathākathañcitpravṛtteti pratipādyate /
GK16andhvc1u:5455: anyeṣāmapi samudāyināṃ tatra bhāvāt; tatsamudāyimadhye ca pratīyamānamapyasti,
GK16andhvc1u:5459: nanvalaṅkāra eva kaścittvayā pradhānatābhiṣekaṃ dattvā dhvanirityātmeti cokta ityāśaṅkyāha---yatrāpi veti /
GK16andhvc1u:5460: na hi samāsoktyādīnāmanyatama evāsau tathāsmābhiḥ kṛtaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:5461: tadviviktatve 'pi tasya bhāvāt samāsoktyādyalaṅkārasvarūpasya samastasyābhāve 'pi tasya darśitatvāt 'attā ettha' iti 'kassa vā ṇa' ityādi;
GK16andhvc1u:5464: vidvadbhya upajñā prathama upakramo yatyā ukteriti bahuvrīhiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5471: eka eva na samudāyaḥ na samudāyarūpāvayavī /
GK16andhvc1u:5485: dhvanermahāviṣayatvānna tanniṣṭhatvameveti yaduktaṃ tadvivṛṇoti locane---na hītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5497: te ca śrūyamāṇeṣu varṇeṣu dhvaniriti vyavaharanti /
GK16andhvc1u:5500: śrotraśaṣkulīṃ santānenāgatā antyāḥ śabdāḥ śrūyanta iti prakriyāyāṃ śabdajāḥ śabdāḥ śrūyamāṇā ityuktam /
GK16andhvc1u:5501: teṣāṃ ghaṇṭānuraṇanarūpatvaṃ tāvadasti; te ca dhvaniśabdenoktāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5502: yathāha bhagavān bhartṛhariḥ--- yaḥ saṃyogaviyogābhyāṃ karaṇairupajanyate /
GK16andhvc1u:5506: tathā śrūyamāṇā ye varṇā nādaśabdavācyā antyabuddhinirgrāhyasphoṭābhivyañjakāste dhvaniśabdenoktāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5521: saṃyogaviyogābhyāṃ karaṇānāṃ sthānaissaha yassaṃyogo viyogaśca tābhyām /
GK16andhvc1u:5525: saḥ sphoṭa iti prathamamutpadyamānaḥ śabdaḥ sphoṭa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5530: yathoktaṃ vṛttikṛtā-'anityapakṣe sthānakaraṇaprāptivibhāgapūrvakaṃ prathamamebhirnirvṛtto yaśśabdaḥ sa sphoṭa ucyata' ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5532: ghaṇṭādernirhnādaḥ anuraṇanaṃ tatsthānīyastattulya iti vyaṅgyasya thadhvanipadena vyavahāryatve hetuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5533: nanvevaṃvyaṅgyaviśeṣasyaiva dhvanivyavahāryatvaṃ bhavenna tu rasādestasyānuraṇanarūpatvavirahādityata āha--anuraṇaneti /
GK16andhvc1u:5535: atha vācakasya śabdasya vācyasyārthasya ca dhvanivyavahāryatvaṃ prasādhasati---tathetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5538: antyeti pūrvapūrvavarṇānubhavajanitasaṃskārasahakṛtā yā antyavarṇabuddhiḥ tayā nirgrāhyaḥ nitarāṃ vyaktarūpema grāhyo yaḥ sphoṭaḥ tasyābhivyañjakā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5549: yadi vā naiva gṛhṇāti varṇaṃ vā sakalaṃ sphuṭam //
GK16andhvc1u:5551: teṣu tāvatsveva śrūyamāṇeṣu vakturyo 'nyo drutāvilambitādivṛttibhedātmā prasiddāduccāraṇavyāpārādabhyadhikaḥ sa dhvaniruktaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5552: yadāha sa eva--- śabdasyordhvamabhivyaktervṛttibhede tu vaikṛtāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5557: tadyogācca samastamapi kāvyaṃ bālapriyā dhvaniprakāśite śabde viṣaye utpannaiḥ antarālavartibhiḥ pratyayai sphoṭaviṣayakāvyaktapratyayaiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5559: yathoktaṃ bhāṣye “vyaktarūpagrahamānuguṇā hyanupākhyeyākārā bahava upāyabhūtāḥ pratyayā dhvanibhiḥ prakāśyamāne śabde utpadyamānāśśabdasvarūpāvagrahe hetavo bhavanti” iti /
GK16andhvc1u:5566: varṇeṣu svarūpataḥ parimāṇaviśeṣavattayā sthiteṣu teṣu tathāvidheṣvevākhaṇḍatayā śrotrendriyaviṣayatāṃ gateṣu ca satsu ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5573: na tu kiñjitgrahaṇāgrahaṇe sambhavato varṇasya niravayavatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5578: śloko 'yaṃ mañjūṣāyāmitthaṃ vyākhyātaḥ-- śabdasya sphoṭasya abhivyakterūrdhvaṃ vaikṛtā dhvanayo jāyante iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5590: na caivaṃvidhasya dhvanervakṣyamāṇaprabhedatadbhedasaṅkalanayā mahāviṣayasya yatprakāśanaṃ tadaprasiddhālaṅkāraviśeṣamātrapratipādanena locanam dhvaniḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5591: tena vyatirekāvyatirekavyapadeśo 'pi na na yuktaḥ vācyavācakasaṃmiśra iti /
GK16andhvc1u:5594: tena vācyo 'pi dhvaniḥ vācako 'pi śabdo dhvaniḥ, dvayorapi vyañjakatvaṃ dhvanatīti kṛtvā /
GK16andhvc1u:5595: saṃmiśpyate vibhāvānubhāvasaṃvalanayeti vyaṅgyo 'pi dhvaniḥ, dhvanyata iti kṛtvā /
GK16andhvc1u:5596: śabdanaṃ śabdaḥ śabdavyāpāraḥ, na cāsāvabhidhādirūpaḥ, api tvātmabhūtaḥ, so 'pi dhvananaṃ dhvaniḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5597: kāvyamiti vyapadeśyaśca yo 'rthaḥ so 'pi dhvaniḥ, uktaprakāradvanicatuṣṭayamayatvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:5599: vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvaḥ sarvoṣu pakṣeṣu sāmānyarūpaḥ sādhāraṇa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5618: tathā ca śabdātmā kāvyamiti vyapadeśyaścetyartha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5630: asminnarthe dhvaniriti bhāve pratyaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5641: tatra dhvanisvarūpe bhāvitaṃ praṇihitaṃ ceto yeṣāṃ tena vā camatkakārarūpeṇa bhāvitamadhivāsitamata eva mukulitalocanatvādivikārakāraṇaṃ ceto yeṣāmiti /
GK16andhvc1u:5646: pañcadhāpi dhvaniśabdārthe yena yatra yato yasya yasmai iti bahuvrīhyarthāśrayeṇa yathocitaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ suyojyam /
GK16andhvc1u:5647: vācye 'rthe tu dhvanau vācyaśabdena svātmā tenāvivakṣito 'pradhānīkṛtaḥ svātmā yenetyavivaśritavācyo vyañjako 'rthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5649: bālapriyā sāmānyarūpo vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvaḥ sādhāraṇassamāna iti yojanā /
GK16andhvc1u:5656: nanu kramaprāptaṃ bhāktatvādipakṣamapratisamādhāya vṛttikṛtā 'sa ce'tyādinā dhvanibhedapradarśanamanucitamityata āha---udāharaṇapṛṣṭa ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5657: avivakṣitavācyādidhvanerudāharaṇe pradarśite tatra lakṣaṇāyāssamunmeṣādbhaktireva dhvaniriti śaṅkā susaṃpādā,
GK16andhvc1u:5660: atrānuktavavivakṣitavācyo va iti dvitīyodyotādāvanuvādo 'nupapannaḥ syādataḥ svayameva kārikākārasthāne sthitvetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5661: nanu pañjānāṃ dhvaniśabdārthānāṃ madhye kamarthamabhipretyāvivakṣitavācyo dhvanirityādisāmānādhikaraṇyanirdeśa ityata āha--pañcadhāpītyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5663: tatra vācakaḥ śabdo dhvanipadārtha iti pakṣe āvivakṣitaḥ vācyo yena śabdena /
GK16andhvc1u:5667: yasya yatsambandhitvena sa tathokta iti bahuvrīhirbodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5669: vāyyo dhvaniśabdārtha iti pakṣe viśeṣamāha---vācye 'rtha iti /
GK16andhvc1u:5674: locana.m yadi vā karmadhārayeṇārthapakṣe avivakṣitaścāsau vācyaśceti /
GK16andhvc1u:5679: ata evārtho 'tra prādhānyena vyañjakaḥ, pūrvatra śabdaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5680: nanu ca vivakṣā cānyaparatvaṃ ceti viruddham /
GK16andhvc1u:5682: vastvalaṅkārarasātmanā hi tribhedo 'pi dhvanirubhābhyāmevābhyāṃ saṅgṛhīta iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5683: nanu tannāmapṛṣṭe etannāmaniveśanasya kiṃ phalam? ucyate--
GK16andhvc1u:5684: anena hi nāmadvayena dhvananātmani vyāpāre pūrvaprasiddhābhidhātātparyalakṣaṇātmakavyāpāratritayāvagatārthapratīteḥ pratipattṛgatāyāḥ prayoktrabhiprāyarūpāyāśca vivikṣāyā)
GK16andhvc1u:5687: suvarṇāni puṣpyatīti suvarṇapuṣpā, etacca vākyamevāsambhavatsvārthamiti kṛtvāvivakṣitavācyam /
GK16andhvc1u:5705: asti dhvaniḥ sa cetyādiśca nirdeśaḥ kimartha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5708: tatra ca vyāpāre dvitīyasyāpi--- śikhariṇi kva nu nāma kiyacciraṃ kimabhidhānamasāvakarottapaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5709: taruṇi yena tavādharapāṭalaṃ daśati bimbaphalaṃ śukaśāvakaḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:5710: locana.m tata eva padārthamabhidhāyānvayaṃ ca tātparyaśaktyāvagamayyaiva bādhakavaśena tamupahatya sāddaśyātsulabhasamṛddhisambhārabhājanatāṃ lakṣayati /
GK16andhvc1u:5711: tallakṣaṇāprayojanaṃ śūrakṛtavidyasevakānāṃ praśastyamaśabdavācyatvena gopyamānaṃ sannāyikākucakalaśayugalamiva mahārghatāmupayaddhvanyata iti /
GK16andhvc1u:5712: śabdo 'tra pradhānatayā vyañjakaḥ, arthastu tatsahakāritayeti catvāro vyāpārāḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5714: na hi nirvidhnottamasiddhayo 'pi śrīparvatādaya imāṃ siddhiṃ vidadhyuḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5718_1: vivakṣāyāśca sahakāritvaṃ darśitamiti tannāmabhyāṃ dhvanisvarūpameva projjīvitamiti /
GK16andhvc1u:5734: atra nāmetyantasya kiyacciramityasya kimabhidhānamityasya ca dhvaniṃ krameṇāha---na hītyādinā /
GK16andhvc1u:5742: bhinnaṃ pṛthak locanam taveti bhinnaṃ padam /
GK16andhvc1u:5746: na tvaudarikavatparaṃ bhuṅkte; api tu rasajño 'ti tatprāptivadeva rasajñatāpyasya tapaḥ eveti /
GK16andhvc1u:5750: 'samāse vigalitatayā pratīyeta na pratīyatām' iti kvacit granthe pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5759: yathā vā 'dhanavān sukhī'tyādilaukikavākye matubādyarthānvitasya dhanādeḥ prayojyatvādi sambandhena sukhādau cānvayaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:5761: yataḥ śukaśābako 'yaṃ tvadadharāruṇyalābhasubhagambhāvukaṃ bimbaphalaṃ tvatsambandhitayā daśati,
GK16andhvc1u:5766: niravaśeṣeṇopabhoge sati hi prabandavicchedo bhavettathā netyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5768: sa hi rasāsvādavārtānabhijño niravaśeṣameva bhojyadravyaṃ bhuṅkte /
GK16andhvc1u:5773: ucite kāle lābhaḥ bimbaphalatadāsvādalābhaḥ tapasa eva taporūpahetoreva /
GK16andhvc1u:5776: locanam atra ca traya eva vyāpārāḥ---abhidhā tātparyaṃ dhvananaṃ ceti /
GK16andhvc1u:5781: kevalaṃ pūrvatra lakṣaṇaiva pradhānaṃ dhvananavyāpāre sahakāri /
GK16andhvc1u:5786: tena dvitīye 'pi bhede catvāra eva vyāpārāḥ // 13 //
GK16andhvc1u:5788_0: tasya khyāpanārthaṃ yadvaidagdhyena aucityāparityāgena cāṭuviracanaṃ uktarūpaṃ tadātmakaṃ
GK16andhvc1u:5788_1: taddvārakaṃ vibhāvasya ratyālambanabhūtasya taruṇīlakṣaṇasya uddīpanaṃ svābhiprāyānuguṇatayā
GK16andhvc1u:5796: asau śukaśābaka ityanena kāmukaḥ kaścidyuvā adharapāṭalaṃ bimbaphalaṃ daśatītyanenādharāsvādanādikañca sāddaśyāllakṣyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5809: nanvevaṃrītyā vivakṣitānyaparavācye sarvatrāpi kiṃ lakṣaṇāsti? netyāha---
GK16andhvc1u:5815: yasmāt dvitīye 'pi prabhede śikhiriṇītyādau kvaciccatvāro vyāpārāḥ tasmādevetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5816: tatra bhaktirūpāyā lakṣaṇāyā abhāve bhakterdhvanitvaśaṅkāparihārayostadānantaryaṃ tattadaśliṣṭaṃ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5817: 'bhaktyā bibhartī'yādeḥ 'sā tu syādupalakṣaṇa'mityantagranthasya bhāvaṃ pradarśayannavatārayati--ayaṃ bhāva ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5822: bhaktyā bibharti naikatvam rūpa-bhedād ayaṃ dhvaniḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5825: bhaktyā bibharti naikatvaṃ rūpabhedādayaṃ dhvaniḥ ayamuktaprāro dhvanirbhaktyā naikatvaṃ bibharti bhinnarūpatvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:5826: vācyavyatiriktasyārthasya vācyavācakābhyāṃ tātparyeṇa prakāśaṃ yatra vyaṅgyaprādhānye sa dhvaniḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5828: locanam prathamaṃ pakṣaṃ nirākaroti--- bhaktyā bibhartiti /
GK16andhvc1u:5829: uktaprakāra iti pañcasvartheṣu yojyam---śabde 'rthe vyāpāre vyaṅgye samudāye ca /
GK16andhvc1u:5851: tamatilaṅdhya tatsambaddhe 'nyasminnarthe tasya śabdasya vyavahāro 'tiśayito vyavahāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5857: tasyāḥ prayojanaṃ santāpasya sphuṭatayā pratipattiriti dhvananavyāpāro mukhyavṛttiparityāgānyathānupapattirūpayā vastusthityā sambhavannapītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5860: nanu prayojanaviṣayatvādeva tasyādriyamāṇatvamavaśyambhāvīti kathamasatkalpatvamiti śaṅkāyāṃ tadvyāpāraviṣayasya na mukhyaṃ prayojanatvaṃ tallakṣaṇāsamanvayāt,
GK16andhvc1u:5865: ativyāpter athāvyāpter na cāsau lakṣyate tayā // DhvK_1.14 //
GK16andhvc1u:5871: yatra hi vyaṅgyakṛtaṃ mahatsauṣṭavaṃ nāsti tatrāpyupacaritaśabdavṛttyā prasidydhanurodhapravartitavyabahārāḥ locanam hi prayojanalakṣaṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:5872: tatrāpi lakṣaṇāstīti kathaṃ dhvananaṃ lakṣaṇā cetyekaṃ tattvaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvc1u:5876: nanu dhvananamavaśyambhāvīti kathaṃ tadvyatirikto 'sti viṣaya ityāha---mahatsauṣṭhavamiti /
GK16andhvc1u:5877: ata eva prayojanasyānādaraṇīyatvādvyañjakatvena na kṛtyaṃ kiñciditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5880: nanu prayojanābhāve kathaṃ tathā vyavahāra ityāha---prasiddhyanurodheti /
GK16andhvc1u:5885: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ----yadi bhaktirdhvaniścaikaṃ tatvaṃ syāttadā hyudāhṛte viṣaye dhvanisadbhāvo lakṣaṇāyā abhāvo vā syāt /
GK16andhvc1u:5899: vyañjanasya sadbhāvamātranna dhvanivyavahāre prayojakaṃ, kintu cārutvātiśayaśālitvameva /
GK16andhvc1u:5916: yathā--- parimlānaṃ pīnastanajadhanasaṅgādubhayata- stanormadhyasyāntaḥ parimilanamaprāpya haritam /
GK16andhvc1u:5917: idaṃ vyastanyāsaṃ ślathabhujalatākṣepavalanaiḥ kṛśāṅgyāḥ santāpaṃ vadati bisinīpatraśayanam //
GK16andhvc1u:5919: viramia puṇo ramijjai pio jaṇo ṇatthi punaruttam //
GK16andhvc1u:5921: viramya punā ramyate priyo jano nāsti punaruktam //
GK16andhvc1u:5924: jaha gahio taha hiaaṃ haranti ucchintamahilāo //
GK16andhvc1u:5926: uttānenāpi rūpeṇa tatprayojanaṃ cakāsannigūḍhatāṃ nidhānavadapekṣata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5929: gūḍhatayā varṇane vā kiṃ bālapriyā paramatarītyā prasiddhiśabdaṃ vyākhyātumupakramate---vayantviti /
GK16andhvc1u:5930: prasiddhiḥ prayojanasya prakarṣeṇa prakaṭatayā siddhiḥ pratītiḥ;
GK16andhvc1u:5934: prayojanasya anigūḍhatā prakaṭatā yā, sātra prasiddhiśabdārthaḥ; na tu pūrvokta iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5935: nanu dhvanisthale 'pi prayojanasya sphuṭāvabhāsamānatvādanigūḍhatvaṃ samānamiti śaṅkāyāṃ viśeṣamāha---uttānenetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:5948: ajjāeṃ pahāro ṇavaladāe diṇṇo pieṇa thaṇavaṭṭe /
GK16andhvc1u:5949: miuo vi dūsaho vvia jāo hiae savattīṇam // .//
GK16andhvc1u:5951: mṛduko 'pi duḥsaha iva jato hṛdaye sapatnīnām // .//
GK16andhvc1u:5953: locanam cārutvamadhikaṃ jātam? anenaivāśayena vakṣyati---yata uktyantareṇāśakyaṃ yaditi /
GK16andhvc1u:5957: yathā gṛhītāstathā hṛdayaṃ haranti svairiṇyo mahilāḥ // .//
GK16andhvc1u:5960_0: tathā--ajjeti kaniṣṭhabhāryāyāḥ stanapṛṣṭhe navalatayā kāntenocitakrīḍāyogena mṛduko
GK16andhvc1u:5960_1: 'pi prahāro dattaḥ sapatnīnāṃ saubhāgyasūcakaṃ tatkrīḍāsaṃvibhāgamaprāptānāṃ hṛdaye
GK16andhvc1u:5969: ubhayataḥ dvayorbhāgayoḥ kṣepā śayyāprānteṣu nipātanāni valanāni vivartanāni ca /
GK16andhvc1u:5971: atra śayanasyācetanasya mukhyārthavacanakartṛtvānvayānupapatyā mukhyārthabādhena jñāpanaṃ sāddaśyāllakṣyate,
GK16andhvc1u:5988: tathā---- parārthe yaḥ pīḍābhanubhavati bhaṅge 'pi madhuro yadīyaḥ sarvoṣāmiha khalu vikāro 'pyabhimataḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:5989: na samprāpto vṛddhiṃ yadi sa bhṛśamakṣetrapatitaḥ kimikṣordeṣo 'sau na punaraguṇāyā marubhuvaḥ //
GK16andhvc1u:5993: anyasya datto mṛṭuḥ praddāro 'nyasya ca sampadyate /
GK16andhvc1u:5998: tathāpyaprastute ikṣau praśasyamāne pīḍāyā anubhavanenāsambhavatā pīḍāvattvaṃ lakṣyate;
GK16andhvc1u:6000: nanvastyatra prayojanaṃ tatkimiti na dhvanyata ityāśaṅkyāha---na caivaṃvidha iti // 14 //
GK16andhvc1u:6002: yadvā--ucitāyāṃ krīḍāyāṃ yo yogaḥ sambhavettena hetunā /
GK16andhvc1u:6004: 'sapatnīnāṃ dussaho jāta' ityatra gamyaṃ hetuṃ viśeṣaṇadvārā darśayati---saubhāgyetyādyaprāptānāmityantena /
GK16andhvc1u:6007: mṛdossusahatayā mṛdurapi dussaha ityanyaśca virodha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6008: atra mukhyārthasya dānasya bādhātprahāro datta ityatra dānena dānasādhyaṃ phalavatvaṃ lakṣyata ityāha---dānenetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6037: śabdo vyañjakatāṃ bibhrad dhvany-ukter viṣayībhavet // DhvK_1.15 //
GK16andhvc1u:6044: rūḍhā ye viṣaye 'nyatra śabdāḥ sva-viṣayād api /
GK16andhvc1u:6045: lāvaṇyādyāḥ prayuktās te na bhavanti padaṃ dhvaneḥ // DhvK_1.16 //
GK16andhvc1u:6048: lāvaṇyādyāḥ prayuktāste na bhavanti padaṃ dhvaneḥ // 16 //
GK16andhvc1u:6050: tathāvidhe ca viṣaye kvacitsambhavannapi locanam yata uktyantareṇeti /
GK16andhvc1u:6056: evaṃ yatra prayojanaṃ sadapi nādarāspadaṃ tatra ko dhvananavyāpāra ityuktvā yatra mūlata eva prayojanaṃ nāsti,
GK16andhvc1u:6058: lāvaṇyādyā ye śabdāḥ svaviṣayāllavaṇarasayuktatvādeḥ svārthādanyatra hṛdyatvādau rūḍhā;
GK16andhvc1u:6075: tadiha mukhyārthabādhatadyogaprayojanatrayasānnidhyāpekṣaṇarūpavyavadhānaśūnyatvaṃ rūḍhaśabdena darśitamiti prayojanarāhityamatra vyavatiṣṭhata evetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6081: te tasmin svaviṣayādanyatra prayuktā api na dhvaneḥ padaṃ bhavanti; na tatra dhvanivyavahāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6087: na cātra prayojanaṃ kiñciduddiśya lakṣaṇā pravṛtteti na tadviṣayo dhvananavyavahāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6095: anurodhī virodhī tulya iti lokaprasiddho 'rtha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6097: pustake dṛśyamānāyā 'devaḍi'tyādigāthāyā granteṣu tatra tatrākṣarabhedā dṛśyante /
GK16andhvc1u:6098: ataścāsyāḥ svarūpaṃ chāyāṃ ca niścetuṃ na śaknomi /
GK16andhvc1u:6110: yad uddiśya phalaṃ tatra śabdo naiva skhalad-gatiḥ // DhvK_1.17 //
GK16andhvc1u:6113: yaduddiśya phalaṃ tatra śabdo naiva skhaladgatiḥ // 17 //
GK16andhvc1u:6114: locanam tadā bhaktisannidhau sarvatra dhvanivyavahāraḥ syādityativiyāptiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6115: abhyupagabhyāpi brūmaḥ--bhavatu yatra yatra bhaktistatra tatra dhvaniḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6116: tathāpi yadviṣayo lakṣaṇāvyāpāro na tadviṣayo dhvananavyāpāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6121: na ca tadviṣayo 'pi dvitīyo lakṣaṇāvyāpāro yuktaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:6123: mukhyāṃ vṛttimabhidāvyāpāraṃ parityajya parisamāpya guṇavṛttyā lakṣaṇārūpayārthasyāmukhyasya darśanaṃ pratyāyanā,
GK16andhvc1u:6128: vadatītyādau lāvaṇyādiśabde ca bhaktessatve 'pi dhvanyabhāvasya darśitatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6139: nanvabhidhāmantarema lakṣaṇāvṛtterasambhavāttatparityāgaḥ kathamityataḥ parityajyeti padaṃ prakṛtānuguṇatayā vyācaṣṭe--parisamāpyeti /
GK16andhvc1u:6145: tatra hi cārutvatiśayaviśiṣṭārthaprakāśanalakṣame prayojane kartavye yadi locanam prayojane tāvaddvitīyo vyāpāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6147: yataḥ skhalantī bādakavyāpāreṇa vidhurīkriyamāṇā gatiravabodhanaśaktiryasya śabdasya tadīyo vyāpāro lakṣaṇā /
GK16andhvc1u:6150: tenāyaṃ lakṣaṇalakṣaṇāyā na viṣaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6164: 'naca lakṣaṇaive'tyatra hetutvena kārikāntyapādaṃ pāta yati---yata iti /
GK16andhvc1u:6165: tathā ca 'naiva skhaladgati'rityanena lakṣaṇāyā abhāvaḥ pratipādyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6188: lakṣitena tīrādinā lakṣaṇayā prayojanarūpārthaḥ pratyāyyata iti kecit;
GK16andhvc1u:6195: yathā---“ā hanta kimidaṃ tanvi netrayoḥ śrāvaṇastava /
GK16andhvc1u:6200: tatra śravamādipadenāśrupātādireva lakṣyata ityato lakṣitalakṣaṇāyā abhāvādayanna tadviṣaya ityartha iti kecit /
GK16andhvc1u:6203: 'cārutvātiśayaviśiṣṭārthalakṣaṇe prayojane' śabdasyāmukhyatā tadā tasya prayoge duṣṭataiva syāt /
GK16andhvc1u:6207: prayojanāvagamasya sukhasampattye hi sa śabdaḥ prayujyate tasminnamukhyārthe /
GK16andhvc1u:6208: yadi ca 'siṃho vaṭuḥ' iti śauryātiśaye 'pyavagamayitavye skhaladgatitvaṃ śabdasya tarhi tatparatītiṃ naiva kuryāditi kimarthaṃ tasya prayogaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6209: upacārema kariṣyatīti cettatrāpi prayojanāntaramanveṣyaṃ tatrāpyupacāra ityanavasthā /
GK16andhvc1u:6211: tarhi prayojane 'vagamayitavye na lakṣaṇākhyo vyāpāraḥ tatsāmagryabhāvāt /
GK16andhvc1u:6216: 'cārutvātiśayaviśiṣṭārthaprakāśanalakṣaṇa' iti pāṭhe tu kartavya ityasyotpādayitavye ityevārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6217: prayojane bodhye skhaladgatitvasya niṣedhānnāmukhyatāpadena tadeva vivakṣitamityāha---bādhakenetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6219: duṣṭatvaṃ hi vyākaraṇasaṃskārarāhityādirūpamiti śaṅkāyāṃ pratipipādayiṣitārthapratītyajanakatvena vaiyarthyam;
GK16andhvc1u:6231: atha prayojane dhvananavyāpāraṃ vyavasthāpayiṣyan uktamevārthaṃ śaṅkāparihārābhyā pradarśayannāha---upacāreṇetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6238: tasmin prayojane 'pi upacāre pūrvavadaṅgīkārye tatrāpyanyadevaṃ tatrāpyanyadityanavasthā mūlakṣayakāriṇī syādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6239: ataḥ skhaladgatitvābhyupagamo na yukta iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6240: nanu mā bhūtskhalidagatitvaṃ, tathāpi lakṣaṇāyā abhāvaḥ kuta ityata āha---athetyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6245: tena yataḥ skhaladgateśśabdasya vyāpāro lakṣaṇā, tato hetoḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6250: vyañjakatvaika-mūlasya dhvaneḥ syāl lakṣaṇaṃ katham // DhvK_1.18 //
GK16andhvc1u:6257: na ca prayoge duṣṭatā kācit prayojanasyābidhnenaiva pratīteḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6258: tenābhidhaiva mukhye 'rthe bādhakena pravivitsurnirudhyamānā satī acaritārthatvādanyatra prasarati /
GK16andhvc1u:6263: tato hetorvācakatvamabhidhāvyāpāramāśritā tadbādhanenotthānāttatpucchabhūtatvāccha guṇavṛttiḥ gauṇalākṣaṇikakāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6264: sā kathaṃ dhvanervyañjanātmano lakṣaṇaṃ syāt? bhinnaviṣayatvāditi /
GK16andhvc1u:6267: evam 'ativyāpteratāvyāpterna cāsau lakṣyate tayā' iti kārikāgatātivyāptiṃ vyākhyāyāvyāptiṃ vyācaṣṭe---avyāptirapyasyeti /
GK16andhvc1u:6277: bādhakenetyanantaraṃ vidhurīkṛteti ca kvacit granthe pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6280: yathā pravāhādikamuddiśya gaṅgādiśabdasyāyaṃ mukhyārtha iti vyavahāraḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:6282: tathā ca dvayorarthatvaṃ tulyaṃ mukhyatvāmukhyatvakṛta eva bheda iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6286: na he śabdasya yaḥ kaścidevāṃmukhyo 'rthaḥ kintvayamartho 'sya śabdasyāmukhya iti niyata evetyatastathāvidhopadeśarūpasya /
GK16andhvc1u:6287: ayamartho 'smācchabdādboddhavya iti icchārūpasya vā saṅketasya grahamamapītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6291: tasmādityasiya kīrukayī sambandhaṃ darsayaṃstatpadaṃ vyācaṣṭe---yata ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6295: anye ca bahavaḥ prakārā bhaktyā vyāpyante; tasmādbhaktiralakṣaṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:6296: locanam yatra yatra dhvanistatra tatra yadi bhaktirbhavenna syādavyāptiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6300: kevalaṃ śabdastamarthaṃ lakṣayitvā tenaiva saha sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ bhajate-'siṃho baṭuḥ' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:6301: artho vārthāntaraṃ lakṣayitvā svavācakena tadvācakaṃ samānādhikaraṇaṃ karoti /
GK16andhvc1u:6302: śabdārthau vā yugapattaṃ lakṣayitvā anyābhyāmeva śabdārthābhyāṃ miśrībhavata ityevaṃ lākṣaṇikādgauṇasya bhedaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6303: yadāha-'gauṇe śabdaprayogaḥ, na lakṣaṇāyāma' iti, tatrāpi lakṣaṇāstyeveti sarvatra saiva vyāpikā /
GK16andhvc1u:6311_1: 'śikhariṇī'tyādau sā pravartata eveti tatra tadabhāvābhidhānamasaṅgatamiti pūrvapakṣamabhyupetya
GK16andhvc1u:6315: nanvevaṃ gauṇasya lākṣaṇikādbhedaḥ kuta ityata āha--'kevalam' ityādinā 'bheda' ityantena /
GK16andhvc1u:6340: dvirephaśabdasya hi yo 'bhidheyo bhramaraśabdaḥ dvau rekau yasyeti kṛtvā tena bhramaraśabdena yasya saṃyogaḥ sambandhaḥ ṣaṭpadalakṣaṇasyārthasya so 'rtho dvirephaśabdena lakṣyate,
GK16andhvc1u:6344: vaiparītyāt yathā--śatrumuddiśya kaścidbravīti--'kimivopakṛtaṃ na tena mama' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:6381: nanvatrāṅgīkṛtaiva madhye lakṣaṇā, kathaṃ tarhyuktaṃ vivakṣitānyapareti?
GK16andhvc1u:6385: tathāhi-vibhāvānubhāvapratipādeke kāvye mukhye 'rthe tāvadbādhakānu praveśo 'pyasambhāvya iti ko lakṣaṇāvakāśaḥ?
GK16andhvc1u:6387: iha cābhidheyānāṃ vibhāvānubhāvādīnāmavinābhūtā rasādaya iti lakṣyante,
GK16andhvc1u:6392: dhūmaśabdasya svārthaviśrāntatvānna tāvati vyāpāra iti cet,
GK16andhvc1u:6402: vṛttau vivakṣitānyaparavācyaśabdena tadavāntarabhedo mukhyo 'saṃlakṣyakramo vivakṣita ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6407: atrāpi lakṣaṇā kinna syādata āha--na ceti /
GK16andhvc1u:6412: asti vā nāsti veti cintitayā mukhyārthabādhayā kiṃ phalamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6416: abhidheyenāvinābhūtasya kenāpi sambandhena sambaddhasya pratītirjñānaṃ taddheturvā /
GK16andhvc1u:6437: locanam nanvevaṃ dhūmāvagamanānantarāgnismaramavadvibhāvādipratipatyanantaraṃ ratyādicittavṛttipratipattarit śabdavyāpāra evātra nāsti /
GK16andhvc1u:6438: idaṃ tāvadayaṃ pratītisvarūpajño mīmāṃsakaḥ praṣṭavyaḥ--kimatra paracittavṛttimātre pratipattireva rasapratipattirabhimatā bhavataḥ?
GK16andhvc1u:6439: na caivaṃ bhramitavyam; evaṃ hi lokagatacittavṛttyanumānamātramiti kā rasatā?
GK16andhvc1u:6440: yastvalaukikacamatkārātmā rasāsvādaḥ kāvyagatavibhāvādicarvaṇāprāṇo nāsau smaraṇānumānādisāmyena khilīkārapātrīkartavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6441: kiṃ tu laukikena kāryakāraṇānumānādinā saṃskṛtahṛdayo vibhāvādikaṃ pratipadyamāna eva na tāṭasthyena pratipadyate,
GK16andhvc1u:6448: 'gaṅgāyāṃ dhoṣa' ityatra gaṅgāśabdo netyatra mukhyārthabādha eva heturatasya eva lakṣaṇābījamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6449: tarhihāpi mukhyārthabādho lakṣaṇā ca syat netyāha - na ceti /
GK16andhvc1u:6451: vibhāvādipratītyanantarabhāvinī ratyādipratītirdhūmādipratītijanyāgnyādismṛtisamānaiveti sā śabdavyāpārajanyā na bhavati dūre tasyā vyañjanājanyatvamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6457: dvitīye rasapratīteritarapratītivailakṣṇyena dṛṣṭāntābhāvo doṣa ityāśayena sopahāsaṃ pṛcchannāha--idamityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6478: kāraṇaṃ vahnyādi, ratyādi cakāryeṇa yat kāraṇasyānumānaṃ, ādipadenārthāpattessaṅgrahaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6479: tene saṃskṛtahṛdaya ityanena tatsaṃskāro 'pi pratipattuḥ rasapratītāvupayogīti darśitam /
GK16andhvc1u:6490: na cāsau carvaṇā pramāṇāntarato jātā pūrvaṃ, yenedānīṃ smṛtiḥ syāt /
GK16andhvc1u:6493: yadāha--'vibhāvo vijñānārthaḥ loke kāraṇamevābhidhīyate na vibhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6498: ata eva parakīyā na cittavṛttirgamyata ityabhiprāyeṇa 'vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogādrasaniṣpattiḥ' iti sūtre sthāyigrahaṇaṃ na kṛtam /
GK16andhvc1u:6508: sahṛdayānāṃ yattattaccittavṛttitanmayībhavanaṃ tasyocitā yā carvaṇā arthādvibhāvādeḥ tatprāṇatayā tadupayogitvenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6518: viśiṣṭatayā bhāvyante jñāyante sthāyivyabhicāriṇo 'neneti vibhāvaḥ pramadodyānādiḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6522: cittavṛttihetuṣu loke kāramamityeva vyavahāro na tu vibhāva itītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6531: kintu tāsāṃ cittavṛttīnāṃ sthāyyādirūpāṇāṃ sambandhi yatsāmājikānāṃ tanmayībhavanaṃ,
GK16andhvc1u:6534: ata eva yasmādanubhavanamuktarūpameva na parakīyacittavṛtyanumitimātraṃ tasmāddhetorevetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6540: vyabhicārī tu cittavṛttyātmatve 'pi mukhyacittavṛttiparavaśa eva carvyata iti vibhāvānubhāvamadhye gaṇitaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6545: bālapriyā iti ṣaṣṭhyantasthāyigrahame kartavye 'pyanubhāvagrahaṇenaiva sthāyipratītirbhavatīti tanna kṛtamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6546: yadyatra sthāyigrahaṇaṃ kriyeta, tarhi tadvirūddhañja syādityāha---tadityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6550: nanvevaṃ 'sthāyī raso bhavatī'tyādi tatra tatra sūtrakārādivacanaṃ kathaṃ ghaṭetetyata āha--sthāyinastviti /
GK16andhvc1u:6553: tasya paragatasthāyinaḥ sambandhino ye vibhāvānubhāvāḥ taducitāyāścittavṛttessahṛdayātmani yassaṃskārastasyodbodhena sundaracarvaṇāyā udayādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6554: uktañca kāvyānuśāsanavyākhyāne 'aucityantu tatsthāyigatatvena kāraṇāditayā prasiddhānāmadhunā carvaṇopayogitayā vibhāvāditvālambanādi'ti /
GK16andhvc1u:6556: rasacarvaṇā hi hṛdayasaṃvādapurassarī hṛdayasaṃvāde ca nidānaṃ,
GK16andhvc1u:6558: tasyāñcāvasthāyāṃ pramadādibhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ pulakādibhiḥ kāryaiśca bhūyo bhūyo 'vadhṛtasvakāraṇavyāptikaiḥ sthāyino ratyāderavagamo bhavati, tasmāccetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6559: nanu cittavṛttitvāviśeṣātsyāyīva vyabhicāryapi sūtre grahaṇaṃ nārhatītyata āha---vyabhicārītviti /
GK16andhvc1u:6560: vyabhicāriṇaḥ sthāyicittavṛttiṃ prati guṇatvena vibhāvādiprāyatvāttanmadhye sa nirdiṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6565: yathoktamabhinavabhāratyāṃ “kathantarhi sūtre niṣpattiriti neyaṃ rasasyāpi tu tadviṣayarasānāyāḥ tanniṣpattyā yadi tadekāyattajīvitasya rasasya niṣpattirucyate,
GK16andhvc1u:6569: prabandhena pravṛttaṃ yadbandhusamāgamādikāraṇaṃ tenoditā yā harṣādilaukikacittavṛttiḥ tasyā nyagbhāvena adhaḥkaraṇena tadvyatirekeṇeti yāvat /
GK16andhvc1u:6575: yathā vā daṇḍavakrādīnāmutpādanaṃ vyāpārastathā locanam nanu yadi neyaṃ jñaptirna vā niṣpattiḥ, tarhi kimetat?
GK16andhvc1u:6577: nanu vibhāvādiratra kiṃ jñāpako hetuḥ, uta kārakaḥ? na jñāpako na kārakaḥ; api tu carvaṇopayogī /
GK16andhvc1u:6579: yata eva na dṛṣṭaṃ tata evālaukikamityuktam /
GK16andhvc1u:6580: nanvevaṃ raso 'pramāṇaṃ syāt; astu, kiṃ tataḥ?
GK16andhvc1u:6588: hi tadeva kāvyaṃ punaḥ punaḥ bālapriyā vibhāvādīnāṃ na jñāpanaṃ na vā utpādanaṃ vyāpāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6590: pūrvoktena iyaṃ rasacarvaṇā na jñaptirūpā, nāpi niṣpattirūpetyāyātaṃ, tarhi kiṃsvarūpetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6595: nanu jñāpakatvasya kārakatvasya vā abhāve vibhāvādīnāṃ rasapratītyarthamupādānaṃ vyarthaṃ,
GK16andhvc1u:6598: vibhāvādestu tadabhāve 'pi carvaṇopayogitvānnānarthakayamityāśayena pariharati---na jñāpaka ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6608: prītiśca vyutpattiśca tayoḥ, yadvā--prītipūrvikā vyutpattiḥ tasyāḥ siddherityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6609: nanvevamalaukikatve rasasya tatsādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ nāstīti śaṅkate---nanviti /
GK16andhvc1u:6616: vācakaśabdaikagamyatve hi rasasya vācyārthavallaukikatvaṃ kathañcicchakyaśaṅkamanuprāsādināpi vācakatvaśūnyena vyaṅgyatvamastyeva /
GK16andhvc1u:6617: na cānuprāsavyaṅgyaṃ vastu loke dṛṣṭacaramato 'pi rasasyālaukikatvaṃ siddhamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6622: abhidhāyā evābhāve tatpṛṣṭhavartinyā lakṣaṇāyāḥ prasaṅga eva nāstītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6624: kāvyātmako 'nuprasādiviśiṣṭo yaḥ locanam paṭhaṃścarvyamāṇaśca sahṛdayo lokaḥ,
GK16andhvc1u:6626: tatra 'upādāyāpi ye heyā' iti nyāyena kṛtapratītikasyānupayoga eveti śabdasyāpīha dhvananavyāpāraḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6636: yadeva kāvyaṃ paṭhitañcarvitañca tadeva punaḥ punaḥ paṭyate carvyate cetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6645: so 'yaṃ nyāyo 'tra na pravartata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6649: yadyarthaṃpratītivyavadhānāpekṣayaiva śabdasya vyañjakatvaṃ bhavettadāvaśyaṃ kramo lakṣyeteti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6655: tattadarthe tattatpadasya yassamayaḥ saṅketaḥ tadbalena tattatsaṅketagrahaṇasahakāreṇetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6667: asyodāharaṇam---“śveto dhāvati, sarvado mādhavaḥ pāyā“dityādikaṃ bodhyam /
GK16andhvc1u:6670: vākyārtha ekaḥ syāt vākyārthe bhedo nāṅgīkriyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6674: viramya yo vyāpāraḥ śabdasya tadayogo yataḥ, tasmādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6679: locanam niyamābhāva iti tena “agrihotraṃ juhuyātsvargakāmaḥ” iti śrutau khādecchvāmāṃsamityeṣa nārtha ityatra kā prameti prasajyate /
GK16andhvc1u:6680: tatrāpi na kācidiyattetyanāśvāsatā ityevaṃ vākyabhedo dūṣaṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:6681: iha tu vibhāvādyeva pratipādyamānaṃ carvaṇāviṣayatonmukhamiti samayādyupayogābhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6682: na ca niyukto 'hamatra karavāṇi, kṛtārtho 'hamiti śāstrīyapratītisaddaśamadaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6684: iha tu vibhāvādicarvaṇādbhutapuṣpavattatkālasāraivoditā na tu pūrvāparakālānubandhinīti laukikādāsvādādyogiviṣayāccānya evāyaṃ rasāsvādaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6685: ata eva 'śikhariṇa' ityādāvapi bālapriyā samayādiriti pāṭhe sa eva yena pūrvamartho buddhaḥ sa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6704: kāvyavyatariktaṃ laukikaṃ vaidikaṃ ca vākyaṃ samayaprakaraṇādisahakṛtaṃ yugapatkrameṇa vā ekamarthameva pratipādayatītyato 'nekārthabodhakatvena vākyabhedo naiva bhavati /
GK16andhvc1u:6705: samayaprakaraṇādyapekṣāṃ vinā vākyasyārthabodhakatvāṅgīkāre cāvyavasthitārthakatvenābodhakatvarūpāprāmāṇyaṃ syādityevaṃ vākyabhedo doṣa iti sārārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6717: ataśca tāṃ prati samayāderanapekṣaṇe 'pi nāvyavasthitārthakatvena doṣa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6721: taduttarakāle tu kṛtārtho 'smīti ca pratītiḥ śāstrato jāyate /
GK16andhvc1u:6731: tatkālaḥ vartamānakāla eva sāro yasyāḥ saiva /
GK16andhvc1u:6735: yato rasāsvādasya kasyaciddhvanibhedasya sā tu syādupalakṣaṇam /
GK16andhvc1u:6736_1: locanam mukhyārthabādhādikramamanapekṣyaiva sahṛdayā vaktabhiprāyaṃ cāṭuprītyātmakaṃ saṃvedayante /
GK16andhvc1u:6737: ata eva grandhakāraḥ sāmānyena vivakṣitānyaparavācye dhvanau bhakterabhāvamabhyadhāt /
GK16andhvc1u:6740: yadi tu na kupyate 'suvarṇapuṣpāṃ' ityādāvavivakṣitavācye 'pi mukhyārthabādhādilakṣaṇāsāmagrīmanapekṣyaiva vyaṅgyārthaviśrāntirityalaṃ bahunā /
GK16andhvc1u:6742: nanu mā bhūddhvaniriti bhaktiriti caikaṃ rūpam /
GK16andhvc1u:6744: upalakṣaṇaṃ tu bhaviṣyati; yatra dhvanirbhavati, tatra bhaktirapyastīti bhaktyupalakṣito dhvaniḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6745: na tāvadetatsarvatrāsti, iyatā ca kiṃ parasya siddhaṃ?
GK16andhvc1u:6749: tadupalakṣaṇamukhena ca dhvanimapi bālapriyā uktavidhamanitarasādhāraṇaṃ saubhāgyaṃ tata evetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6754: tarhi kuto bhavataiva lakṣaṇāmabhyupetya vyākhyātamityata āha--asmābhistviti /
GK16andhvc1u:6758: nanu kasya nāma kopastattvaṃ kathyatāmityatrāha---yadi tviti /
GK16andhvc1u:6770: upalakṣaṇaṃ vastu sarvatra na bhavatīti sampratipannamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6776: dhvanilakṣaṇakaraṇaṃ niṣphalaṃ lakṣaṇaphalasyetaravyāvṛttatayā dhvanijñānasyopalakṣaṇabhūtayā bhakatyaiva samabhavādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6782: yadi ca guṇavṛttyaiva dhvanirlakṣyata ityucyate tadabhidhāvyāpāreṇa taditaro 'laṅkāravargaḥ samagra eva lakṣyata iti pratyekamalaṅkārāṇāṃ lakṣaṇakaraṇavaiyarthyaprasaṅgaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6785: lakṣaṇe 'nyaiḥ kṛte cāsya pakṣa-saṃsiddhir eva naḥ // DhvK_1.19a //
GK16andhvc1u:6788: kṛte 'pi vā pūrvamevānyairdhvanilakṣaṇe pakṣasaṃsiddhireva naḥ; yasmāddhvanirastīti na pakṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6789: sa ca prāgeva saṃsiddha ityayatnasampannasamīhitārthāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ ramaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6790: ye 'pi sahṛdayahṛdayasaṃvedyamanākhyeyameva dhvanerātmānamāmnāsiṣuste 'pi na parikṣya vādinaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6795: tathā hetubalātkāryaṃ jāyata iti tārkikairukte kimidānīmiśvaraprabhṛtīnāṃ kartṝṇāṃ jñātṝṇāṃ vā kṛtyamapūrvaṃ syāditi sarvo nirārambhaḥ syāt /
GK16andhvc1u:6803: ata eva mūlakārikā sākṣāttannirākaraṇārthā na śrūyate /
GK16andhvc1u:6804: vṛttikṛttu nirākṛtamapi prameyaśayyāpūraṇāya kaṇṭhena bālapriyā abhidhāvyāpāre /
GK16andhvc1u:6808: abhidhānābhidheyabhāvasya samastālaṅkāravyāpakatvāttasya cābhidhāvayāpārajīvitatvāttannirūpaṇe kṛte satyalaṅkāranirūpaṇaṃ tadgranthakārāṇāṃ niṣphalameva bhavedityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6816: lakṣaṇaṃ ca karaṇaṃ ca lakṣaṇakaraṇe, tayoḥ tannirūpaṇayoḥ vaiyarthyasya prasaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6819: nanu kārikākāreṇa itarapakṣa ivālakṣaṇīyatvapakṣaḥ kimiti na pratikṣipta iti śaṅkāṃ pariharan 'ye 'pī'tyādigranthamavatārayati---evamityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6822: na ca tasyālakṣaṇīyatve tatsambhavati iti tannirākaraṇanāntarīyakatvenālakṣaṇīyatvapakṣo 'pi nirākṛta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6823: nanu tarhi kimiti vṛttikṛtā tatpakṣo 'nūdya nirākṛta ityata āha---vṛttikṛditi /
GK16andhvc1u:6825: prameyasya śayyā sanniveśaviśeṣaḥ yata uktayā nītyā vakṣyamāṇayā ca dhvaneḥ sāmānyaviśeṣalakṣaṇe pratipādite 'pi yadyanākhyeyatvaṃ tatsarveṣāmeva vastūnāṃ tatprasaktam /
GK16andhvc1u:6826: yadi punardhvanerātiśayoktyānayā kāvyāntarātiśāyi taiḥ locanam tatpakṣamanūdya nirākaroti---ye 'pītyādinā /
GK16andhvc1u:6827: uktayā nītyā 'yatrārthaḥ śabdo vā' iti sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ pratipāditam /
GK16andhvc1u:6828: vakṣyamāṇayā tu nītyā viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati 'arthāntare saṅkramitaṃ ityādinā /
GK16andhvc1u:6829: tatra prathamoddyote dhvaneḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇameva kārikākāreṇa kṛtam /
GK16andhvc1u:6830: dvitīyoddyote kārikākāro 'vāntaravibhāgaṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ ca vidadhadanuvādamukhena mūlavibhāgaṃ dvividhaḥ' iti /
GK16andhvc1u:6834: yathā 'tānyakṣarāṇi hṛdaye kimapi sphuranti' itivadatiśayoktyānākhyeyatoktā sārarūpatāṃ pratipādayitumiti darśitamiti śivam // 19 //
GK16andhvc1u:6836: anākhyeyatvapakṣasyāpi svayamanirākaraṇe tatpūraṇaṃ na bhavediti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc1u:6837: uktayā nītyetyādau yathāsaṃkhyena sambandha ityāśayenopapādayati---yatrārtha ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6840: vṛttau 'sa ca dvividha' ityādinā viśeṣalakṣaṇakathanaṃ kārikākārāśayānusāreṇetyāha--tatra prathamodyota ityādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6844: kintvatiśayittvāditi cettarhi tadabhidhānaṃ yuktamevetyāha vṛttau---'yadi punari'tyādi /
GK16andhvc1u:6855: atra te 'pītyapiśabdena svasyāpi sarvatra yuktabhidhāyitvaṃ granthakṛtā sūcitamiti ca bodhyam /
GK16andhvc1u:6857: “nidrārdhamīlitaddaśo madamantharāṇi nāpyarthavanti na ca yāni nirarthakāni adyāpi me mṛgaddaśo madhurāṇi tasyāḥ” ityādyapādatrayam /
GK16andhvc1u:6866: locana.m kiṃ locanaṃ vināloko bhāti candrikayāpi hi /
GK16andhvc1u:6880: api kiṃ bhāti kiṃ sphurati na pratyakṣaviṣayo bhavatītyaprastutārthaḥ tatsāmyaṃ cātra dhvanyate /
GK16andhvc1u:6893: atha ca yasyāḥ pratibhāyāḥ unmīlanayuktyā prakāśayogena /
GK16andhvc1u:6894: viśvam kṣaṇādunmīlati navanavatayā bhāti svātmanyevāyatane viśrāntāṃ vāsanārūpeṇāvasthitām,
GK16andhvc1u:6897: vande ityādyartho 'pi bodhya iti sarvaṃ śivam // 19 //
GK16andhvc1u:6898: prauḍhaṃ kva locanaṃ mandaḥ kvāhaṃ tena mayā kṛtā /
